namespace = dg_setup
namespace = dg_conversion

#Number of times IF: 1165 every_province: 0 every_owned_province: 3420 every_country: 629

#Remember Ctrl-B (match braces)
#Remember TODO
#STOPPED HERE - search

#01 - $MONARCH$ leads a prayer (hidden maintenance event - basis of conversion system, minorities and refugees)
#02 - Spreading the Faith (triggered)
#03 - The True Faith (triggered)
#04 - Conversion of heresy (triggered)
#05 - The $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ faith shrinks
#06 - The $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ faith grows
#07 - REMOVED
#08 - The Crusading Spirit
#09 - Conversion System
#10 - Pressure to Convert (Wrong-religion vassals)

#11 - Paganism in Decline (Old World pagans)
#12 - Islam in Decline
#13 - Christianity in Decline
#14 - Dharmic Religions in Decline
#15 - Taoic Religions in Decline
#16 - Judaism in Decline
#17 - Paganism in Decline (New World pagans)
#18 - Religious syncretism
#19 - Faith of our Fathers (Colonial Nations)

#20 - Missionary Expedition
#21 - Catholic Missionaries
#22 - Orthodox Missionaries
#23 - Protestant Missionaries
#24 - Reformed Missionaries
#25 - coptic Orthodox Missionaries
#26 - Gnostic Missionaries
#27 - Hussite Missionaries
#28 - Sunni Missionaries
#29 - Shi'ite Missionaries
#30 - Ibadi Missionaries
#31 - Wahhabi Missionaries
#32 - Hindu Missionaries
#33 - Sikh Missionaries
#34 - Jain Missionaries
#35 - Zoroastrian Missionaries
#36 - Theravada Missionaries
#37 - Mahayana Missionaries
#38 - Vajrayana Missionaries
#39 - Shenist Missionaries
#40 - Jewish Missionaries
#41 - Supporting foreign heretics

#50 - The $ADJ Faith

province_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.99
	title = dg_conversion.99.t
	desc = dg_conversion.99.d
	picture = all_refugees
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		dg_assign_religious_modifiers = yes
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.99.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Triggered modifiers are now a census based event
	id = dg_conversion.100
	title = dg_conversion.100.t
	desc = dg_conversion.100.d
	picture = all_refugees
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = inc_dg_3 value = 1 }
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_3 value = 200 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.106 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_3 value = 400 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.106	days = 1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_3 value = 600 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.106	days = 2 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.106	days = 3 }
			}
			PREV = { change_variable = { which = inc_dg_3 value = 1 } }
		}
		set_variable = { which = inc_dg_3 value = 0 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.100.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Called by startup
	id = dg_conversion.101
	title = dg_conversion.101.t
	desc = dg_conversion.101.d
	picture = all_refugees
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			country_event = { id = dg_setup.001 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.101.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Called by the pulse system, to seperate expensive total pop calculation
	id = dg_conversion.102
	title = dg_conversion.102.t
	desc = dg_conversion.102.d
	picture = all_refugees
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = inc_dg_1 value = 1 }
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_1 value = 200 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.105 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_1 value = 400 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.105	days = 1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_1 value = 600 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.105	days = 2 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.105	days = 3 }
			}
			PREV = { change_variable = { which = inc_dg_1 value = 1 } }
		}
		set_variable = { which = inc_dg_1 value = 0 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.102.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Called by the pulse system, stable DG conversion call
	id = dg_conversion.104
	title = dg_conversion.104.t
	desc = dg_conversion.104.d
	picture = all_refugees
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = inc_dg_2 value = 1 }
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_2 value = 100 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.001 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_2 value = 200 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.001	days = 1	random = 2 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_2 value = 300 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.001	days = 3	random = 2 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_2 value = 400 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.001	days = 5	random = 2 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { PREV = { check_variable = { which = inc_dg_2 value = 600 } } }
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.001	days = 7	random = 2 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.001	days = 9	random = 2 }
			}
			PREV = { change_variable = { which = inc_dg_2 value = 1 } }
		}
		set_variable = { which = inc_dg_2 value = 0 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.104.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Called by event
	id = dg_conversion.105
	title = dg_conversion.105.t
	desc = dg_conversion.105.d
	picture = all_refugees
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		religious_demographics = yes
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.105.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Called by event
	id = dg_conversion.106
	title = dg_conversion.106.t
	desc = dg_conversion.106.d
	picture = all_refugees
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		dg_catholic_triggers = yes
		dg_orthodox_coptic_triggers = yes
		dg_coptic_triggers = yes
		dg_sunni_shiite_triggers = yes
		dg_muslim_triggers = yes
		dg_tolerance_system_triggers = yes
		dg_nahuati_inti_triggers = yes
		dg_patriarch_triggers = yes
		dg_hre_triggers = yes
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.106.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}

country_event = { #$MONARCH$ leads a prayer
	
	id = dg_conversion.001
	title = dg_conversion.001.t
	desc = dg_conversion.001.d
	picture = ai_only
	
	####TABLE OF CONTENTS - VERY COMPLICATED EVENT
	###First time setup
	###Recognizes time passing for several events
	### Secular countries may lose religious modifiers they no longer qualify for
	###THEOCRACIES
	### ADVISORS remove inappropriate religious advisors from AI countries (requires religious advisors in mod)
	### Religious uprisings may end
	###REMOVES INAPPROPRIATE FLAGS AND MODIFIERS
	###Restart the Renaissance event chain for converted/released/revolter countries (tied to the Reformation)
	###CHECK TO SEE IF COUNTRIES HAVE CHANGED STATE RELIGION
	###CHECK TO SEE IF MINORITIES HAVE BEEN CONVERTED
	###EXPANSION Check expansion of the faith
	###PIETY Set piety
	###CHURCH INFLUENCE (patriarch authority)
	###MILLET SYSTEM
	###CATHOLIC CHURCH
	###CARDINALS
	###PAPAL AUTHORITY set papal authority
	###EXCOMMUNICATION
	###REFUGEES
	###CHECK RELIGION OF PROVINCES
	## Check for presence of heretics
	## Conversion of heathens
	## Conversion of heretics
	## Dominant religion set
	## Minorities set
	###Add rewards for conversion
	###SET STATE RELIGION FLAGS
	###DEMOGRAPHICS
	###PLAYER-ONLY INVISIBLE EVENTS (IF PREFERRING TO IGNORE RELIGION)
	
	is_triggered_only = yes #by two-year-pulse
	
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			
			###First time setup event
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_global_flag = dei_gratia } #Set by dg_setup.001
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_setup.001 }
			}
			
			if = {
				limit = { is_papal_controller = yes }
				#Nonexistent countries reset so players can enforce religion on their new vassals
				every_country = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = yes } }
					clr_country_flag = catholic_state
					clr_country_flag = orthodox_state
					clr_country_flag = gnostic_state
					clr_country_flag = chaldean_state
					clr_country_flag = hussite_state
					clr_country_flag = protestant_state
					clr_country_flag = reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = coptic_state
					clr_country_flag = sunni_state
					clr_country_flag = shiite_state
					clr_country_flag = druze_state
					clr_country_flag = ibadi_state
					clr_country_flag = wahhabi_state
					clr_country_flag = confucianism_state
					clr_country_flag = shinto_state
					clr_country_flag = mahayana_state
					clr_country_flag = buddhism_state
					clr_country_flag = vajrayana_state
					clr_country_flag = hinduism_state
					clr_country_flag = jain_state
					clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_state
					clr_country_flag = sikhism_state
					clr_country_flag = jewish_state
					clr_country_flag = totemism_state
					clr_country_flag = animism_state
					clr_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = shamanism_state
					clr_country_flag = nahuatl_state
					clr_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_state
					clr_country_flag = inti_state
					clr_country_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = pantheism_state
					clr_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_state
					clr_country_flag = adi_dharam_state
					clr_country_flag = polynesian_religion_state
				}
				#Crusade checks
				if = {
					limit = {
						PAP = {
							has_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PAP = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = crusade_called }
							}
						}
						PAP = {
							clr_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							any_country = { has_country_flag = crusade_target }
						}
						random_country = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									any_known_country = {
										has_country_flag = crusade_target
										war_with = PREV
									}
									piety = -0.60
									NOT = { has_country_flag = excommunicated }
								}
								set_country_flag = crusade_sponsor
								PAP = { clr_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought }
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									any_neighbor_country = {
										has_country_flag = crusade_target
										NOT = { alliance_with = PREV }
										NOT = { truce_with = PREV }
										OR = {
											NOT = { army_size = PREV }
											NOT = { num_of_cities = PREV }
										}
									}
									piety = -0.20
									NOT = { has_country_flag = excommunicated }
									ai = yes
									is_at_war = no
									is_free_or_tributary_trigger = yes
									has_any_disaster = no
									NOT = { war_exhaustion = 2 }
									manpower_percentage = 0.75
									OR = {
										is_emperor = yes
										is_papal_controller = yes
										piety = 0.20
									}
								}
								random = {
									chance = 25
									set_country_flag = crusade_sponsor
									random_neighbor_country = {
										limit = {
											has_country_flag = crusade_target
										}
										country_event = { id = dg_conversion.008 days = 0 }
									}
									PAP = { clr_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						PAP = { has_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought }
						NOT = { PAP = { has_country_flag = crusade_called } }
					}
					PAP = { clr_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought }
				}
				if = { #The Papal Controller is likely to get dispensation
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = excommunicated
						is_excommunicated = no
						is_papal_controller = yes
					}
					random = { chance = 30 country_event = { id = dg_catholic.063 days = 0 } }
				}
			}
			#Other common events
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = religious_courts
					NOT = { religion = catholic } #Separate mechanic
				}
				if = {
					limit = { piety = 0.60 }
					random = {
						chance = 4
						set_country_flag = religious_court_event
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { piety = 0.20 }
					random = {
						chance = 3
						set_country_flag = religious_court_event
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { piety = -0.20 }
					random = {
						chance = 2
						set_country_flag = religious_court_event
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { piety = -0.60 }
					random = {
						chance = 1
						set_country_flag = religious_court_event
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = religious_court_event }
					clr_country_flag = religious_court_event
					if = {
						limit = { OR = { ai = yes has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
						country_event = { id = dg_catholic.005 days = 0 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = { ai = no NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
						set_country_flag = canonical_court_scandal
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = { has_owner_religion = yes controlled_by = ROOT }
							hidden_effect = {
								set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
								add_base_unrest = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
						}
						if = {
							limit = { piety = 0.60 }
							add_prestige = -1
							add_country_modifier = { name = anticlericalism duration = 100 }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								piety = 0.20
							}
							add_prestige = -2
							add_country_modifier = { name = anticlericalism duration = 200 }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								piety = -0.20
							}
							add_prestige = -3
							add_country_modifier = { name = anticlericalism duration = 400 }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								piety = -0.60
							}
							add_prestige = -4
							add_country_modifier = { name = anticlericalism duration = 800 }
						}
						else = {
							add_prestige = -5
							add_country_modifier = { name = anticlericalism duration = 1600 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			#Time passes
			set_variable = { which = obsessed_player value = 0 }
			if = { #Catholic countries may get dispensation from the pope
				limit = { has_country_flag = dispensation_consideration religion = catholic }
				random = { chance = 3 country_event = { id = dg_catholic.063 days = 0 } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = warrior_monks_chose_sides is_at_war = no }
				clr_country_flag = warrior_monks_chose_sides
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 1 } }
				change_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = -4 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = supreme_lama_regency value = 1 } }
				change_variable = { which = supreme_lama_regency value = -4 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = lama_of_age value = 1 } }
				change_variable = { which = lama_of_age value = -4 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = charismatic_revolt
					had_country_flag = { flag = charismatic_revolt days = 10000 }
				}
				clr_country_flag = charismatic_revolt
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = captured_caliph
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							had_country_flag = { flag = captured_caliph days = 10000 }
							NOT = { is_at_war = yes }
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = captured_caliph
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { religion_group = muslim }
							religion = druze
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = caliph
					clr_country_flag = ruler_as_caliph
					clr_country_flag = declared_caliph
					clr_country_flag = captive_caliph
				}
			}
			#Jihad checks
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = jihad_vow
					any_known_country = {
						has_country_modifier = jihad_goal
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = jihad_vow
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = jihad_goal
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = jihad_goal }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = jihad_raid value = 1 } }
				}
				clr_country_flag = jihad_goal
			}
			#Vassal checks
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = oath_of_tolerance
					is_free_or_tributary_trigger = yes
				}
				clr_country_flag = oath_of_tolerance
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = diplomatic_excommunication
					is_excommunicated = no
				}
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_excommunication
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = papal_fiefdom_ENG }
				random = { chance = 50 country_event = { id = dg_catholic.303 days = 0 random = 180 } }
			}
			#Countries that have changed state religion may have an heir who restores the old religion
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = sympathy_to_old_religion value = 1 } }
				change_variable = { which = sympathy_to_old_religion value = -4 }
				if = {
					limit = { government = republic } #Republics get more frequent rulers
					change_variable = { which = sympathy_to_old_religion value = -4 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ai = yes #The AI does a spectacularly crappy job of dealing with 'apostate rulers'
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = din_i_ilahi }
					}
					change_variable = { which = sympathy_to_old_religion value = -4 }
				}
			}
			#Check to see if a ruler is apostate
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = apostate_ruler
					OR = { has_regency = no has_consort_regency = yes }
				}
				clr_country_flag = apostate_ruler
				country_event = { id = dg_turmoil.053 days = 30 } #The Apostasy of $MONARCHNAME$
			}
			#Some religious specificities
			if = {
				limit = { religion = nahuatl }
				change_variable = { which = aztec_calendar value = 2 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { religion = jewish }
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = sabbatical_countdown value = 0 } } }
					set_variable = { which = sabbatical_countdown value = 3 } #Every 7 years = 4 checks x 2 years each = 8 years (oh well)
					change_variable = { which = jubilee_countdown value = -1 }
					country_event = { id = dg_jewish.001 days = 0 random = 180 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = jubilee_countdown value = 0 } } }
					set_variable = { which = jubilee_countdown value = 6 } #Every 7 Sabbatical years
				}
				change_variable = { which = sabbatical_countdown value = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = blot_countdown value = 0 } } }
					set_variable = { which = blot_countdown value = 9 } #Every 9 years
				}
				change_variable = { which = blot_countdown value = -2 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { religion = hellenic_pagan }
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = olympiad value = 0 } } }
					set_variable = { which = olympiad value = 4 } #Every 4 years
				}
				change_variable = { which = olympiad value = -1 }
			}
			else_if = { #Confucian Examination System
				limit = {
					OR = {
						religion = confucianism
						has_country_modifier = confucianism_dominates
						secondary_religion = confucianism
					}
					OR = {
						has_country_modifier = examination_system_classics
						has_country_modifier = examination_system_eight_legged_essay
						has_country_modifier = examination_system_five_studies
						has_country_modifier = examination_system_six_arts
						has_country_modifier = examination_system_quotas
						has_country_modifier = examination_system_translated_exams
					}
					is_at_war = no
				}
				clr_country_flag = confucian_irregular_examination
				random = {
					chance = 50
					country_event = { id = dg_confucian.082 days = 0 random = 180 }
				}
			}
			#Miaphysite rulers may be removed from the chance of sainthood
			else_if = {
				limit = { religion = coptic }
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = pious_ruler }
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								NOT = { piety = 0.20 }
								has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_impotent
								has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_weak
								has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_moderate
								has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_strong
								has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_powerful
							}
						}
						clr_country_flag = pious_ruler
					}
				}
				set_variable = { which = monastic_orders value = 0 }
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = monastery_unity } }
					change_variable = { which = monastic_orders value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = monastery_stephanite } }
					change_variable = { which = monastic_orders value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = monastery_zakristos } }
					change_variable = { which = monastic_orders value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = monastery_unctionist } }
					change_variable = { which = monastic_orders value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = monastery_sonsofgrace } }
					change_variable = { which = monastic_orders value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = monastery_fortified } }
					change_variable = { which = monastic_orders value = 1 }
				}
			}
			#Mahayana countries with abbots but no head temples lose them
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					religion = mahayana
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = great_temple } }
						NOT = { government = theocracy }
					}
					clr_country_flag = clerical_advisor
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_zealous
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_theologian
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_obedient
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_appointed
				}
			}
			#Sunni countries without a Caliph or Shiekh-ul-Islam lose them
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					religion = sunni
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = caliph }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = sheikh_ul_islam }
						NOT = { government = theocracy }
					}
					clr_country_flag = clerical_advisor
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_zealous
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_theologian
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_obedient
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
					clr_country_flag = patriarch_appointed
				}
			}
			
			###PASSIVE CONVERSION SYSTEM
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = conversion_system_activated }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_modifier = conversion_system_province
						NOT = { has_missionary = yes }
					}
					remove_province_modifier = conversion_system_province
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = missionary_policy
						has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
					}
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_catholic
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_orthodox
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_chaldean
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_coptic
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_gnostic
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_hussite
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_protestant
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_reformed
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_jewish
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_sunni
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_shiite
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_ibadi
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_wahhabi
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_druze
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_hinduism
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_zoroastrian
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_sikhism
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_jain
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_confucianism
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_buddhism
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_mahayana
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_vajrayana
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_nahuatl
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_inti
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_pantheism
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_totemism
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_mesoamerican_religion
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_shinto
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_adi_dharam
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_animism
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_tengri_pagan_reformed
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_shamanism
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_west_african_pagan_reformed
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_polynesian_religion
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_hellenic_pagan
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_norse_pagan_reformed
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_slavic_pagan_reformed
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_baltic_pagan_reformed
					clr_country_flag = missionary_policy_finnish_pagan_reformed
				}
				country_event = { id = dg_conversion.009 days = 0 } #Conversion system
			}
			
			##MODDING NOTES
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 1402 # Konstantinoupolis
					NOT = { tag = BYZ }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = dates_of_interest_fall_of_constantinople_1453 } }
					set_global_flag = dates_of_interest_fall_of_constantinople_1453
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_global_flag = fall_of_rome }
						NOT = {
							any_country = {
								primary_culture = greek
								num_of_cities = 1
								religion = orthodox
								ai = yes
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							any_country = {
								religion = orthodox
								any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = orthodox_pentarchy }
							}
						}
					}
					set_global_flag = fall_of_rome
					PAP = { set_country_flag = refugee_princess }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = POL
					NOT = { has_global_flag = dates_of_interest_union_of_krewa_1385 }
					OR = {
						junior_union_with = LIT
						senior_union_with = LIT
					}
				}
				set_global_flag = dates_of_interest_union_of_krewa_1385
			}
			
			##HOLY LANDS
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 379 # Al Quds
					OR = {
						religion = catholic
						religion = chaldean
						religion = hussite
						religion = gnostic
						religion = sunni
						religion = shiite
						religion = wahhabi
						religion = ibadi
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_jerusalem
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 2530 # Roma
					OR = {
						religion = catholic
						religion = orthodox
						religion = coptic
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_rome
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 1402 # Konstantinoupolis
					OR = {
						religion = orthodox
						religion = coptic
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_constantinople
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 358 # Al Iskandariyya
					OR = {
						religion = orthodox
						religion = coptic
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_alexandria
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_antioch_trigger = yes
					OR = {
						religion = orthodox
						religion = coptic
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_antioch
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 410 # Baghdad
					religion = chaldean
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_ctesiphon
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 385 # Makka
					OR = {
						religion = sunni
						religion = shiite
						religion = ibadi
						religion = wahhabi
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_mecca
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_modifier = emir_al_hajj
					NOT = { owns_or_non_sovereign_subject_of = 385 }
				}
				remove_country_modifier = emir_al_hajj
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 384 # Al Madina
					OR = {
						religion = sunni
						religion = shiite
						religion = ibadi
						religion = wahhabi
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_medina
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 1330 # Najaf
					religion = sunni
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_al_najaf
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 41 # Ostpreussen
					religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_balga
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					religion = sikhism
					any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = amritsar }
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_amritsar
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns = 2632 # Varanasi
					OR = {
						religion = hinduism
						religion = buddhism
						religion = jain
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = holy_land_varanasi
			}
			
			# End religious turmoil after its effects are gone
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_intolerance value = 1 } }
				change_variable = { which = religious_intolerance value = -4 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
					NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
					NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_intolerance value = 1 } }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = catholic_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = orthodox_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = chaldean_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = coptic_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = gnostic_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = hussite_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = protestant_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = reformed_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = jewish_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = sunni_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = shiite_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = ibadi_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = wahhabi_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = druze_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = hinduism_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = sikhism_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = jain_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = zoroastrian_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = adi_dharam_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = confucianism_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = buddhism_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = vajrayana_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = shinto_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = mahayana_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = nahuatl_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = mesoamerican_religion_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = inti_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = pantheism_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = totemism_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = animism_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = tengri_pagan_reformed_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = shamanism_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = polynesian_religion_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = west_african_pagan_reformed_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = hellenic_pagan_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = norse_pagan_reformed_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = finnish_pagan_reformed_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebels }
					NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebels }
				}
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_catholic
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_orthodox
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_protestant
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_gnostic
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_coptic
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_chaldean
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hussite
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_sunni
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_shiite
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_druze
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_ibadi
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_wahhabi
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hinduism
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_sikhism
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_jain
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_zoroastrian
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_adi_dharam
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_confucianism
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_buddhism
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_shinto
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_mahayana
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_vajrayana
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_jewish
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_nahuatl
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_mesoamerican_religion
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_inti
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_pantheism
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_totemism
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_polynesian_religion
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hellenic_pagan
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_animism
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_norse_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_baltic_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_finnish_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_slavic_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_west_african_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_tengri_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_shamanism
				clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_heretics
			}
			
			###CONVERSION EVENTS
			
			### Secular countries may lose religious modifiers they no longer qualify for (TODO)
			if = { #Removes modifiers for countries that no longer qualify for them
				limit = { NOT = { piety = -0.60 } }
				#sikhs
				remove_country_modifier = khalsa_order
			}
			
			###HUSSITE WARS###
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = hussite_wars_target
					OR = { has_regency = no has_consort_regency = yes }
					OR = {
						had_country_flag = { flag = hussite_wars_target days = 20000 }
						has_country_flag = hussite_compacta
						NOT = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 4 } } }
						is_religion_enabled = protestant
					}
				}
				every_known_country = {
					limit = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = throneless_king } }
					remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = throneless_king }
				}
			}
			
			###THEOCRACIES
			if = {
				limit = { government = theocracy }
				set_country_flag = theocracy
				every_country = {
					if = {
						limit = {
								religion = PREV
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								piety = 0.60
							}
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_pious }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_observant }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_decadent }
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_fanatical } }
								}
							}
							add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_fanatical }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								piety = 0.20
							}
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_fanatical }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_observant }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_decadent }
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_pious } }
								}
							}
							add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_pious }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								piety = -0.20
							}
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_fanatical }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_pious }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_decadent }
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_observant } }
								}
							}
							add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_observant }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								piety = -0.60
							}
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_fanatical }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_pious }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_observant }
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_decadent } }
								}
							}
							add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_decadent }
						}
						else = {
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_fanatical }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_pious }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_observant }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_decadent }
						}
					}
					else = {
						remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_fanatical }
						remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_pious }
						remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_observant }
						remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_decadent }
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = theocracy NOT = { government = theocracy } }
				clr_country_flag = theocracy
				every_country = {
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_fanatical }
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_pious }
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_observant }
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = theocracy_respect_decadent }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = zoroastrian }
				country_event = { id = dg_zoroastrian.001 days = 0 }
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_ruler_modifier = dynastic_incest_fanatical
							has_ruler_modifier = dynastic_incest_pious
							has_ruler_modifier = dynastic_incest_observant
							has_ruler_modifier = dynastic_incest_decadent
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = dynastic_incest
					every_country = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = { religion = zoroastrian }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									piety = 0.60
								}
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_pious }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_observant }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_decadent }
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_fanatical } }
									}
									add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_fanatical }
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									piety = 0.20
								}
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_fanatical }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_observant }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_decadent }
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_pious } }
									}
									add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_pious }
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									piety = -0.20
								}
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_fanatical }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_pious }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_decadent }
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_observant } }
									}
									add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_observant }
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									piety = -0.60
								}
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_fanatical }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_pious }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_observant }
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_decadent } }
									}
									add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_decadent }
								}
							}
							else = {
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_fanatical }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_pious }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_observant }
								remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_decadent }
							}
						}
						else = {
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_fanatical }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_pious }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_observant }
							remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_decadent }
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = dynastic_incest
						OR = {
							NOT = { religion = zoroastrian }
							NOT = { government = monarchy }
							has_regency = yes
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = dynastic_incest
					every_country = {
						remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_fanatical }
						remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_pious }
						remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_observant }
						remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = repelled_by_incest_decadent }
					}
				}
			}
			###ADVISORS remove inappropriate religious advisors from AI countries (requires religious advisors in mod)
			# Religious advisors are expelled when their faith is persecuted
			
			### Religious uprisings may end
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = religious_uprising
					OR = {
						NOT = { at_war_with_religious_enemy = yes }
						had_country_flag = { flag = religious_uprising days = 4000 }
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_catholic
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_orthodox
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_coptic
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_gnostic
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_chaldean
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_hussite
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_protestant
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_sunni
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_shiite
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_druze
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_ibadi
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_wahhabi
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_confucianism
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_buddhism
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_shinto
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_mahayana
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_vajrayana
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_hinduism
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_sikhism
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_jain
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_zoroastrian
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_jewish
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_inti
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_nahuatl
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_mesoamerican_religion
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_totemism
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_west_african_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_animism
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_tengri_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_shamanism
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_pantheism
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_baltic_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_finnish_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_slavic_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_norse_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_hellenic_pagan
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_polynesian_religion
				clr_country_flag = religious_uprising_adi_dharam
			}
			
			###REMOVES INAPPROPRIATE FLAGS AND MODIFIERS
			if = { #Temporary protection from conversion or expulsion
				limit = {
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 1 } }
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = useful_catholic
						has_country_flag = useful_protestant
						has_country_flag = useful_orthodox
						has_country_flag = useful_reformed
						has_country_flag = useful_gnostic
						has_country_flag = useful_chaldean
						has_country_flag = useful_coptic
						has_country_flag = useful_hussite
						has_country_flag = useful_sunni
						has_country_flag = useful_shiite
						has_country_flag = useful_druze
						has_country_flag = useful_ibadi
						has_country_flag = useful_wahhabi
						has_country_flag = useful_confucianism
						has_country_flag = useful_shinto
						has_country_flag = useful_mahayana
						has_country_flag = useful_buddhism
						has_country_flag = useful_vajrayana
						has_country_flag = useful_adi_dharam
						has_country_flag = useful_hinduism
						has_country_flag = useful_sikhism
						has_country_flag = useful_jain
						has_country_flag = useful_zoroastrian
						has_country_flag = useful_jewish
						has_country_flag = useful_pantheism
						has_country_flag = useful_nahuatl
						has_country_flag = useful_mesoamerican_religion
						has_country_flag = useful_inti
						has_country_flag = useful_totemism
						has_country_flag = useful_animism
						has_country_flag = useful_tengri_pagan_reformed
						has_country_flag = useful_shamanism
						has_country_flag = useful_west_african_pagan_reformed
						has_country_flag = useful_polynesian_religion
						has_country_flag = useful_norse_pagan_reformed
						has_country_flag = useful_baltic_pagan_reformed
						has_country_flag = useful_slavic_pagan_reformed
						has_country_flag = useful_finnish_pagan_reformed
						has_country_flag = useful_hellenic_pagan
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = useful_catholic
				clr_country_flag = useful_protestant
				clr_country_flag = useful_orthodox
				clr_country_flag = useful_reformed
				clr_country_flag = useful_gnostic
				clr_country_flag = useful_chaldean
				clr_country_flag = useful_coptic
				clr_country_flag = useful_hussite
				clr_country_flag = useful_sunni
				clr_country_flag = useful_shiite
				clr_country_flag = useful_druze
				clr_country_flag = useful_ibadi
				clr_country_flag = useful_wahhabi
				clr_country_flag = useful_confucianism
				clr_country_flag = useful_shinto
				clr_country_flag = useful_mahayana
				clr_country_flag = useful_buddhism
				clr_country_flag = useful_vajrayana
				clr_country_flag = useful_adi_dharam
				clr_country_flag = useful_hinduism
				clr_country_flag = useful_sikhism
				clr_country_flag = useful_jain
				clr_country_flag = useful_zoroastrian
				clr_country_flag = useful_jewish
				clr_country_flag = useful_pantheism
				clr_country_flag = useful_nahuatl
				clr_country_flag = useful_mesoamerican_religion
				clr_country_flag = useful_inti
				clr_country_flag = useful_totemism
				clr_country_flag = useful_animism
				clr_country_flag = useful_tengri_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = useful_shamanism
				clr_country_flag = useful_west_african_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = useful_polynesian_religion
				clr_country_flag = useful_norse_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = useful_baltic_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = useful_slavic_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = useful_finnish_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = useful_hellenic_pagan
			}
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						religion_group = pagan
						religion_group = european_pagan
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
					any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = syncretism }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = syncretism }
					remove_province_modifier = syncretism
					change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 }
				}
			}
			
			###Restart the Renaissance event chain for converted/released/revolter countries (tied to the Reformation)
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant }
					NOT = { is_religion_enabled = reformed }
					religion = catholic
					NOT = { has_country_flag = renaissance }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = humanism }
				}
				capital_scope = {
					clr_province_flag = renaissance_ideas
					clr_province_flag = humanist_ideas
				}
			}
			###CHECK TO SEE IF COUNTRIES HAVE CHANGED STATE RELIGION
			
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = rebels_won_civil_war }
				country_event = { id = dg_turmoil.048 days = 0 }
			}
			
			#Checks to see if any country has converted their state religion
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = catholic_state
							NOT = { religion = catholic }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = orthodox_state
							NOT = { religion = orthodox }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = protestant_state
							NOT = { religion = protestant }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = reformed_state
							NOT = { religion = reformed }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = hussite_state
							NOT = { religion = hussite }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = coptic_state
							NOT = { religion = coptic }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = gnostic_state
							NOT = { religion = gnostic }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = chaldean_state
							NOT = { religion = chaldean }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = sunni_state
							NOT = { religion = sunni }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = shiite_state
							NOT = { religion = shiite }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = druze_state
							NOT = { religion = druze }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = ibadi_state
							NOT = { religion = ibadi }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = wahhabi_state
							NOT = { religion = wahhabi }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = hinduism_state
							NOT = { religion = hinduism }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = sikhism_state
							NOT = { religion = sikhism }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = jain_state
							NOT = { religion = jain }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = zoroastrian_state
							NOT = { religion = zoroastrian }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = confucianism_state
							NOT = { religion = confucianism }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = buddhism_state
							NOT = { religion = buddhism }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = shinto_state
							NOT = { religion = shinto }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = mahayana_state
							NOT = { religion = mahayana }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = vajrayana_state
							NOT = { religion = vajrayana }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = jewish_state
							NOT = { religion = jewish }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = totemism_state
							NOT = { religion = totemism }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = animism_state
							NOT = { religion = animism }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_state
							NOT = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = shamanism_state
							NOT = { religion = shamanism }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_state
							NOT = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = nahuatl_state
							NOT = { religion = nahuatl }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_state
							NOT = { religion = mesoamerican_religion }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = inti_state
							NOT = { religion = inti }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = pantheism_state
							NOT = { religion = pantheism }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_state
							NOT = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_state
							NOT = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_state
							NOT = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_state
							NOT = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_state
							NOT = { religion = hellenic_pagan }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = adi_dharam_state
							NOT = { religion = adi_dharam }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = polynesian_religion_state
							NOT = { religion = polynesian_religion }
						}
					}
				}
				#Clears any former former religion
				clr_country_flag = was_catholic
				clr_country_flag = was_orthodox
				clr_country_flag = was_gnostic
				clr_country_flag = was_chaldean
				clr_country_flag = was_hussite
				clr_country_flag = was_protestant
				clr_country_flag = was_reformed
				clr_country_flag = was_coptic
				clr_country_flag = was_sunni
				clr_country_flag = was_shiite
				clr_country_flag = was_druze
				clr_country_flag = was_ibadi
				clr_country_flag = was_wahhabi
				clr_country_flag = was_confucianism
				clr_country_flag = was_shinto
				clr_country_flag = was_mahayana
				clr_country_flag = was_buddhism
				clr_country_flag = was_vajrayana
				clr_country_flag = was_hinduism
				clr_country_flag = was_jain
				clr_country_flag = was_zoroastrian
				clr_country_flag = was_sikhism
				clr_country_flag = was_jewish
				clr_country_flag = was_totemism
				clr_country_flag = was_animism
				clr_country_flag = was_west_african_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = was_tengri_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = was_shamanism
				clr_country_flag = was_nahuatl
				clr_country_flag = was_mesoamerican_religion
				clr_country_flag = was_inti
				clr_country_flag = was_baltic_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = was_pantheism
				clr_country_flag = was_finnish_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = was_norse_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = was_slavic_pagan_reformed
				clr_country_flag = was_hellenic_pagan
				clr_country_flag = was_adi_dharam
				clr_country_flag = was_polynesian_religion
				#Sets the new former religion
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = catholic_state
						NOT = { religion = catholic }
					}
					clr_country_flag = catholic_state
					set_country_flag = was_catholic
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = orthodox_state
						NOT = { religion = orthodox }
					}
					clr_country_flag = orthodox_state
					set_country_flag = was_orthodox
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = protestant_state
						NOT = { religion = protestant }
					}
					clr_country_flag = protestant_state
					set_country_flag = was_protestant
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = reformed_state
						NOT = { religion = reformed }
					}
					clr_country_flag = reformed_state
					set_country_flag = was_reformed
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = coptic_state
						NOT = { religion = coptic }
					}
					clr_country_flag = coptic_state
					set_country_flag = was_coptic
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = gnostic_state
						NOT = { religion = gnostic }
					}
					clr_country_flag = gnostic_state
					set_country_flag = was_gnostic
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = chaldean_state
						NOT = { religion = chaldean }
					}
					clr_country_flag = chaldean_state
					set_country_flag = was_chaldean
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = hussite_state
						NOT = { religion = hussite }
					}
					clr_country_flag = hussite_state
					set_country_flag = was_hussite
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = sunni_state
						NOT = { religion = sunni }
					}
					clr_country_flag = sunni_state
					set_country_flag = was_sunni
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = shiite_state
						NOT = { religion = shiite }
					}
					clr_country_flag = shiite_state
					set_country_flag = was_shiite
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = druze_state
						NOT = { religion = druze }
					}
					clr_country_flag = druze_state
					set_country_flag = was_druze
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = ibadi_state
						NOT = { religion = ibadi }
					}
					clr_country_flag = ibadi_state
					set_country_flag = was_ibadi
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = wahhabi_state
						NOT = { religion = wahhabi }
					}
					clr_country_flag = wahhabi_state
					set_country_flag = was_wahhabi
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = hinduism_state
						NOT = { religion = hinduism }
					}
					clr_country_flag = hinduism_state
					set_country_flag = was_hinduism
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								NOT = { capital_scope = { continent = indian_continent } } #India
								culture_group = dravidian
								is_colonial_nation = yes
								is_former_colonial_nation = yes
							}
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
						}
						add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_loose duration = -1 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								OR = {
									NOT = { capital_scope = { continent = indian_continent } } #India #XXX
									culture_group = dravidian
									is_colonial_nation = yes
									is_former_colonial_nation = yes
								}
							}
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
						}
						add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_strict duration = -1 }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = sikhism_state
						NOT = { religion = sikhism }
					}
					clr_country_flag = sikhism_state
					set_country_flag = was_sikhism
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = jain_state
						NOT = { religion = jain }
					}
					clr_country_flag = jain_state
					set_country_flag = was_jain
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
						}
						add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_loose duration = -1 }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = zoroastrian_state
						NOT = { religion = zoroastrian }
					}
					clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_state
					set_country_flag = was_zoroastrian
					if = {
						limit = {
							persian_culture_trigger = yes
							NOT = { is_colonial_nation = yes }
							NOT = { is_former_colonial_nation = yes }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
						}
						add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_strict duration = -1 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								NOT = { persian_culture_trigger = yes }
								is_colonial_nation = yes
								is_former_colonial_nation = yes
							}
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
						}
						add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_loose duration = -1 }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = adi_dharam_state
						NOT = { religion = adi_dharam }
					}
					clr_country_flag = adi_dharam_state
					set_country_flag = was_adi_dharam
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = buddhism_state
						NOT = { religion = buddhism }
					}
					clr_country_flag = buddhism_state
					set_country_flag = was_buddhism
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = confucianism_state
						NOT = { religion = confucianism }
					}
					clr_country_flag = confucianism_state
					set_country_flag = was_confucianism
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = shinto_state
						NOT = { religion = shinto }
					}
					clr_country_flag = shinto_state
					set_country_flag = was_shinto
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = mahayana_state
						NOT = { religion = mahayana }
					}
					clr_country_flag = mahayana_state
					set_country_flag = was_mahayana
				}
				else_if = {

					limit = {

						NOT = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
					}
					clr_country_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_state
					set_country_flag = was_baltic_pagan_reformed
				}
				#Effects of changing religion
				force_converted = yes #Forbids this ruler from changing state religion again voluntarily
				clr_country_flag = changed_state_religion
				set_country_flag = changed_state_religion
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							religion = protestant
							religion = gnostic
							religion = reformed
							religion = hussite
						}
					}
					add_church_power = 75
				}
				set_variable = { which = sympathy_to_old_religion value = 60 } #Chance an heir may try to revive the old religion, lowered by 3-9% per year depending on government and AI status (change if changing frequency of this event)
				if = {
					limit = { has_ruler_modifier = din_i_ilahi }
					set_variable = { which = sympathy_to_old_religion value = 120 }
				}
				#Resets holy lands
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_jerusalem
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_rome
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_antioch
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_constantinople
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_alexandria
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_ctesiphon
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_al_najaf
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_mecca
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_medina
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_amritsar
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_balga
				clr_country_flag = holy_land_varanasi
				#Domestic effects of conversion
				capital_scope = { #Capital converts to state religion
					change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 4 }
					change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 4 }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						is_reformation_center = yes
						has_owner_religion = yes
					}
					change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 4 }
					change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 4 }
				}
				every_owned_province = { #Some conversion of your country
					limit = { is_core = owner culture_group = ROOT }
					change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
				}
			}
			
			every_owned_province = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pilgrimage_site_minor
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_pilgrimage }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = coptic_pilgrimage }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = sacred_grove }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_great_fire_priests }
					}
					clr_province_flag = pilgrimage_site_minor
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
							has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage
							has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
							has_province_modifier = coptic_pilgrimage
							has_province_modifier = sacred_grove
							has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers
							has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors
							has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_great_fire_priests
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = pilgrimage_site_minor
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = sufi_nation
					NOT = { owner = { religion = shiite } }
				}
				clr_province_flag = sufi_nation
			}
			
			## SPECIAL HERETICS
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = protestant_supporters value = 1 } }
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_global_flag = reformation_exsurge_domine
							is_religion_enabled = protestant
							has_global_flag = reformation_diet_of_worms
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						change_variable = { which = protestant value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = protestant_supporters value = -1 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { religion = catholic }
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 1 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = protestant value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = catholic value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = protestant_supporters value = -1 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 1 } } }
						set_variable = { which = protestant_supporters value = 0 }
					}
				}
			}
			## CHECK HERETICS
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = heretics value = 2 } }
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							owner = { religion_group = christian }
							owner = { religion_group = pagan }
							owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
						}
						check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
						owner = { NOT = { religion = reformed } }
						NOT = { religion = reformed }
						check_variable = { which = heretics value = 2 }
					}
					change_variable = { which = reformed which = heretics }
					set_variable = { which = heretics value = 0 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							owner = { religion_group = christian }
							owner = { religion_group = pagan }
							owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
						}
						check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 }
						owner = { NOT = { religion = protestant } }
						NOT = { religion = protestant }
						check_variable = { which = heretics value = 2 }
					}
					change_variable = { which = protestant which = heretics }
					set_variable = { which = heretics value = 0 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							owner = { religion_group = christian }

						owner = { NOT = { religion = hussite } }
						NOT = { religion = hussite }
						check_variable = { which = heretics value = 2 }
					}
					change_variable = { which = hussite which = heretics }
					set_variable = { which = heretics value = 0 }

						}

						owner = { NOT = { religion = hinduism } }

			###CHECK TO SEE IF HERETICS HAVE BEEN CONVERTED
			
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = anti_heretic_missionary
					check_variable = { which = heretics value = 2 }
				}
				clr_province_flag = anti_heretic_missionary
				change_variable = { which = heretics value = -2 }
				change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
			}
			
			###CHECK TO SEE IF MINORITIES HAVE BEEN CONVERTED
			
			
			
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_province_modifier = minority_missionary }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_catholic_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = catholic value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = christian }
							}
							change_variable = { which = catholic value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_catholic_missionary
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_nahuatl_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = nahuatl value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = nahuatl value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_nahuatl_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_mesoamerican_religion_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_mesoamerican_religion_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_inti_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = inti value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = inti value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = inti value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_inti_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_pantheism_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = pantheism value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = pantheism value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = pantheism value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_pantheism_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_totemism_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = totemism value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = totemism value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = totemism value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_totemism_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_adi_dharam_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_adi_dharam_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_shinto_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = shinto value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = shinto value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = shinto value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_shinto_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_animism_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = animism value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = animism value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = animism value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_animism_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_tengri_pagan_reformed_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_tengri_pagan_reformed_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_shamanism_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = shamanism value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = shamanism value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = shamanism value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_shamanism_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_west_african_pagan_reformed_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_west_african_pagan_reformed_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_polynesian_religion_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_polynesian_religion_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_hellenic_pagan_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_hellenic_pagan_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_norse_pagan_reformed_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_norse_pagan_reformed_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_baltic_pagan_reformed_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_baltic_pagan_reformed_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_slavic_pagan_reformed_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_slavic_pagan_reformed_missionary
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = anti_finnish_pagan_reformed_missionary
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							}
							change_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = anti_finnish_pagan_reformed_missionary
				}
			}
			
			###EXPANSION Check expansion of the faith
			
			# check to see if countries are colonizing new provinces
