			every_owned_province = { #Allows recognition that a country is expanding their faith through colonies
				limit = {
					is_colony = yes
					NOT = { has_province_flag = frontier_church }
				}
				set_province_flag = frontier_church
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = colonial_mission
					num_free_building_slots = 1
					NOT = { temple_trigger = yes }
					NOT = { cathedral_trigger = yes }
				}
				add_building = temple
				clr_province_flag = colonial_mission
			}
			
			# check to see if countries have conquered provinces from heathens
			
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					religion_group = owner
					is_city = yes
					OR = {
						AND = {
							religion_group = christian
							NOT = { has_province_flag = owner_christian }
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = muslim
							NOT = { has_province_flag = owner_muslim }
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = dharmic
							NOT = { has_province_flag = owner_dharmic }
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = pagan
							NOT = { has_province_flag = owner_pagan }
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = european_pagan
							NOT = { has_province_flag = owner_european_pagan }
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = new_world_pagan
							NOT = { has_province_flag = owner_new_world_pagan }
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = jewish_group
							NOT = { has_province_flag = owner_jewish_group }
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = taoic
							NOT = { has_province_flag = owner_taoic }
						}
					}
				}
				clr_province_flag = owner_christian
				clr_province_flag = owner_muslim
				clr_province_flag = owner_dharmic
				clr_province_flag = owner_pagan
				clr_province_flag = owner_new_world_pagan
				clr_province_flag = owner_jewish_group
				if = {
					limit = {
						religion_group = taoic
						has_province_flag = owner_taoic
						NOT = { owner = { religion_group = taoic } }
					}
					clr_province_flag = owner_taoic
					set_province_flag = buddhist_artifacts
				}
				#Set appropriate ownership flags when provinces are conquered/converted
				if = {
					limit = { owner = { religion_group = christian } }
					set_province_flag = owner_christian
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pious_ruler } }
						owner = { set_country_flag = sainted_ruler }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { owner = { religion_group = muslim } }
					set_province_flag = owner_muslim
				}
				if = {
					limit = { owner = { religion_group = dharmic } }
					set_province_flag = owner_dharmic
				}
				if = {
					limit = { owner = { religion_group = pagan } }
					set_province_flag = owner_pagan
				}
				if = {
					limit = { owner = { religion_group = european_pagan } }
					set_province_flag = owner_european_pagan
				}
				if = {
					limit = { owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan } }
					set_province_flag = owner_new_world_pagan
				}
				if = {
					limit = { owner = { religion_group = taoic } }
					set_province_flag = owner_taoic
				}
				if = {
					limit = { owner = { religion_group = jewish_group } }
					set_province_flag = owner_jewish_group
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							owner = { ai = yes }
							NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial } }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { piety = 0.60 }
						}
						owner = { add_legitimacy = 1.2 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { piety = 0.20 }
						}
						owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.9 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { piety = -0.20 }
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { piety = -0.60 }
						}
						owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.6 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { religion = catholic }
						}
						owner = { add_papal_influence = 5 }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						owner = { ai = no }
						owner = { has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { piety = 0.60 }
						}
						owner = { change_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 2 } }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { piety = 0.20 }
						}
						owner = { change_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 1.5 } }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { piety = -0.20 }
						}
						owner = { change_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 1 } }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { piety = -0.60 }
						}
						owner = { change_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 0.5 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner = { religion = catholic }
						}
						owner = { change_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 1 } }
					}
				}
			}
			
			###RELIGIOUS FERVOR set fervor
			
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = religious_fervor_activated }
				set_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 0 }
				if = {
					limit = { any_neighbor_country = { NOT = { religion = ROOT } } }
					change_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_neighbor_country = { NOT = { religion = ROOT } army_size = ROOT } }
					change_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_neighbor_country = { NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
					change_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_neighbor_country = { NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } army_size = ROOT } }
					change_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { at_war_with_religious_enemy = yes }
					change_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { piety = 1.00 }
					multiply_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						piety = 0.60
					}
					multiply_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 0.80 }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = 0.20
					}
					multiply_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 0.60 }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = -0.20
					}
					multiply_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 0.40 }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = -0.60
					}
					multiply_variable = { which = religious_fervor value = 0.20 }
				}
			}
			
			#Set piety and church influence
			dg_conversion_set_piety = yes
			dg_conversion_set_church_influence = yes
			
			#Sufi-Ulema and Caliph Authority
			dg_conversion_set_sufi_ulema = yes
			dg_conversion_set_caliph_authority = yes
			
			#Safavids
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = safaviyya_revenge
					NOT = { has_global_flag = safaviyya_dynasty }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = safaviyya_next_generation }
					has_global_flag = safaviyya_founded
				}
				set_country_flag = safaviyya_next_generation
				clr_global_flag = safaviyya_founded
			}
			
			###CATHOLIC CHURCH
			if = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				##Distance from the Vatican
				remove_country_modifier = conclave_journey_moderate
				remove_country_modifier = conclave_journey_long
				remove_country_modifier = conclave_journey_extreme
				remove_country_modifier = conclave_journey_moderate_international
				remove_country_modifier = conclave_journey_long_international
				remove_country_modifier = conclave_journey_extreme_international
				if = {
					limit = {
						capital_distance = { who = PAP distance = 130 }
						exists = PAP
						NOT = { overlord_of = PAP }
						NOT = { any_owned_province = { any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = PAP superregion = italy_superregion } } }
						NOT = { any_subject_country = { any_owned_province = { any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = PAP superregion = italy_superregion } } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { has_country_flag = internationalized_curia } }
						if = {
							limit = { capital_distance = { who = PAP distance = 390 } }
							add_country_modifier = { name = conclave_journey_extreme_international duration = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								capital_distance = { who = PAP distance = 260 }
								NOT = { capital_distance = { who = PAP distance = 390 } }
							}
							add_country_modifier = { name = conclave_journey_long_international duration = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { NOT = { capital_distance = { who = PAP distance = 260 } } }
							add_country_modifier = { name = conclave_journey_moderate_international duration = -1 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { PAP = { has_country_flag = internationalized_curia } } }
						if = {
							limit = { capital_distance = { who = PAP distance = 390 } }
							add_country_modifier = { name = conclave_journey_extreme duration = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								capital_distance = { who = PAP distance = 260 }
								NOT = { capital_distance = { who = PAP distance = 390 } }
							}
							add_country_modifier = { name = conclave_journey_long duration = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { NOT = { capital_distance = { who = PAP distance = 260 } } }
							add_country_modifier = { name = conclave_journey_moderate duration = -1 }
						}
					}
				}
				##Cardinals
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_cardinal = yes }
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								had_province_flag = { flag = cardinal_1_year days = 365 }
								had_province_flag = { flag = cardinal_5_years days = 1825 }
								had_province_flag = { flag = cardinal_10_years days = 3650 }
								had_province_flag = { flag = cardinal_20_years days = 7300 }
								had_province_flag = { flag = cardinal_40_years days = 14600 }
								AND = {
									NOT = { has_province_flag = cardinal_1_year }
									NOT = { has_province_flag = cardinal_5_years }
									NOT = { has_province_flag = cardinal_10_years }
									NOT = { has_province_flag = cardinal_20_years }
									NOT = { has_province_flag = cardinal_40_years }
								}
							}
						}
						clr_province_flag = cardinal_1_year
						clr_province_flag = cardinal_5_years
						clr_province_flag = cardinal_10_years
						clr_province_flag = cardinal_20_years
						clr_province_flag = cardinal_40_years
						set_province_flag = cardinal_dies
						owner = { set_country_flag = cardinal_dies }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal_dies }
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								ai = yes
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
										AND = {
											has_country_flag = religious_news_major
											OR = {
												is_papal_controller = yes
												government = papal_government
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						clr_country_flag = cardinal_dies
						every_province = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal_dies }
							clr_province_flag = cardinal_dies
							remove_cardinal = yes
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							ai = no
							OR = {
								has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
								AND = {
									has_country_flag = religious_news_major
									OR = {
										is_papal_controller = yes
										government = papal_government
									}
								}
							}
						}
						clr_country_flag = cardinal_dies
						if = {
							limit = {
								num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
									has_province_flag = cardinal_dies
									value = 2
								}
							}
							country_event = { id = dg_catholic.129 days = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
										has_province_flag = cardinal_dies
										value = 2
									}
								}
							}
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal_dies }
								province_event = { id = dg_catholic.130 days = 0 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			if = {
				limit = { is_papal_controller = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { exists = PAP }
					PAP = { capital_scope = { save_global_event_target_as = the_vatican } } #Pope's capital city (usually but not always Rome)
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = PAP } }
					capital_scope = { save_global_event_target_as = the_vatican } #Papal Controller's court
				}
				
				###BEGINNING THE REFORMATION
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = reformation_zwickau_prophets
						NOT = { has_global_flag = reformation_peasants_war }
						had_global_flag = { flag = reformation_zwickau_prophets days = 700 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								any_owned_province = { event_target:reformation_origins = { culture = PREV } }
								any_owned_province = { event_target:imperial_diet_of_worms = { culture = PREV } }
								event_target:reformation_origins = { culture_group = PREV }
								religion = protestant
							}
							NOT = { religion = reformed }
						}
						country_event = { id = dg_reformation.032 days = 0 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = reformation_leipzig_disputation
						NOT = { has_global_flag = reformation_exsurge_domine }
						had_global_flag = { flag = reformation_leipzig_disputation days = 300 }
					}
					set_global_flag = reformation_exsurge_domine
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = reformation_ninety_five_theses
						NOT = { has_global_flag = reformation_leipzig_disputation }
						had_global_flag = { flag = reformation_ninety_five_theses days = 500 }
					}
					random_province = {
						limit = { has_province_flag = protestant_disputation }
						province_event = { id = dg_reformation.005 days = 0 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						reform_desire = 1.00
						NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant }
						NOT = { has_global_flag = reformation_ninety_five_theses }
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = {
							continent = europe
							religion = catholic
							owner = {
								religion = catholic
								NOT = { government = papal_government }
							}
							NOT = { has_province_flag = renaissance_ideas }
						}
						#Random factor
						random_list = {
							20 = { set_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -8 } }
							20 = { set_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -6 } }
							20 = { set_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -4 } }
							20 = { set_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -2 } }
							20 = { set_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 0 } }
						}
						#Church Reform Desire
						if = {
							limit = { reform_desire = 1.03 }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
							if = {
								limit = { reform_desire = 1.06 }
								change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
								if = {
									limit = { reform_desire = 1.09 }
									change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
									if = {
										limit = { reform_desire = 1.12 }
										change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
										if = {
											limit = { reform_desire = 1.15 }
											change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
											if = {
												limit = { reform_desire = 1.18 }
												change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
												if = {
													limit = { reform_desire = 1.21 }
													change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
													if = {
														limit = { reform_desire = 1.24 }
														change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
														if = {
															limit = { reform_desire = 1.27 }
															change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
															if = {
																limit = { reform_desire = 1.30 }
																change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
															}
														}
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						#Adjustment for year
						if = {
							limit = { is_year = 1515 }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 1 }
							if = {
								limit = { is_year = 1520 }
								change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 2 }
								if = {
									limit = { is_year = 1525 }
									change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
									if = {
										limit = { is_year = 1530 }
										change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 4 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
						#Drama
						if = {
							limit = { is_capital = yes }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { NOT = { ai = yes } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { any_neighbor_province = { owner = { OR = { is_rival = PREV is_enemy = PREV } } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 1 }
						}
						#Support for the Papacy
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { num_of_cardinals = 1 } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { num_of_cardinals = 3 } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { num_of_cardinals = 5 } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { is_subject_other_than_tributary_trigger = yes }
								NOT = { owner = { capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes } } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { is_subject_other_than_tributary_trigger = yes liberty_desire = 50 } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes }
									is_elector = no
									is_emperor = no
								}
							}
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes }
									is_elector = yes
								}
							}
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 3 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { is_emperor = yes } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { is_papal_controller = yes } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { any_subject_country = { religion = catholic } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						#Isolation
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { num_of_cities = 12 } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { num_of_cities = 4 } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { culture_group = PREV } } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { culture_group = PREV religion = catholic } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { any_neighbor_country = { NOT = { religion = catholic } } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { any_neighbor_province = { NOT = { religion = catholic } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						#Support for Reformation
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = inquisition value = 1 } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = inquisition value = 2 } } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = humanism } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = conciliarism_supported } }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 1 }
						}
						#Suffered abuses of the Church
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = humanist_ideas }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = simony_province }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = indulgence_peddler }
							change_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 2 }
						}
					}
					random_province = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 1 }
							all_province = {
								OR = {
									NOT = { check_variable = { which = reformation_origins which = PREV } }
									is_variable_equal = { which = reformation_origins which = PREV }
								}
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = potential_reformation_origins
						
						random_list = {
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 1 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 2 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 3 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 4 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 5 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 6 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 7 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 8 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 9 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 10 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 11 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 12 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 13 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 14 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 15 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 16 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 17 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 18 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 19 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 20 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 21 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 22 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 23 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 24 } }
							1 = { set_variable = { which = random_check value = 25 } }
						}
						
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = reformation_origins which = random_check }
							}
							set_global_flag = reformation_ninety_five_theses
						}
						
						set_variable = { which = random_check value = 0 }
						
						if = {
							limit = { has_global_flag = reformation_ninety_five_theses }
							save_global_event_target_as = reformation_origins
							set_province_flag = reformation_origins
							set_province_flag = protestant_holy_land
							clr_province_flag = potential_reformation_origins
							if = {
								limit = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric }
								save_global_event_target_as = reformation_origins_archbishop
								set_province_flag = reformation_origins_archbishop
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric }
									any_neighbor_province = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric culture = PREV }
								}
								random_neighbor_province = {
									limit = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric culture = PREV }
									save_global_event_target_as = reformation_origins_archbishop
									set_province_flag = reformation_origins_archbishop
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric }
									NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric culture = PREV } }
									any_province = { culture = PREV has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric }
								}
								random_province = {
									limit = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric culture = PREV }
									save_global_event_target_as = reformation_origins_archbishop
									set_province_flag = reformation_origins_archbishop
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric }
									NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric culture = PREV } }
									NOT = { any_province = { culture = PREV has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric } }
									any_province = { culture_group = PREV has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric }
								}
								random_province = {
									limit = { has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric culture_group = PREV }
									save_global_event_target_as = reformation_origins_archbishop
									set_province_flag = reformation_origins_archbishop
								}
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_reformation.001 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					every_province = { set_variable = { which = reformation_origins value = 0 } }
					random_province = {
						limit = {
							event_target:reformation_origins = { culture = PREV }
							has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric
							religion = catholic
						}
						save_global_event_target_as = reformation_origins_archbishop
					}
				}
				
				###THE LEAGUE WARS
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_religion_enabled = protestant
							is_religion_enabled = reformed
						}
						OR = {
							religion_years = { protestant = 5 }
							religion_years = { reformed = 5 }
						}
						NOT = { has_global_flag = leagues_divided_empire }
						NOT = { has_global_flag = leagues_peace_of_augsburg }
						OR = {
							NOT = { has_global_flag = leagues_peace_of_westphalia }
							had_global_flag = { flag = leagues_peace_of_westphalia days = 3600 }
						}
						NOT = { hre_leagues_enabled = yes }
						NOT = { hre_reform_level = 6 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								NOT = { hre_religion_treaty = yes }
								NOT = { religion_years = { protestant = 30 } }
							}
						}
						every_country = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes }
									is_elector = yes
									is_emperor = yes
								}
							}
							HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_states value = 1 } }
							if = {
								limit = { is_elector = yes }
								HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_states value = 1 } }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { num_of_cities = 4 }
								HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_states value = 1 } }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = catholic }
								HAB = { change_variable = { which = catholic_princes value = 1 } }
								if = {
									limit = { is_elector = yes }
									HAB = { change_variable = { which = catholic_princes value = 1 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { num_of_cities = 4 }
									HAB = { change_variable = { which = catholic_princes value = 1 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { NOT = { hre_religion = catholic } }
									HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 1 } }
									if = {
										limit = { is_elector = yes }
										HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 1 } }
									}
									if = {
										limit = { num_of_cities = 4 }
										HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 1 } }
									}
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = reformed }
								HAB = { change_variable = { which = reformed_princes value = 1 } }
								if = {
									limit = { is_elector = yes }
									HAB = { change_variable = { which = reformed_princes value = 1 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { num_of_cities = 4 }
									HAB = { change_variable = { which = reformed_princes value = 1 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { NOT = { hre_religion = reformed } }
									HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 1 } }
									if = {
										limit = { is_elector = yes }
										HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 1 } }
									}
									if = {
										limit = { num_of_cities = 4 }
										HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 1 } }
									}
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = protestant }
								HAB = { change_variable = { which = protestant_princes value = 1 } }
								if = {
									limit = { is_elector = yes }
									HAB = { change_variable = { which = protestant_princes value = 1 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { num_of_cities = 4 }
									HAB = { change_variable = { which = protestant_princes value = 1 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { NOT = { hre_religion = protestant } }
									HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 1 } }
									if = {
										limit = { is_elector = yes }
										HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 1 } }
									}
									if = {
										limit = { num_of_cities = 4 }
										HAB = { change_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 1 } }
									}
								}
							}
						}
						HAB = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									is_variable_equal = {
										which = imperial_states
										value = 0
									}
								}
								
								# log = "<ERROR><5E8BB18B><THIS:[This.GetName]><PREV:[Prev.GetName]><ROOT:[Root.GetName]><FROM:[From.GetName]> Division by zero!"
							}
							else = {
								divide_variable = {
									which = imperial_disunity
									which = imperial_states
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { HAB = { check_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 0.30 } } }
							set_global_flag = leagues_divided_empire
							if = {
								limit = { has_global_flag = first_league_war }
								if = {
									limit = {
										any_known_country = {
											capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes }
											NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
											is_emperor = no
											is_elector = no
										}
									}
									random_country = {
										limit = {
											capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes }
											NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
											is_emperor = no
											is_elector = no
										}
										capital_scope = { save_global_event_target_as = imperial_diet_of_augsburg }
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = {
											any_known_country = {
												capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes }
												NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
												is_emperor = no
												is_elector = no
											}
										}
									}
									emperor = { capital_scope = { save_global_event_target_as = imperial_diet_of_augsburg } }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										hre_religion = catholic
										AND = {
											emperor = { religion = catholic }
											hre_religion_treaty = yes
										}
									}
									HAB = { check_variable = { which = protestant_princes which = reformed_princes } }
								}
								set_hre_heretic_religion = protestant
								random_province = {
									limit = {
										is_part_of_hre = yes
										religion = protestant
										owner = { religion = protestant }
									}
									save_global_event_target_as = league_of_schmalkalden
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										hre_religion = catholic
										AND = {
											emperor = { religion = catholic }
											hre_religion_treaty = yes
										}
									}
									HAB = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = protestant_princes which = reformed_princes } } }
								}
								set_hre_heretic_religion = reformed
								random_province = {
									limit = {
										is_part_of_hre = yes
										religion = reformed
										owner = { religion = reformed }
									}
									save_global_event_target_as = league_of_schmalkalden
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										hre_religion = protestant
										AND = {
											emperor = { religion = protestant }
											hre_religion_treaty = yes
										}
									}
									HAB = { check_variable = { which = catholic_princes which = reformed_princes } }
								}
								set_hre_heretic_religion = catholic
								random_province = {
									limit = {
										is_part_of_hre = yes
										religion = catholic
										owner = { religion = catholic }
									}
									save_global_event_target_as = league_of_schmalkalden
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										hre_religion = protestant
										AND = {
											emperor = { religion = protestant }
											hre_religion_treaty = yes
										}
									}
									HAB = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = catholic_princes which = reformed_princes } } }
								}
								set_hre_heretic_religion = reformed
								random_province = {
									limit = {
										is_part_of_hre = yes
										religion = reformed
										owner = { religion = reformed }
									}
									save_global_event_target_as = league_of_schmalkalden
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										hre_religion = reformed
										AND = {
											emperor = { religion = reformed }
											hre_religion_treaty = yes
										}
									}
									HAB = { check_variable = { which = protestant_princes which = catholic_princes } }
								}
								set_hre_heretic_religion = protestant
								random_province = {
									limit = {
										is_part_of_hre = yes
										religion = protestant
										owner = { religion = protestant }
									}
									save_global_event_target_as = league_of_schmalkalden
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										hre_religion = reformed
										AND = {
											emperor = { religion = reformed }
											hre_religion_treaty = yes
										}
									}
									HAB = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = protestant_princes which = catholic_princes } } }
								}
								set_hre_heretic_religion = catholic
								random_province = {
									limit = {
										is_part_of_hre = yes
										religion = catholic
										owner = { religion = catholic }
									}
									save_global_event_target_as = league_of_schmalkalden
								}
							}
						}
						HAB = {
							set_variable = { which = catholic_princes value = 0 }
							set_variable = { which = protestant_princes value = 0 }
							set_variable = { which = reformed_princes value = 0 }
							set_variable = { which = imperial_disunity value = 0 }
							set_variable = { which = imperial_states value = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = reformation_diet_of_speyer } }
							set_global_flag = reformation_diet_of_speyer
							if = {
								limit = {
									any_known_country = {
										capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes }
										NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
										is_emperor = no
										is_elector = no
									}
								}
								random_country = {
									limit = {
										capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes }
										NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
										is_emperor = no
										is_elector = no
									}
									capital_scope = { save_global_event_target_as = imperial_diet_of_speyer set_province_flag = diet_of_speyer }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										any_known_country = {
											capital_scope = { is_part_of_hre = yes }
											NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
											is_emperor = no
											is_elector = no
										}
									}
								}
								emperor = { capital_scope = { save_global_event_target_as = imperial_diet_of_speyer set_province_flag = diet_of_speyer } }
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = reformation_diet_of_speyer
							had_global_flag = { flag = reformation_diet_of_speyer days = 1200 }
							NOT = { has_global_flag = reformation_second_diet_of_speyer }
						}
						set_global_flag = reformation_second_diet_of_speyer
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = leagues_divided_empire
						emperor = {
							has_country_flag = reformation_second_diet_of_speyer
							NOT = { has_country_flag = tolerant_hre }
						}
						hre_leagues_enabled = no
						had_global_flag = { flag = reformation_second_diet_of_speyer days = 600 }
						NOT = { has_global_flag = leagues_peace_of_augsburg }
						OR = {
							NOT = { has_global_flag = leagues_peace_of_westphalia }
							had_global_flag = { flag = leagues_peace_of_westphalia days = 3600 }
						}
					}
					clr_global_flag = leagues_peace_of_westphalia
					clr_global_flag = leagues_peace_of_augsburg
					clr_global_flag = hre_leagues_catholic
					clr_global_flag = hre_leagues_protestant
					clr_global_flag = hre_leagues_reformed
					enable_hre_leagues = yes
				}
				
				###REMOVE TRACES OF THE ROMAN TERRITORIES AND AVIGNON PAPACY
				
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = PA2 } }
					every_province = { remove_core = PA2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						AVI = { government = papal_government }
						NOT = { exists = AVI }
					}
					every_province = { remove_core = AVI }
				}
				
				###APPOINTING CARDINALS
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = living_pope
						#There must be space in the College (Maximum -Large appointment)
						OR = {
							NOT = { total_number_of_cardinals = 15 } #14+6 = 20
							AND = {
								is_year = 1400
								NOT = { total_number_of_cardinals = 22 } #21+9 = 30 preferred
							}
							AND = {
								is_year = 1500
								NOT = { total_number_of_cardinals = 39 } #38+12 = 50
								PAP = { has_country_flag = curia_limits_established }
							}
							AND = {
								is_year = 1500
								NOT = { total_number_of_cardinals = 66 } #65+15 = 80 preferred
								NOT = { PAP = { has_country_flag = curia_limits_established } }
							}
						}
						#The more worldly the pope, the more cardinals he will appoint
						OR = {
							NOT = { total_number_of_cardinals = 20 }
							AND = {
								NOT = { total_number_of_cardinals = 40 }
								PAP = { has_country_flag = secular_pope }
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { total_number_of_cardinals = 70 }
								PAP = { has_country_flag = corrupt_pope }
							}
						}
					}
					country_event = { id = dg_pope.026 days = 0 }
				}
				
				###PAPAL AUTHORITY set papal authority
				
				PAP = {
					set_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = antipope_authority value = 0 }
				}
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							religion = catholic
							capital_scope = { continent = europe }
						}
					}
					PAP = { change_variable = { which = papacy_calculation_states value = 1 } }
					if = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = support_antipope }
							PAP = { change_variable = { which = antipope_catholic_states value = 1 } }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = support_antipope } }
							PAP = { change_variable = { which = catholic_states value = 1 } }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = { war_with = PAP }
								NOT = { is_colonial_nation = yes }
								NOT = { is_tribal = yes }
								NOT = { has_country_flag = hiding_luther }
								OR = {
									patriarch_authority = 0.50
									government = theocracy
									is_subject_of = PAP
									has_country_flag = patronato_real
									check_variable = { which = inquisition value = 1 }
								}
								NOT = { has_country_flag = excommunicated }
								NOT = { has_country_flag = enemy_of_pope }
								NOT = { has_country_flag = rival_of_pope }
								NOT = { has_country_flag = catholic_pragmatic_sanction }
								NOT = { has_country_flag = crusades_over }
								NOT = { has_country_flag = conciliarism_supported }
								NOT = { has_country_flag = jesuit_expulsion }
								NOT = { has_country_flag = jesuits_rejected }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { has_country_flag = support_antipope }
								PAP = { change_variable = { which = antipope_catholic_states value = 1 } }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = support_antipope } }
								PAP = { change_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_states value = 1 } }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										patriarch_authority = 0.80
										government = theocracy
										is_subject_of = PAP
										check_variable = { which = inquisition value = 2 }
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = { has_country_flag = support_antipope }
									PAP = { change_variable = { which = antipope_catholic_states value = 1 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = support_antipope } }
									PAP = { change_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_states value = 1 } }
								}
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						PAP = { change_variable = { which = papacy_calculation_provinces value = 0.1 } }
						if = {
							limit = { owned_by = PAP }
							PAP = { change_variable = { which = papal_provinces value = 0.1 } }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { religion = catholic }
							PAP = { change_variable = { which = catholic_provinces value = 0.1 } }
						}
					}
				}
				PAP = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_variable_equal = {
								which = catholic_states
								value = 0
							}
						}
						
						# log = "<ERROR><86FF9229><THIS:[This.GetName]><PREV:[Prev.GetName]><ROOT:[Root.GetName]><FROM:[From.GetName]> Division by zero!"
						
					}
					else = {
						divide_variable = {
							which = supportive_catholic_states
							which = catholic_states
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_variable_equal = {
								which = catholic_states
								value = 0
							}
						}
						
						# log = "<ERROR><D5B93FF0><THIS:[This.GetName]><PREV:[Prev.GetName]><ROOT:[Root.GetName]><FROM:[From.GetName]> Division by zero!"
					}
					else = {
						divide_variable = {
							which = antipope_supportive_states
							which = catholic_states
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_variable_equal = {
								which = papacy_calculation_states
								value = 0
							}
						}
						
						# log = "<ERROR><5E4F31CE><THIS:[This.GetName]><PREV:[Prev.GetName]><ROOT:[Root.GetName]><FROM:[From.GetName]> Division by zero!"
						
					}
					else = {
						divide_variable = {
							which = catholic_states
							which = papacy_calculation_states
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_variable_equal = {
								which = catholic_provinces
								value = 0
							}
						}
						
						# log = "<ERROR><F8F5A724><THIS:[This.GetName]><PREV:[Prev.GetName]><ROOT:[Root.GetName]><FROM:[From.GetName]> Division by zero!"
						
					}
					else = {
						divide_variable = {
							which = papal_provinces
							which = catholic_provinces
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_variable_equal = {
								which = papacy_calculation_provinces
								value = 0
							}
						}
						
						# log = "<ERROR><5AF2E89C><THIS:[This.GetName]><PREV:[Prev.GetName]><ROOT:[Root.GetName]><FROM:[From.GetName]> Division by zero!"
						
					}
					else = {
						divide_variable = {
							which = catholic_provinces
							which = papacy_calculation_provinces
						}
					}
					#200 points - Catholic provinces
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic_provinces value = 1.00 } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 200 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic_provinces value = 0.05 } }
						set_variable = { which = catholic_provinces_temp		which = catholic_provinces }
						multiply_variable = { which = catholic_provinces_temp	value = 200 }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority 			which = catholic_provinces_temp }
						set_variable = { which = catholic_provinces_temp		value = 0 }
					}
					#200 points - Catholic States
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic_states value = 1.00 } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 200 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic_states value = 0.05 } }
						set_variable = { which = catholic_states_temp		which = catholic_states }
						multiply_variable = { which = catholic_states_temp	value = 200 }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority 		which = catholic_states_temp }
						set_variable = { which = catholic_states_temp		value = 0 }
					}
					#the HRE (-50 to +50)
					if = {
						limit = { hre_religion = catholic } #1356-1648
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
						if = {
							limit = { hre_religion_locked = yes }
							change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { hre_religion = catholic }
							hre_religion_locked = yes
						}
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { any_country = { is_emperor = yes NOT = { religion = catholic } } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -25 }
					}
					#The Reformation
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = reformation_ninety_five_theses
							NOT = { has_global_flag = reformation_luther_martyred }
						}
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { any_country = { religion = hussite } }
							OR = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_compact }
								has_country_flag = hussite_compacta_voided
							}
						}
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					if = { #1356-1521
						limit = { NOT = { any_country = { religion = protestant } } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { any_country = { religion = reformed } } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { any_country = { religion = gnostic } } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					if = { #NO
						limit = { NOT = { any_country = { religion = orthodox } } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					if = { #NO
						limit = { NOT = { any_country = { religion = coptic } } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					if = { #1356-1860
						limit = { NOT = { any_country = { religion = chaldean } } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					#Calculate antipope authority
					if = {
						limit = { AVI = { government = papal_government } }
						set_variable = { which = antipope_authority which = papal_authority }
					}
					#200 points - Catholic support (Pope)
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces value = 1.00 } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 200 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces value = 0.05 } }
						set_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces_temp			which = supportive_catholic_provinces }
						multiply_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces_temp	value = 200 }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority 						which = supportive_catholic_provinces_temp }
						set_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces_temp			value = 0 }
					}
					#200 points - Catholic support (Antipope)
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces value = 1.00 } }
						change_variable = { which = antipope_authority value = 200 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces value = 0.05 } }
						set_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces_temp			which = supportive_catholic_provinces }
						multiply_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces_temp	value = 200 }
						change_variable = { which = antipope_authority 						which = supportive_catholic_provinces_temp }
						set_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_provinces_temp			value = 0 }
					}
					#Independence of the Papal States (-50 to +50)
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								NOT = { num_of_cities = 1 }
								is_subject_other_than_tributary_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -50 }
						if = {
							limit = {
								any_country = {
									is_papal_controller = yes
									has_country_flag = papal_court_large
								}
							}
							change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 50 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { num_of_cities = 1 is_free_or_tributary_trigger = yes }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 50 }
					}
					#Rome and other Patriarchates (-100 to +150)
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { owns_rome_trigger = yes } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -100 }
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = catholic_patriarchate }
						owner = { change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { AVI = { government = papal_government } }
						AVI = {
							every_owned_province = {
								limit = { has_province_modifier = catholic_patriarchate }
								owner = { change_variable = { which = antipope_authority value = 25 } }
							}
						}
					}
					#-200 points - Papal States is not neutral
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_provinces value = 0.10 } }
						subtract_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 200 }
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_provinces	 value = 0.01 } }
						set_variable = { which = papal_provinces_temp			which = papal_provinces }
						multiply_variable = { which = papal_provinces_temp		value = 2000 }
						subtract_variable = { which = papal_authority 			which = papal_provinces_temp }
						set_variable = { which = papal_provinces_temp			value = 0 }
					}
					#Papal Reforms
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = constantine_donation_cf_exposed } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = ad_limina_bishops }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = jesuits_founded }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = faith_alone } #Admitting mistakes
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = solo_scriptoris } #Admitting mistakes
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = bread_and_wine } #Admitting mistakes
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = vernacular_allowed } #Admitting mistakes
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -25 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = papal_conciliarism
							NOT = { has_country_flag = papal_absolutism }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = papal_infallibility }
						}
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -100 }
					}
					#Pope's personality
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = corrupt_pope }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -50 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = reformer_pope }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 50 }
					}
					#Papal Devotion
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { devotion = 100 } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -10 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { devotion = 80 } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -10 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { devotion = 60 } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -10 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { devotion = 40 } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -10 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { devotion = 20 } }
						change_variable = { which = papal_authority value = -10 }
					}
				}
				PAP = {
					set_variable = { which = conciliarism value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = catholic_states value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = catholic_provinces value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = papacy_calculation_provinces value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = papacy_calculation_states value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = papal_provinces value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = supportive_catholic_states value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = antipope_catholic_states value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = antipope_supportive_states value = 0 }
				}
				#CONCILIARISM
				PAP = { multiply_variable = { which = conciliarism value = 2 } }
				
				###EXCOMMUNICATION
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 300 } }
						has_global_flag = living_pope
						any_country = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { has_country_flag = excommunicated }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = excommunication_reprieve }
							is_papal_controller = no
							NOT = { government = papal_government }
							OR = { #In order of severity
								#Seizing Rome
								AND = {
									owns_rome_trigger = yes
									NOT = { tag = PAP }
									NOT = { is_subject_of = PAP }
									NOT = { any_province = { province_rome_trigger = yes has_province_modifier = independent_vatican } }
								}
								#Usurping the church
								has_country_flag = excommunication_usurp_church
								#Heathen friendship
								AND = {
									PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 400 } }
									any_ally = {
										NOT = { religion_group = christian }
										is_free_or_tributary_trigger = yes
										any_country = { war_with = PREV religion = catholic }
									}
								}
								#Blasphemy
								AND = {
									PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 400 } }
									NOT = { piety = -0.40 }
									NOT = { has_country_flag = catholic_blasphemy } #Never expires - only once
								}
								#Invading the Papal States
								AND = {
									any_owned_province = {
										is_core = PAP
										NOT = { is_core = owner }
										NOT = { province_rome_trigger = yes }
									}
									NOT = { is_subject_of = PAP }
									PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 400 } }
								}
								#Unjust war
								AND = {
									PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 500 } }
									OR = {
										has_country_flag = excommunication_unjust_war
										AND = {
											war_with = ROOT
											NOT = { defensive_war_with = ROOT }
										}
									}
								}
								#Abuse of papal authority
								#						is_excommunicated = yes
							}
						}
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { any_country = { has_country_flag = excommunication_target } }
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { has_country_flag = excommunicated }
							NOT = { has_country_modifier = excommunication_reprieve }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = former_excommunication_target } #Removed upon new pope/new ruler
							is_papal_controller = no
							NOT = { government = papal_government }
						}
						#Adds chance of being targeted by severity of offence
						if = { #Seizing Rome
							limit = {
								owns_rome_trigger = yes
								NOT = { tag = PAP }
								NOT = { is_subject_of = PAP }
								NOT = { any_owned_province = { province_rome_trigger = yes has_province_modifier = independent_vatican } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 400 } } }
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { had_country_flag = { flag = excommunication_usurp_church days = 1000 } } }
								change_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 1 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { had_country_flag = { flag = excommunication_usurp_church days = 1000 } }
									NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
								}
								change_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 1 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { had_country_flag = { flag = excommunication_usurp_church days = 1000 } }
									NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.20 }
								}
								change_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 1 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									any_ally = {
										NOT = { religion_group = christian }
										NOT = { is_subject_of = PREV }
										any_country = { war_with = PREV religion = catholic is_excommunicated = no }
									}
								}
								change_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 1.5 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = { piety = -0.40 }
									NOT = { has_country_flag = catholic_blasphemy } #Never expires
								}
								change_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 1 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									any_owned_province = {
										is_core = PAP
										NOT = { is_core = owner }
										NOT = { province_rome_trigger = yes }
									}
								}
								every_owned_province = {
									limit = {
										is_core = PAP
										NOT = { is_core = owner }
										NOT = { province_rome_trigger = yes }
									}
									owner = { change_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 0.5 } }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 500 } } }
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = excommunication_unjust_war
											AND = {
												war_with = ROOT
												NOT = { defensive_war_with = ROOT }
											}
										}
										war_score_against = { who = ROOT value = 10 }
										OR = {
											is_rival = ROOT
											is_enemy = ROOT
											war_score_against = { who = ROOT value = 50 }
										}
									}
								}
								change_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 1 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 500 } } }
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = excommunication_unjust_war
											AND = {
												war_with = ROOT
												NOT = { defensive_war_with = ROOT }
											}
										}
										war_score_against = { who = ROOT value = 75 }
									}
								}
								change_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 1 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_country_flag = support_antipope
									exists = AVI
									AVI = { government = papal_government }
								}
								set_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 0 }
							}
						}
						random_country = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								check_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 1 }
								all_country = {
									OR = {
										NOT = { check_variable = { which = excommunication_target which = PREV } }
										is_variable_equal = { which = excommunication_target which = PREV }
									}
								}
							}
							set_country_flag = excommunication_target
						}
						every_country = { set_variable = { which = excommunication_target value = 0 } }
						random_country = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = excommunication_target }
							if = {
								limit = {
									owns_rome_trigger = yes
									NOT = { tag = PAP }
									NOT = { is_subject_of = PAP }
									118 = { NOT = { has_province_modifier = independent_vatican } }
								}
								set_country_flag = excommunication_rome
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									any_owned_province = {
										is_core = PAP
										NOT = { is_core = owner }
										NOT = { province_rome_trigger = yes }
									}
									PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 400 } }
								}
								set_country_flag = excommunication_papal_states
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 500 } }
									OR = {
										has_country_flag = excommunication_unjust_war
										AND = {
											war_with = ROOT
											NOT = { defensive_war_with = ROOT }
										}
									}
								}
								set_country_flag = excommunication_unjust_war
							}
							if = {
								limit = { has_country_flag = excommunication_usurp_church }
								set_country_flag = excommunication_church
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 400 } }
									any_ally = {
										NOT = { religion_group = christian }
										is_free_or_tributary_trigger = yes
										any_country = { war_with = PREV religion = catholic }
									}
								}
								set_country_flag = excommunication_heathen_ally
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 400 } }
									NOT = { piety = -0.40 }
									NOT = { has_country_flag = catholic_blasphemy } #Never expires - only once
								}
								set_country_flag = excommunication_blasphemy
							}
							PREV = { country_event = { id = dg_pope.027 days = 0 } }
						}
					}
				}
				
				#Hussite origin story
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { is_year = 1400 }
						PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						OR = {
							ENG = { marriage_with = BOH }
							ENG = { alliance_with = BOH }
							BOH = { ai = no }
							BOH = { any_neighbor_country = { ai = no } }
						}
					}
					PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
					random_province = {
						limit = {
							culture = czech
							university_province_trigger = yes
						}
						set_province_flag = lollardy_spreads
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { is_religion_enabled = hussite }
						is_year = 1398
						PAP = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						NOT = { BOH = { any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = hussite_origins } } }
						has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = lollardy_spreads } }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = lollardy_spreads }
							clr_province_flag = lollardy_spreads
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
						is_year = 1400
						NOT = { is_religion_enabled = hussite }
						PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = { tag = BOH }
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							NOT = { government = papal_government }
							any_owned_province = {
								has_owner_culture = yes
								university_province_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						set_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							NOT = { government = papal_government }
							any_owned_province = {
								has_owner_culture = yes
								university_province_trigger = yes
								is_part_of_hre = yes
							}
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 2 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							NOT = { government = monarchy }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -3 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							hussite = 1
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							NOT = { hussite = -2 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							is_elector = yes
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							is_emperor = yes
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							any_neighbor_country = { religion = catholic }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							any_neighbor_country = { NOT = { religion = catholic } }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							is_subject_other_than_tributary_trigger = yes
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT NOT = { religion = catholic } }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = -1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							any_neighbor_country = { is_elector = yes }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							num_of_cities = 12
							NOT = { num_of_cities = 16 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							num_of_cities = 10
							NOT = { num_of_cities = 18 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							num_of_cities = 8
							NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							num_of_cities = 6
							NOT = { num_of_cities = 22 }
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
								has_owner_culture = yes
								value = 4
							}
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							marriage_with = ENG
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							alliance_with = ENG
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							junior_union_with = ENG
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
							senior_union_with = ENG
						}
						change_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 1 }
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 14 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 13 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 12 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 11 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 10 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 9 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 8 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 7 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 6 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 5 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 4 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = dei_gratia_history
							check_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 3 }
							PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined } }
						}
						PAP = { set_country_flag = hussite_origins_determined }
						random_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								university_province_trigger = yes
								has_owner_culture = yes
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hussite.009 days = 0 }
						}
					}
					every_country = { set_variable = { which = hussite_potential value = 0 } }
				}
				#Royal Patronage
				PAP = {
					set_variable = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 0 }
					every_owned_province = {
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_1
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_2
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_3
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_4
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_5
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_6
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_7
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_8
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_9
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_10
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_11
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_12
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_13
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_14
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_15
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_16
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_17
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_18
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_19
						remove_province_modifier = patronato_real_20
					}
				}
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						is_colonial_nation = yes
						religion = catholic
						overlord = { has_country_flag = patronato_real religion = catholic }
					}
					PAP = { change_variable = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 1 } }
				}
				PAP = {
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 1 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_1 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 2 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_2 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 3 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_3 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 4 } } }
