						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_4 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 5 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_5 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 6 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_6 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 7 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_7 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 8 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_8 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 9 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_9 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 10 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_10 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 11 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_11 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 12 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_12 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 13 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_13 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 14 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_14 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 15 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_15 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 16 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_16 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 17 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_17 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 18 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_18 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { is_variable_equal = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 19 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_19 duration = -1 } } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { PAP = { check_variable = { which = royal_patronage_of_the_indies value = 20 } } }
						PAP = { capital_scope = { add_province_modifier = { name = patronato_real_20 duration = -1 } } }
					}
				}
				#Schisms
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = AVI
						AVI = { government = papal_government }
						exists = PAP
						PAP = { government = papal_government }
						NOT = { has_global_flag = catholic_schism }
					}
					set_global_flag = catholic_schism
					clr_global_flag = antipope_wins
					clr_global_flag = way_of_withdrawal
				}
				#Excommunication
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						PAP = {
							capital_scope = {
								controller = {
									NOT = { tag = PAP }
									religion = catholic
									is_excommunicated = no
									num_of_cardinals = 4
								}
							}
							NOT = { has_country_flag = threat_of_schism }
						}
						NOT = {
							exists = AVI
							AVI = { government = papal_government }
						}
						has_global_flag = living_pope
						PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 400 } }
					}
					PAP = { set_country_flag = threat_of_schism }
					PAP = { capital_scope = { controller = { country_event = { id = dg_papacy.026 days = 30 } } } }
					PAP = { country_event = { id = dg_papacy.025 days = 0 } }
				}
			}
			
			#Decides relationship of countries with the papacy
			if = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				set_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				if = {
					limit = { num_of_cardinals = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
					if = {
						limit = { num_of_cardinals = 3 }
						change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
						if = {
							limit = { num_of_cardinals = 5 }
							change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
							if = {
								limit = { num_of_cardinals = 7 }
								change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
								if = {
									limit = { num_of_cardinals = 9 }
									change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_opinion = { who = PAP value = -50 } } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							any_known_country = {
								is_papal_controller = yes
								has_opinion = { who = ROOT value = -50 }
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_opinion = { who = PAP value = 100 } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_known_country = {
							is_papal_controller = yes
							has_opinion = { who = ROOT value = 100 }
						}
					}
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { is_papal_controller = yes }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = support_antipope }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -4 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = support_roman_pope }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { owns = 2530 NOT = { tag = PAP } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_rival_country = { tag = PAP } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { is_enemy = PAP }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { alliance_with = PAP }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { war_with = PAP }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { truce_with = PAP }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_rival_country = { is_papal_controller = yes } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_known_country = { is_enemy = PREV is_papal_controller = yes } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_known_country = {
							is_papal_controller = yes
							war_with = PREV
						}
					}
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_known_country = {
							is_papal_controller = yes
							truce_with = PREV
						}
					}
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_known_country = {
							is_papal_controller = yes
							marriage_with = PREV
						}
					}
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_known_country = {
							is_papal_controller = yes
							alliance_with = PREV
						}
					}
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_known_country = {
							is_papal_controller = yes
							vassal_of = PREV
						}
					}
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_known_country = {
							is_papal_controller = yes
							overlord_of = PREV
						}
					}
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { piety = 0.20 }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
					if = {
						limit = { piety = 0.60 }
						change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { piety = -0.20 } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { piety = -0.60 } }
						change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { patriarch_authority = 0.60 }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
					if = {
						limit = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
						change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.20 } }
						change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = introduce_reformation }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = spread_reformation }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = patronato_real }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = constantine_donation_cf }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 3 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = concordat_with_vatican }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PAP modifier = disobeyed_religious_leader } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PAP modifier = obeyed_religious_leader } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PAP modifier = papacy_good } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = PAP modifier = papacy_great } }
					change_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 2 }
				}
				#assign a flag to denote relationship
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 } }
					}
					set_country_flag = enemy_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = rival_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = friend_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = ally_of_pope
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = -2 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 } }
					}
					clr_country_flag = enemy_of_pope
					set_country_flag = rival_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = friend_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = ally_of_pope
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 1 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 4 } }
					}
					clr_country_flag = enemy_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = rival_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = friend_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = ally_of_pope
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 4 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 7 } }
					}
					clr_country_flag = enemy_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = rival_of_pope
					set_country_flag = friend_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = ally_of_pope
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = papacy_relationship value = 7 }
					}
					clr_country_flag = rival_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = enemy_of_pope
					clr_country_flag = friend_of_pope
					set_country_flag = ally_of_pope
				}
			}
			
			## SET ARCHBISHOPRICS, PATRIARCHATES AND CENTERS OF PILGRIMAGE
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					religion = catholic
					NOT = { has_country_flag = excommunicated }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = catholic_archbishopric
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = catholic_archbishopric }
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = catholic_archbishopric duration = -1 }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = catholic_patriarchate
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = catholic_patriarchate }
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = catholic_patriarchate duration = -1 }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = catholic_pilgrimage
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage }
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = catholic_pilgrimage duration = -1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						NOT = { religion = catholic }
						has_country_flag = excommunicated
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = catholic_archbishopric }
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_archbishopric
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = catholic_patriarchate }
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_patriarchate
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage }
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = orthodox }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_modifier = orthodox_patriarchate
						owner = {
							is_subject_other_than_tributary_trigger = yes
							any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = orthodox_patriarchate } }
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_patriarchate
					add_province_modifier = { name = orthodox_archbishopric duration = -1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = hinduism }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = hinduism_four_drops
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = hinduism_four_drops value = 4 } } }
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { ai = no has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial } }
							province_event = { id = dg_hindu.041 days = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									owner = { ai = yes }
									owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial } }
								}
							}
							add_province_modifier = { name = hindu_pilgrimage duration = -1 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = hinduism_four_drops value = 4 } } } }
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { ai = no has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
							province_event = { id = dg_hindu.041 days = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									owner = { ai = yes }
									owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
								}
							}
							add_province_modifier = { name = hindu_pilgrimage duration = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 }
							change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
							hidden_effect = { owner = { change_variable = { which = hinduism_drops_seats value = 1 } } }
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 4 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 3 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 2 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 NOT = { piety = -0.20 } } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 1 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = hinduism_four_seats
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = hinduism_four_seats value = 4 } } }
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { ai = no has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial } }
							province_event = { id = dg_hindu.042 days = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									owner = { ai = yes }
									owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial } }
								}
							}
							add_province_modifier = { name = hindu_pilgrimage duration = -1 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = hinduism_four_seats value = 4 } } } }
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { ai = no has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
							province_event = { id = dg_hindu.042 days = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									owner = { ai = yes }
									owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
								}
							}
							add_province_modifier = { name = hindu_pilgrimage duration = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 }
							change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
							hidden_effect = { owner = { change_variable = { which = hinduism_drops_seats value = 1 } } }
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 4 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 3 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 2 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 NOT = { piety = -0.20 } } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 1 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = holy_city_of_varanasi
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = holy_city_of_varanasi } }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									ai = no
									has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
								}
							}
							province_event = { id = dg_hindu.043 days = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									owner = { ai = yes }
									owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial } }
								}
							}
							add_province_modifier = { name = hindu_pilgrimage duration = -1 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = holy_city_of_varanasi } } }
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { ai = no has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
							province_event = { id = dg_hindu.043 days = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									owner = { ai = yes }
									owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
								}
							}
							add_province_modifier = { name = hindu_pilgrimage duration = -1 }
							set_country_flag = holy_city_of_varanasi
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 8 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 6 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 4 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 NOT = { piety = -0.20 } } }
								owner = { add_prestige = 2 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { religion = hinduism } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage }
					remove_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owner = { religion = catholic }
							NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage } }
							NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { any_neighbor_province = { has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage } } }
						}
						AND = {
							owner = { religion = hinduism }
							NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage } }
							NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { any_neighbor_province = { has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage } } }
						}
						AND = {
							owner = { religion = orthodox }
							NOT = { has_province_modifier = lavra }
						}
						AND = {
							NOT = { owner = { religion = catholic } }
							NOT = { owner = { religion = hinduism } }
							NOT = { owner = { religion = orthodox } }
						}
					}
				}
				remove_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_province_flag = potential_pilgrimage_route }
					OR = {
						has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
						has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage
					}
					OR = {
						NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { has_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route } }
						NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { any_neighbor_province = { has_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route } } }
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = potential_pilgrimage_route
			}
			
			###CHECK RELIGION OF PROVINCES
			
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = dei_gratia }
				every_owned_province = {
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = assigned_religion } }
						clr_province_flag = frontier_church
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = { has_province_flag = catholic_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = protestant_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = reformed_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = orthodox_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = gnostic_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = hussite_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = coptic_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = chaldean_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = jewish_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = sunni_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = shiite_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = wahhabi_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = ibadi_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = druze_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = zoroastrian_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = adi_dharam_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = sikhism_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = jain_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = hinduism_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = confucianism_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = buddhism_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = shinto_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = mahayana_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = vajrayana_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = animism_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = shamanism_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = totemism_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = inti_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = nahuatl_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_province }
								NOT = { has_province_flag = pantheism_province }
							}
							trigger_switch = {
								on_trigger = religion
								catholic = {
									set_province_flag = catholic_province
									set_variable = { which = catholic value = 21 }
								}
								orthodox = {
									set_province_flag = orthodox_province
									set_variable = { which = orthodox value = 21 }
								}
								protestant = {
									set_province_flag = protestant_province
									set_variable = { which = protestant value = 21 }
								}
								reformed = {
									set_province_flag = reformed_province
									set_variable = { which = reformed value = 21 }
								}
								gnostic = {
									set_province_flag = gnostic_province
									set_variable = { which = gnostic value = 21 }
								}
								chaldean = {
									set_province_flag = chaldean_province
									set_variable = { which = chaldean value = 21 }
								}
								coptic = {
									set_province_flag = coptic_province
									set_variable = { which = coptic value = 21 }
								}
								hussite = {
									set_province_flag = hussite_province
									set_variable = { which = hussite value = 21 }
								}
								jewish = {
									set_province_flag = jewish_province
									set_variable = { which = jewish value = 21 }

									set_province_flag = sunni_province
									set_variable = { which = sunni value = 21 }

									set_province_flag = shiite_province

									set_province_flag = wahhabi_province
									set_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 21 }
								}
								druze = {
									set_province_flag = druze_province
									set_variable = { which = druze value = 21 }
								}

									set_province_flag = zoroastrian_province
									set_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 21 }
								}
								hinduism = {
									set_province_flag = hinduism_province
									set_variable = { which = hinduism value = 21 }
								}
								sikhism = {
									set_province_flag = sikhism_province
									set_variable = { which = sikhism value = 21 }
								}
								jain = {
									set_province_flag = jain_province
									set_variable = { which = jain value = 21 }
								}
								adi_dharam = {
									set_province_flag = adi_dharam_province
									set_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 21 }
								}

									set_province_flag = confucianism_province
									set_variable = { which = confucianism value = 21 }
								}
								buddhism = {
									set_province_flag = buddhism_province

								}

									set_province_flag = vajrayana_province

								}
								animism = {
									set_province_flag = animism_province
									set_variable = { which = animism value = 21 }
								}
								tengri_pagan_reformed = {
									set_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_province
									set_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 21 }
								}
								shamanism = {
									set_province_flag = shamanism_province
									set_variable = { which = shamanism value = 21 }
								}
								polynesian_religion = {
									set_province_flag = polynesian_religion_province
									set_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 21 }
								}
								west_african_pagan_reformed = {
									set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_province
									set_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 21 }
								}
								baltic_pagan_reformed = {
									set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_province
									set_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 21 }
								}
								norse_pagan_reformed = {
									set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_province
									set_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 21 }
								}
								slavic_pagan_reformed = {
									set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_province
									set_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 21 }
								}
								finnish_pagan_reformed = {
									set_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_province
									set_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 21 }
								}
								hellenic_pagan = {
									set_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_province
									set_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 21 }
								}
								inti = {
									set_province_flag = inti_province
									set_variable = { which = inti value = 21 }
								}
								nahuatl = {
									set_province_flag = nahuatl_province
									set_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 21 }
								}
								mesoamerican_religion = {
									set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_province
									set_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 21 }
								}
								pantheism = {
									set_province_flag = pantheism_province
									set_variable = { which = pantheism value = 21 }
								}
								totemism = {
									set_province_flag = totemism_province
									set_variable = { which = totemism value = 21 }
								}
							}
							### Add rewards for colonization
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										owner = { ai = yes }
										owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion = catholic } }
									owner = { add_papal_influence = 5 }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
									owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.3 } #1.2 total
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
									owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.3 }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
									owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.3 }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
									owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.3 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											owner = { ai = yes }
											owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion = catholic } }
									owner = { change_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 1 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
									owner = { change_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0.5 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
									owner = { change_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0.5 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
									owner = { change_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0.5 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
									owner = { change_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0.5 } }
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { #CHECK TO SEE IF THE RELIGION HAS CHANGED
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = { which = province_religion value = 1 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 } }
								check_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = converts value = 0 } }
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 0 } }
								check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 } }
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = religious_change
					}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { has_province_flag = religious_change } }
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = catholic_province NOT = { religion = catholic } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = orthodox_province NOT = { religion = orthodox } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = protestant_province NOT = { religion = protestant } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = reformed_province NOT = { religion = reformed } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = hussite_province NOT = { religion = hussite } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = coptic_province NOT = { religion = coptic } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = gnostic_province NOT = { religion = gnostic } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = chaldean_province NOT = { religion = chaldean } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = jewish_province NOT = { religion = jewish } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = sunni_province NOT = { religion = sunni } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = shiite_province NOT = { religion = shiite } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = wahhabi_province NOT = { religion = wahhabi } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = ibadi_province NOT = { religion = ibadi } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = druze_province NOT = { religion = druze } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = zoroastrian_province NOT = { religion = zoroastrian } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = sikhism_province NOT = { religion = sikhism } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = jain_province NOT = { religion = jain } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = hinduism_province NOT = { religion = hinduism } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = adi_dharam_province NOT = { religion = adi_dharam } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = confucianism_province NOT = { religion = confucianism } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = buddhism_province NOT = { religion = buddhism } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = vajrayana_province NOT = { religion = vajrayana } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = shinto_province NOT = { religion = shinto } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = mahayana_province NOT = { religion = mahayana } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = animism_province NOT = { religion = animism } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_province NOT = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = shamanism_province NOT = { religion = shamanism } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_province NOT = { religion = polynesian_religion } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_province NOT = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_province NOT = { religion = hellenic_pagan } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_province NOT = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_province NOT = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_province NOT = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_province NOT = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = nahuatl_province NOT = { religion = nahuatl } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_province NOT = { religion = mesoamerican_religion } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = inti_province NOT = { religion = inti } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = totemism_province NOT = { religion = totemism } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = pantheism_province NOT = { religion = pantheism } }
							set_province_flag = religious_conversion
						}
						### Effects of heretic conversion
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = religious_conversion
								NOT = { has_owner_religion = yes }
							}
							clr_province_flag = religious_conversion
							set_province_flag = religious_change
							change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
							if = {
								limit = { religion = catholic }
								change_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = orthodox }
								change_variable = { which = orthodox value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = orthodox value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = protestant }
								change_variable = { which = protestant value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = protestant value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = reformed }
								change_variable = { which = reformed value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = reformed value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = gnostic }
								change_variable = { which = gnostic value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = gnostic value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = hussite }
								change_variable = { which = hussite value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = hussite value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = coptic }
								change_variable = { which = coptic value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = coptic value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = chaldean }
								change_variable = { which = chaldean value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = chaldean value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = jewish }
								change_variable = { which = jewish value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = jewish value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = sunni }
								change_variable = { which = sunni value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = sunni value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {

								change_variable = { which = shiite value = 4 }

									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = shiite value = 4 }
								}

							if = {

								change_variable = { which = ibadi value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = ibadi value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {

								change_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 4 }

							}

								limit = { religion = adi_dharam }
								change_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 4 }

								}
							}
							if = {

								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = shinto value = 4 }

							}

									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = mahayana value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = vajrayana }
								change_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = animism }
								change_variable = { which = animism value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = animism value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
								change_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = shamanism }
								change_variable = { which = shamanism value = 4 }

									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = shamanism value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
								change_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = totemism }
								change_variable = { which = totemism value = 4 }

									change_variable = { which = pantheism value = 4 }

							}
							if = {

								change_variable = { which = inti value = 4 }

									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = inti value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = nahuatl }
								change_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = mesoamerican_religion }
								change_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = polynesian_religion }
								change_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = hellenic_pagan }
								change_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
								change_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
								change_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
								change_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
								change_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion_group = PREV } }
									change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -4 }
									change_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
								}
							}
						}
						### Effects of conversion
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = religious_conversion has_owner_religion = yes }
							clr_province_flag = religious_conversion
							set_province_flag = religious_change
							change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 4 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 4 }
							if = {
								limit = { is_capital = yes } #Capitals are easier to convert to prevent the AI from flip-flopping
								change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 4 }
								change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 4 }
							}
							### Add rewards for conversion
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										owner = { ai = yes }
										owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion = catholic } }
									owner = { add_papal_influence = 5 }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
									owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.3 }
									if = {
										limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
										owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.3 }
										if = {
											limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
											owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.3 }
											if = {
												limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
												owner = { add_legitimacy = 0.3 } #1.2 total
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											owner = { ai = yes }
											owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_major } }
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { religion = catholic } }
									owner = { change_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 1 } }
								}
								if = {
									limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
									owner = { change_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0.5 } }
									if = {
										limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
										owner = { change_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0.5 } }
										if = {
											limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
											owner = { change_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0.5 } }
											if = {
												limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
												owner = { change_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0.5 } }
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					
					if = {
						limit = { has_province_flag = religious_change }
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									NOT = { check_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 } }
									check_variable = { which = province_religion value = 1 }
								}
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_province_flag
							catholic_province = {
								change_variable = { which = catholic which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							orthodox_province = {
								change_variable = { which = orthodox which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							protestant_province = {
								change_variable = { which = protestant which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							reformed_province = {
								change_variable = { which = reformed which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							chaldean_province = {
								change_variable = { which = chaldean which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							coptic_province = {
								change_variable = { which = coptic which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							hussite_province = {
								change_variable = { which = hussite which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							gnostic_province = {
								change_variable = { which = gnostic which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							jewish_province = {
								change_variable = { which = jewish which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							sunni_province = {
								change_variable = { which = sunni which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							shiite_province = {
								change_variable = { which = shiite which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							ibadi_province = {
								change_variable = { which = ibadi which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							wahhabi_province = {

								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							druze_province = {

							zoroastrian_province = {

							}
							hinduism_province = {

								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }

							}

							}
							mahayana_province = {

								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							vajrayana_province = {

							}
							totemism_province = {
								change_variable = { which = totemism which = province_religion }

							}

							}

							}
							nahuatl_province = {
								change_variable = { which = nahuatl which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}

								change_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							animism_province = {
								change_variable = { which = animism which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							tengri_pagan_reformed_province = {
								change_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							shamanism_province = {
								change_variable = { which = shamanism which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							west_african_pagan_reformed_province = {
								change_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							polynesian_religion_province = {
								change_variable = { which = polynesian_religion which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							hellenic_pagan_province = {
								change_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							slavic_pagan_reformed_province = {
								change_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							baltic_pagan_reformed_province = {
								change_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							norse_pagan_reformed_province = {
								change_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
							finnish_pagan_reformed_province = {
								change_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed which = province_religion }
								set_variable = { which = province_religion value = 0 }
							}
						}
					}
					# check to see if foreign missionaries have succeeded
					if = {
						limit = { has_province_flag = foreign_missionary }
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_modifier = missionary_obstruction }
							random_list = {
								60 = {
									hidden_effect = {
										set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
										add_base_unrest = yes
									}
									custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
								}
								40 = {
									remove_province_modifier = missionary_obstruction
									remove_province_modifier = foreign_missionary
									remove_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										has_province_modifier = foreign_missionary
										has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
									}
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = catholic_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = protestant_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = reformed_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = gnostic_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = hussite_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = orthodox_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = coptic_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = chaldean_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = sunni_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = shiite_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = druze_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = ibadi_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = wahhabi_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = hinduism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = sikhism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = jain_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = adi_dharam_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = zoroastrian_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = confucianism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = buddhism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = shinto_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = mahayana_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = vajrayana_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = jewish_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = nahuatl_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = inti_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = totemism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = pantheism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = animism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = shamanism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = polynesian_religion_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_missionary_active
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_modifier = foreign_missionary }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = catholic_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = protestant_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = reformed_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = gnostic_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = hussite_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = orthodox_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = coptic_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }

								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = chaldean_missionary_active }

							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = jain_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = jain value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = zoroastrian_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = adi_dharam_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = confucianism_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = confucianism value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy

						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = buddhism_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }

							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = vajrayana_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = jewish_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = jewish value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = nahuatl_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = mesoamerican_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = inti_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = inti value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = pantheism_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = pantheism value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = totemism_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = totemism value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = animism_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = animism value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = shamanism_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = shamanism value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_missionary_active }
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
								change_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = assigned_religion }
					}
					set_country_flag = assigned_religion
				}
				# If the province is undergoing a conversion of minorities, check to see if it succeeds this time
				
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_flag = religious_change }
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
							check_variable = { which = pantheism value = 11 }
							owner = { NOT = { religion = pantheism } }
						}
						subtract_variable = { which = pantheism which = converted_heathens }
						change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heathens }
						set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
						random_neighbor_province = { change_variable = { which = pantheism value = 1 } change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
							check_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 11 }
							owner = { NOT = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed } }
						}
						subtract_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed which = converted_heathens }
						change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heathens }
						set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
						random_neighbor_province = { change_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 1 } change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
							check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 11 }
							owner = { NOT = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed } }
						}
						subtract_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed which = converted_heathens }
						change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heathens }
						set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
						random_neighbor_province = { change_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 1 } change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
							check_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 11 }
							owner = { NOT = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } }
						}
						subtract_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed which = converted_heathens }
						change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heathens }
						set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
						random_neighbor_province = { change_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 1 } change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
							check_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 11 }
							owner = { NOT = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed } }
						}
						subtract_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed which = converted_heathens }
						change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heathens }
						set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
						random_neighbor_province = { change_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 1 } change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
							check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 11 }
							owner = { NOT = { religion = hellenic_pagan } }
						}
						subtract_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan which = converted_heathens }
						change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heathens }
						set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
						random_neighbor_province = { change_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 1 }
							change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
							check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 11 }
							owner = { NOT = { religion = polynesian_religion } }
						}
						subtract_variable = { which = polynesian_religion which = converted_heathens }
						change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heathens }
						set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
						random_neighbor_province = { change_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 1 } change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
							check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 11 }
							owner = { NOT = { religion = adi_dharam } }
						}
						subtract_variable = { which = adi_dharam which = converted_heathens }
						change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heathens }
						set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
						random_neighbor_province = { change_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 1 } change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
							check_variable = { which = totemism value = 11 }
							owner = { NOT = { religion = totemism } }
						}
						subtract_variable = { which = totemism which = converted_heathens }
						change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heathens }
						set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
						random_neighbor_province = { change_variable = { which = totemism value = 1 } change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 } }
					}

							check_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }

					## Conversion of Heretics
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { religion_group = european_pagan } }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 11 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed } }
							}
							subtract_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed which = converted_heretics }
							change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heretics }
							set_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 11 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed } }
							}
							subtract_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed which = converted_heretics }
							change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heretics }
							set_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 0 }
						}

							limit = {

							}
							subtract_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed which = converted_heretics }
							change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heretics }
							set_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 0 }
						}
