							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 4 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = buddhism } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = buddhism value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 4 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = confucianism } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = confucianism value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 2 }
								check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = mahayana } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = mahayana value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 2 }
								check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = vajrayana } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = vajrayana value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 2 }
								check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = buddhism } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = buddhism value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 2 }
								check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 2 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = confucianism } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = confucianism value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 1 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = mahayana } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = mahayana value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 1 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = vajrayana } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = vajrayana value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 1 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = buddhism } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = buddhism value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 1 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = confucianism } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = confucianism value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { religion_group = jewish_group } }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = jewish value = 11 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = jewish } }
							}
							subtract_variable = { which = jewish which = converted_heretics }
							change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heretics }
							set_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = jewish value = 8 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = jewish } }
							}
							subtract_variable = { which = jewish which = converted_heretics }
							change_variable = { which = converts which = converted_heretics }
							set_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 4 }
								check_variable = { which = jewish value = 4 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = jewish } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = jewish value = -4 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -4 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 4 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 2 }
								check_variable = { which = jewish value = 4 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = jewish } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = jewish value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = jewish value = 4 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = jewish } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = jewish value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 2 }
								check_variable = { which = jewish value = 2 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = jewish } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = jewish value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -2 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = jewish value = 1 }
								NOT = { owner = { religion = jewish } }
							}
							change_variable = { which = jewish value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = -1 }
							change_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_province_flag = religious_change
							check_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = converts value = 0 } }
						}
					}
					#Adding converts to the state religion
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = converts value = 0 } }
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { religion = catholic } }
							change_variable = { which = catholic which = converts }
							set_variable = { which = converts value = 0 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { religion = orthodox } }
							change_variable = { which = orthodox which = converts }
							set_variable = { which = converts value = 0 }

							change_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed which = converts }
							set_variable = { which = converts value = 0 }

							change_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed which = converts }
							set_variable = { which = converts value = 0 }

						if = {
							limit = { owner = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } }
							change_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed which = converts }
							set_variable = { which = converts value = 0 }

							set_variable = { which = converts value = 0 }

						}
						if = {
							limit = { owner = { religion = inti } }
							change_variable = { which = inti which = converts }
							set_variable = { which = converts value = 0 }
						}
					}
					## DOMINANT RELIGION SET
					#xxx
					# Changes province religion to the dominant religion there (in case of ties, to the oldest surviving organized religion in its current form)
					if = {
						limit = { has_province_flag = religious_change }
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 11 } }
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { religion = hinduism } }
								change_religion = hinduism
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 11 } }
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { religion = jewish } }
								change_religion = jewish
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 11 } }
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { religion = zoroastrian } }
								change_religion = zoroastrian
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 11 } }
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { religion = jain } }
								change_religion = jain
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 11 } }
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { religion = confucianism } }
								change_religion = confucianism
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 11 } }
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { religion = buddhism } }
								change_religion = buddhism
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 11 } }
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { religion = vajrayana } }
								change_religion = vajrayana
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = shinto value = 11 } }
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { religion = shinto } }
								change_religion = shinto
							}

						if = {

						}
						mesoamerican_religion = {
							set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_province
						}
						pantheism = {
							set_province_flag = pantheism_province
						}
						totemism = {
							set_province_flag = totemism_province
						}
					}
					set_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 0 }
				}
				
				# Player rewards for conversion
				
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = converts value = 1 }
						owner = { ai = no }
						owner = { has_country_flag = religious_news_major }
						NOT = { owner = { any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = expelled_minority } } } #Handled by dg_turmoil.050
					}
					set_province_flag = converted_province
					owner = { country_event = { id = dg_conversion.004 days = 0 } }
				}
				
				#Conversion by expulsion instead
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = expelled_minority } }
					country_event = { id = dg_turmoil.050 days = 0 }
				}
				
				#Applying religious minority modifiers
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						is_city = yes
					}
					province_event = { id = dg_conversion.99 }
				}
				
				# Minority event code
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = christian_population value = 0.1 } }

						limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 0.1 } }

							}

							any_owned_province = { #Has a true pagan minority
								OR = {
									check_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = inti value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = totemism value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = pantheism value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = animism value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = shamanism value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 4 }
									AND = {
										check_variable = { which = shinto value = 4 }
										NOT = { owner = { religion = mahayana } }
									}
									AND = {
										check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 4 }
										NOT = { owner = { religion = hinduism } }
										NOT = { owner = { religion = jain } }
									}
								}
								has_owner_religion = yes
								NOT = { has_province_modifier = syncretism }
								has_missionary = no
							}
							NOT = { religion_group = new_world_pagan } #Not pagan
							NOT = { religion_group = pagan }
							NOT = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							is_force_converted = no
						}
						if = {
							limit = { is_colonial_nation = yes }
							if = {
								limit = { capital_scope = { religion_group = new_world_pagan } }
								country_event = { id = dg_conversion.018 days = 1 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { capital_scope = { religion_group = new_world_pagan } } }
								random = {
									chance = 40
									country_event = { id = dg_conversion.018 days = 1 }
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { NOT = { is_colonial_nation = yes } }
							random = {
								chance = 20
								country_event = { id = dg_conversion.018 days = 1 }
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = animism_population value = 0.1 } }
						random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = animism_minority_event }
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = animism_population value = 1 } }
							random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = animism_minority_event }
							if = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = animism_population value = 5 } }
								random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = animism_minority_event }
								if = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = animism_population value = 10 } }
									random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = animism_minority_event }
									if = {

										if = {
											limit = { check_variable = { which = animism_population value = 20 } }
											random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = animism_minority_event }
											if = {

														if = {
															limit = { check_variable = { which = animism_population value = 40 } }
															random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = animism_minority_event }
														}
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = animism_minority_event }
							clr_country_flag = animism_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.320 days = 5 random = 15 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 0.1 } }
						random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 1 } }
							random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
							if = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 5 } }
								random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
								if = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 10 } }
									random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
									if = {
										limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 15 } }
										random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
										if = {
											limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 20 } }
											random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
											if = {
												limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 25 } }
												random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
												if = {
													limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 30 } }
													random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
													if = {

											random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event }
											if = {
												limit = { check_variable = { which = nahuatl_population value = 25 } }
												random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event }
												if = {
													limit = { check_variable = { which = nahuatl_population value = 30 } }
													random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event }
													if = {
														limit = { check_variable = { which = nahuatl_population value = 35 } }
														random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event }
														if = {
															limit = { check_variable = { which = nahuatl_population value = 40 } }
															random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event }
														}
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event }
							clr_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.325 days = 5 random = 15 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 0.1 } }
						random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 1 } }
							random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }
							if = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 5 } }
								random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }
								if = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 10 } }
									random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }
									if = {
										limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 15 } }
										random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }
										if = {
											limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 20 } }
											random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }
											if = {
												limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 25 } }
												random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }
												if = {
													limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 30 } }
													random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }

														limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 35 } }
														random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }

															random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event }
														}
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}

							clr_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.337 days = 5 random = 15 }
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 0.1 } }

							limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 1 } }
							random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event }
							if = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 5 } }

								if = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 10 } }
									random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event }
									if = {
										limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 15 } }
										random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event }
										if = {
											limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 20 } }
											random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event }
											if = {
												limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 25 } }
												random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event }
												if = {
													limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 30 } }
													random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event }
													if = {
														limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 35 } }
														random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event }
														if = {
															limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 40 } }
															random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event }
														}
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}

							limit = { has_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event }
							clr_country_flag = pantheism_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.334 days = 5 random = 15 }
						}
					}

						limit = { check_variable = { which = totemism_population value = 0.1 } }
						random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = totemism_minority_event }
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = totemism_population value = 1 } }
							random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = totemism_minority_event }
							if = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = totemism_population value = 5 } }

									limit = { check_variable = { which = totemism_population value = 10 } }

											if = {

						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = european_pagan_population value = 0.1 } }
					###RELIGIOUS SYNCRETISM
					if = {
						limit = {
							any_owned_province = { #Has a true pagan minority
								OR = {
									check_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = inti value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = totemism value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = pantheism value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = animism value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = shamanism value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 4 }
									check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 4 }
									AND = {
										check_variable = { which = shinto value = 4 }
										NOT = { owner = { religion = mahayana } }
									}
									AND = {
										check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 4 }
										NOT = { owner = { religion = hinduism } }
										NOT = { owner = { religion = jain } }
									}
								}
								has_owner_religion = yes
								NOT = { has_province_modifier = syncretism }
								has_missionary = no
							}
							NOT = { religion_group = new_world_pagan } #Not pagan
							NOT = { religion_group = pagan }
							NOT = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							is_force_converted = no
						}
						if = {
							limit = { is_colonial_nation = yes }
							if = {
								limit = { capital_scope = { religion_group = new_world_pagan } }
								country_event = { id = dg_conversion.018 days = 1 }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { capital_scope = { religion_group = new_world_pagan } } }
								random = {
									chance = 40
									country_event = { id = dg_conversion.018 days = 1 }
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { NOT = { is_colonial_nation = yes } }
							random = {
								chance = 20
								country_event = { id = dg_conversion.018 days = 1 }
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 0.1 } }
						random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_minority_event }
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 1 } }
							random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_minority_event }
							if = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 5 } }
								random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_minority_event }
								if = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 10 } }
									random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_minority_event }
									if = {
										limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 15 } }
										random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_minority_event }
										if = {
											limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 20 } }
											random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_minority_event }
											if = {
												limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 25 } }
												random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_minority_event }
												if = {
													limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 30 } }
													random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_minority_event }
													if = {
														limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 35 } }
														random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_minority_event }
														if = {
															limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 40 } }

														}

												}

					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 0.1 } }
						random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
						if = {
							limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 1 } }
							random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
							if = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 5 } }
								random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
								if = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 10 } }
									random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
									if = {
										limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 15 } }
										random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
										if = {
											limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 20 } }
											random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
											if = {
												limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 25 } }
												random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
												if = {
													limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 30 } }
													random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
													if = {
														limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 35 } }
														random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
														if = {
															limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 40 } }
															random = { chance = 20 set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
														}
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event }
							clr_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.332 days = 5 random = 15 }
						}
					}
				}
				
				###SET STATE RELIGION FLAGS
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = catholic_state }
								religion = catholic
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = gnostic_state }
								religion = gnostic
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = hussite_state }
								religion = hussite
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = protestant_state }
								religion = protestant
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = reformed_state }
								religion = reformed
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = orthodox_state }
								religion = orthodox
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = coptic_state }
								religion = coptic
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = chaldean_state }
								religion = chaldean
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = sunni_state }
								religion = sunni
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = shiite_state }
								religion = shiite
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = druze_state }
								religion = druze
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = ibadi_state }
								religion = ibadi
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = wahhabi_state }
								religion = wahhabi
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = hinduism_state }
								religion = hinduism
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = sikhism_state }
								religion = sikhism
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = zoroastrian_state }
								religion = zoroastrian
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = jain_state }
								religion = jain
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = buddhism_state }
								religion = buddhism
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = shinto_state }
								religion = shinto
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = mahayana_state }
								religion = mahayana
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = confucianism_state }
								religion = confucianism
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = vajrayana_state }
								religion = vajrayana
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = jewish_state }
								religion = jewish
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = animism_state }
								religion = animism
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_state }
								religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = shamanism_state }
								religion = shamanism
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = nahuatl_state }
								religion = nahuatl
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_state }
								religion = mesoamerican_religion
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = inti_state }
								religion = inti
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = totemism_state }
								religion = totemism
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_state }
								religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = adi_dharam_state }
								religion = adi_dharam
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = polynesian_religion_state }
								religion = polynesian_religion
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = pantheism_state }
								religion = pantheism
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_state }
								religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_state }
								religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_state }
								religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_state }
								religion = norse_pagan_reformed
							}
							AND = {
								NOT = { has_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_state }
								religion = hellenic_pagan
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { #New vassals may be forced to take their overlord's religion
							had_global_flag = { flag = dei_gratia days = 365 }
							is_subject_other_than_tributary_trigger = yes
							ai = yes
							overlord = { NOT = { religion = ROOT } }
						}
						overlord = { country_event = { id = dg_conversion.050 days = 0 } }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_free_or_tributary_trigger = yes
								ai = no
								NOT = { had_global_flag = { flag = dei_gratia days = 30 } }
								overlord = { religion = ROOT }
							}
						}
						country_event = { id = dg_conversion.003 days = 15 } #The True Faith
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_colonial_nation = yes
							NOT = { religion_group = pagan }
							NOT = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
							NOT = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							OR = {
								any_owned_province = { religion_group = pagan }
								any_owned_province = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
								any_owned_province = { religion_group = european_pagan }
							}
						}
						country_event = { id = dg_conversion.018 days = 0 }
					}
				}
				
				# Check to see if a minority is being expelled - done after the last step to allow travel time
				
				# Check to see if a pre-existing expulsion is not finished yet
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = expulsion #Has remaining refugees from a past expulsion (either too many at once or some were refused)
					}
					#Checks each religion to see if the country has any refugees from past expulsions remaining
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_catholic
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_catholic
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = orthodox_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_orthodox
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_orthodox
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = chaldean_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_chaldean
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_chaldean
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = coptic_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_coptic
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_coptic
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = hussite_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_hussite
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_hussite
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = gnostic_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_gnostic
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_gnostic
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = protestant_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_protestant
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_protestant
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = reformed_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_reformed
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_reformed
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = jewish_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_jewish
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_jewish
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = sunni_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_sunni
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_sunni
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = shiite_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_shiite
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_shiite
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = ibadi_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_ibadi
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {

					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_wahhabi
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {

					if = {

						set_country_flag = expulsion_druze
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {

					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = zoroastrian_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_zoroastrian
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {

					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = hinduism_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_hinduism

					else = {

						set_country_flag = expulsion_sikhism
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }

					else = {

					if = {

						set_country_flag = expulsion_jain
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_jain
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = buddhism_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_buddhism
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }

					else = {

					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_vajrayana
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_vajrayana
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = mahayana_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_mahayana
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_mahayana
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = confucianism_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_confucianism
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {

					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = inti_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_inti
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_inti
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = nahuatl_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_nahuatl
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_nahuatl
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = totemism_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_totemism
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_totemism
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = pantheism_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_pantheism
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_pantheism
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_mesoamerican_religion
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_mesoamerican_religion
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_hellenic_pagan
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_hellenic_pagan
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_norse_pagan_reformed
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_norse_pagan_reformed
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_slavic_pagan_reformed
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_slavic_pagan_reformed
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_finnish_pagan_reformed
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_finnish_pagan_reformed
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_baltic_pagan_reformed
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_baltic_pagan_reformed
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = shinto_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_shinto
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_shinto
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = adi_dharam_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_adi_dharam
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_adi_dharam
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = animism_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_animism
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_animism
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = shamanism_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_shamanism
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_shamanism
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_tengri_pagan_reformed
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_tengri_pagan_reformed
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_west_african_pagan_reformed
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_west_african_pagan_reformed
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion_refugees value = 1 } }
						set_country_flag = expulsion_polynesian_religion
						capital_scope = { set_province_flag = expelled_minority }
						change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 1 }
					}
					else = {
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_polynesian_religion
					}
					#Checks to make sure there is only one expelled religion at a time; if more than one present, removes arbitrarily until only one
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 } }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_catholic
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_catholic
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_orthodox
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_orthodox
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_chaldean
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_chaldean
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_coptic
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_coptic
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_hussite
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_hussite
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_gnostic
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_gnostic
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_protestant
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_protestant
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_reformed
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_reformed
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_jewish
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_jewish
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_sunni
								NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_sunni }
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_sunni
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_shiite
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_shiite
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_ibadi
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_ibadi
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_wahhabi
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_wahhabi
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_druze
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_druze

							}

								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }

							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_west_african_pagan_reformed
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }

							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 2 }
								has_country_flag = expulsion_polynesian_religion
							}
							clr_country_flag = expulsion_polynesian_religion
							change_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = -1 }
						}
					}
					#Cleanup
					set_variable = { which = expelled_religions value = 0 }
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening } #Takes precedence
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_catholic
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_gnostic
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_orthodox
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_chaldean
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_hussite
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_protestant
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_reformed
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_coptic
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_sunni
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_shiite
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_druze
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_ibadi
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_wahhabi
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_confucianism
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_shinto
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_mahayana
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_buddhism
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_vajrayana
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_hinduism
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_jain
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_zoroastrian
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_sikhism
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_jewish
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_totemism
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_animism
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_west_african_pagan_reformed
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_tengri_pagan_reformed
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_shamanism
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_nahuatl
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_mesoamerican_religion
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_inti
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_baltic_pagan_reformed
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_pantheism
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_finnish_pagan_reformed
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_norse_pagan_reformed
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_slavic_pagan_reformed
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_hellenic_pagan
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_adi_dharam
						clr_country_flag = expulsion_polynesian_religion
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_catholic }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_catholic
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_orthodox }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_orthodox
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_coptic }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_coptic
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_chaldean }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_chaldean
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_gnostic }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_gnostic
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hussite }

							set_country_flag = expulsion_reformed

							set_country_flag = expulsion_ibadi

							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_wahhabi }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_wahhabi
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_druze }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_druze

						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hinduism }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_hinduism

						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_zoroastrian }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_zoroastrian

						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_sikhism }

							set_country_flag = expulsion_nahuatl

						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_totemism }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_totemism
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_pantheism }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_pantheism
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hellenic_pagan }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_hellenic_pagan
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_slavic_pagan_reformed }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_slavic_pagan_reformed
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_baltic_pagan_reformed }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_baltic_pagan_reformed

							set_country_flag = expulsion_adi_dharam
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_tengri_pagan_reformed }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_tengri_pagan_reformed
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_shamanism }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_shamanism
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_animism }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_animism
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_west_african_pagan_reformed }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_west_african_pagan_reformed
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_polynesian_religion }
							set_country_flag = expulsion_polynesian_religion
						}
					}
				}
				# Religious Minorities are expelled and converted
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_heretics
						had_country_flag = { flag = religious_turmoil_heretics days = 500 }
						NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = heretics value = 2 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						change_variable = { which = heretics value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_catholic
						had_country_flag = { flag = religious_turmoil_catholic days = 700 } #Time for related events (tithes, appeals)
						NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war } #Minorities do not flee during a War of Religion
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 20% of the population of the province
						change_variable = { which = catholic value = -4 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 4 }
						dg_remove_10_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 10% of the population
						change_variable = { which = catholic value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						dg_remove_5_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = { which = refugees_production value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_tax value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_manpower value = 1 }
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = expulsion_catholic
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_orthodox
						had_country_flag = { flag = religious_turmoil_orthodox days = 700 } #Time for related events (tithes, appeals)
						NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war } #Minorities do not flee during a War of Religion
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 4 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 20% of the population of the province
						change_variable = { which = orthodox value = -4 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 4 }
						dg_remove_10_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 10% of the population
						change_variable = { which = orthodox value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						dg_remove_5_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = { which = refugees_production value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_tax value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_manpower value = 1 }
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = expulsion_orthodox
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_chaldean
						had_country_flag = { flag = religious_turmoil_chaldean days = 700 } #Time for related events (tithes, appeals)
						NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war } #Minorities do not flee during a War of Religion
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 4 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 20% of the population of the province
						change_variable = { which = chaldean value = -4 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 4 }
						dg_remove_10_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 2 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 10% of the population
						change_variable = { which = chaldean value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						dg_remove_5_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = { which = refugees_production value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_tax value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_manpower value = 1 }
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = expulsion_chaldean
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_coptic
						had_country_flag = { flag = religious_turmoil_coptic days = 700 } #Time for related events (tithes, appeals)
						NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war } #Minorities do not flee during a War of Religion
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = coptic value = 4 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 20% of the population of the province
						change_variable = { which = coptic value = -4 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 4 }
						dg_remove_10_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 10% of the population
						change_variable = { which = coptic value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						dg_remove_5_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = { which = refugees_production value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_tax value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_manpower value = 1 }
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = expulsion_coptic
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_gnostic
						had_country_flag = { flag = religious_turmoil_gnostic days = 700 } #Time for related events (tithes, appeals)
						NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war } #Minorities do not flee during a War of Religion
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 4 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 20% of the population of the province
						change_variable = { which = gnostic value = -4 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 4 }
						dg_remove_10_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 10% of the population
						change_variable = { which = gnostic value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						dg_remove_5_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = { which = refugees_production value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_tax value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_manpower value = 1 }
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = expulsion_gnostic
					}
				}

						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 10% of the population
						change_variable = { which = buddhism value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						dg_remove_5_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = { which = refugees_production value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_tax value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_manpower value = 1 }
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = expulsion_buddhism
					}
				}

							check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 2 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 10% of the population
						change_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
						dg_remove_5_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = { which = refugees_production value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_tax value = 1 }
								check_variable = { which = refugees_manpower value = 1 }
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = expulsion_adi_dharam
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_animism
						had_country_flag = { flag = religious_turmoil_animism days = 700 } #Time for related events (tithes, appeals)
						NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war } #Minorities do not flee during a War of Religion
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
							check_variable = { which = animism value = 4 }
						}
						remove_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
						set_province_flag = expelled_minority
						#Converts 20% of the population of the province
						change_variable = { which = animism value = -4 }
						change_variable = { which = converts value = 4 }
						dg_remove_10_percent_of_population = yes #Half of the converts represent people leaving
					}

								set_variable = { which = confucianism_refugees_production value = 0 }
								change_variable = { which = refugees which = confucianism_refugees }
								set_variable = { which = confucianism_refugees value = 0 }
							}
							expulsion_inti = {
								change_variable = { which = refugees_manpower which = inti_refugees_manpower }
								set_variable = { which = inti_refugees_manpower value = 0 }
								change_variable = { which = refugees_tax which = inti_refugees_tax }
								set_variable = { which = inti_refugees_tax value = 0 }
								change_variable = { which = refugees_production which = inti_refugees_production }
