							expulsion_west_african_pagan_reformed = {
								change_variable = { which = refugees_manpower which = west_african_pagan_reformed_refugees_manpower }
								set_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_refugees_manpower value = 0 }
								change_variable = { which = refugees_tax which = west_african_pagan_reformed_refugees_tax }
								set_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_refugees_tax value = 0 }
								change_variable = { which = refugees_production which = west_african_pagan_reformed_refugees_production }
								set_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_refugees_production value = 0 }
								change_variable = { which = refugees which = west_african_pagan_reformed_refugees }
								set_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_refugees value = 0 }
							}
							expulsion_polynesian_religion = {
								change_variable = { which = refugees_manpower which = polynesian_religion_refugees_manpower }
								set_variable = { which = polynesian_religion_refugees_manpower value = 0 }
								change_variable = { which = refugees_tax which = polynesian_religion_refugees_tax }
								set_variable = { which = polynesian_religion_refugees_tax value = 0 }
								change_variable = { which = refugees_production which = polynesian_religion_refugees_production }
								set_variable = { which = polynesian_religion_refugees_production value = 0 }
								change_variable = { which = refugees which = polynesian_religion_refugees }
								set_variable = { which = polynesian_religion_refugees value = 0 }
							}
						}
					}
					country_event = { id = dg_refugees.011 days = 0 }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics } }
					clr_province_flag = expelled_minority
				}
			}
			###PLAYER-ONLY INVISIBLE EVENTS (IF PREFERRING TO IGNORE RELIGION)
			if = {
				limit = { ai = no NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial } }
				if = {
					limit = { religion = catholic }
					if = { #Monasticism
						limit = {
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = monastic_decline value = 5 } }
							piety = -0.60
							NOT = { has_country_flag = excommunicated }
						}
						every_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 }
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										has_province_modifier = augustinian_order
										has_province_modifier = dominican_order
										has_province_modifier = cistercian_order
										has_province_modifier = franciscan_order
										has_province_modifier = jesuit_order
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									any_neighbor_province = {
										owned_by = ROOT
										OR = {
											has_province_modifier = augustinian_order
											has_province_modifier = dominican_order
											has_province_modifier = cistercian_order
											has_province_modifier = franciscan_order
											has_province_modifier = jesuit_order
										}
									}
								}
							}
							random = {
								chance = 1
								random_list = {
									20 = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												religion = catholic
												OR = {
													has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
													trade_goods = wine
													grain_province_trigger = yes
													trade_goods = wool
												}
												NOT = { urban_province_trigger = yes }
												owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = monastic_decline value = 4 } } }
											}
											add_province_modifier = { name = augustinian_order duration = 10000 }
										}
									}
									20 = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												urban_province_trigger = yes
												NOT = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 20 } }
												owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = monastic_decline value = 3 } } }
											}
											add_province_modifier = { name = dominican_order duration = 10000 }
										}
									}
									20 = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												owner = { check_variable = { which = jesuit_support value = 1 } }
												OR = {
													NOT = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 20 } }
													is_capital = yes
													university_province_trigger = yes
													has_province_modifier = catholic_archbishopric
													has_province_modifier = catholic_prelate
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = { name = jesuit_order duration = 10000 }
										}
									}
									20 = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												OR = {
													AND = {
														urban_province_trigger = yes
														religion = catholic
													}
													has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
													university_province_trigger = yes #Many teaching friars
													AND = {
														is_colony = yes #Missions in New Spain and the Maya
														NOT = { urban_province_trigger = yes }
													}
													has_province_modifier = catholic_patriarchate #Custodians of the Holy Land
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = { name = franciscan_order duration = 10000 }
										}
									}
									20 = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = monastic_decline value = 2 } } }
												OR = {
													has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
													NOT = { urban_province_trigger = yes }
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = { name = cistercian_order duration = 10000 }
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { #Church corruption
						limit = {
							OR = {
								piety = -0.60
								PAP = { check_variable = { which = papal_authority value = 400 } }
							}
							NOT = { has_country_flag = catholic_pragmatic_sanction }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = national_church }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = patronato_real }
							NOT = { government = theocracy }
						}
						every_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								continent = europe
								NOT = { has_province_modifier = greedy_bishop }
								NOT = { has_province_modifier = absentee_bishop }
								NOT = { has_province_modifier = effective_bishop }
							}
							random = {
								chance = 1
								random_list = {
									25 = { #Simony
										if = {
											limit = {
												NOT = {
													AND = {
														PAP = { has_country_flag = simony_abolished }
														PAP = { has_country_flag = annate_abolished }
													}
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = { name = greedy_bishop duration = 2000 }
											owner = { set_country_flag = simony }
											PAP = { add_treasury = 5 }
											set_province_flag = simony_province
											every_neighbor_province = {
												limit = {
													culture = PREV
													has_owner_culture = yes
													owner = {
														religion = catholic
														NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
														ai = yes
													}
												}
												owner = { set_country_flag = simony }
											}
											if = {
												limit = { is_year = 1375 }
												if = { #Invention of the printing press in 1450 allows for much faster and cheaper communication of problems
													limit = { NOT = { owner = { adm_tech = 2 } } }
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = { NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant } }
															PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_simony value = 0.03 } }
														}
													}
													owner = { add_reform_desire = 0.0003 }
												}
												if = {
													limit = { owner = { adm_tech = 2 } }
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = { NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant } }
															PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_simony value = 0.1 } }
														}
													}
													owner = { add_reform_desire = 0.001 }
												}
												hidden_effect = {
													if = {
														limit = {
															has_global_flag = renaissance
															NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = reaction_to_reformation } }
														}
														owner = { change_variable = { which = catholic_corruption value = 1 } }
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
									25 = { #Capable Bishop
										hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = absentee_bishop }
										add_province_modifier = { name = effective_bishop duration = 4000 }
										remove_province_modifier = religious_scandal_province
									}
									25 = { #Absenteeism
										if = {
											limit = {
												NOT = { urban_province_trigger = yes }
												PAP = {
													NOT = {
														AND = {
															has_country_flag = clerical_residence
															has_country_flag = seminaries
														}
													}
												}
											}
											if = {
												limit = { is_year = 1375 }
												if = { #Invention of the printing press in 1450 allows for much faster and cheaper communication of problems
													limit = { NOT = { owner = { adm_tech = 2 } } }
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = { NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant } }
															PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_absenteeism value = 0.03 } }
														}
													}
													owner = { add_reform_desire = 0.0003 }
												}
												if = {
													limit = { owner = { adm_tech = 2 } }
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = { NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant } }
															PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_absenteeism value = 0.1 } }
														}
													}
													owner = { add_reform_desire = 0.001 }
												}
												hidden_effect = {
													if = {
														limit = {
															has_global_flag = renaissance
															NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = reaction_to_reformation } }
														}
														owner = { change_variable = { which = catholic_corruption value = 1 } }
													}
												}
											}
											if = {
												limit = { owner = { NOT = { piety = -0.20 } } }
												add_province_modifier = { name = absentee_bishop duration = 1000 }
											}
											if = {
												limit = {
													owner = { NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
													owner = { piety = -0.20 }
												}
												add_province_modifier = { name = absentee_bishop duration = 2000 }
											}
											if = {
												limit = {
													owner = { NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
													owner = { piety = 0.20 }
												}
												add_province_modifier = { name = absentee_bishop duration = 4000 }
											}
											if = {
												limit = {
													owner = { piety = 0.60 }
												}
												add_province_modifier = { name = absentee_bishop duration = 8000 }
											}
											hidden_effect = {
												set_province_flag = absentee_bishop
												owner = { set_country_flag = absenteeism }
												every_neighbor_province = {
													limit = {
														culture = PREV
														has_owner_culture = yes
														owner = {
															religion = catholic
															NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
															ai = yes
														}
													}
													owner = { set_country_flag = absenteeism }
												}
											}
										}
									}
									25 = { #Indulgence Peddler
										if = {
											limit = {
												PAP = { has_country_flag = indulgences_permitted }
												PAP = { NOT = { has_country_flag = indulgences_banned } }
											}
											PAP = { change_variable = { which = indulgences_sold value = 1 } }
											set_province_flag = indulgence_peddler
											if = {
												limit = { is_year = 1375 }
												if = { #Invention of the printing press in 1450 allows for much faster and cheaper communication of problems
													limit = { NOT = { owner = { adm_tech = 2 } } }
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = { NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant } }
															PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_indulgences value = 0.05 } }
														}
													}
													owner = { add_reform_desire = 0.0005 }
												}
												if = {
													limit = { owner = { adm_tech = 2 } }
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = { NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant } }
															PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_indulgences value = 0.15 } }
														}
													}
													owner = { add_reform_desire = 0.0015 }
												}
												hidden_effect = {
													if = {
														limit = {
															has_global_flag = renaissance
															NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = reaction_to_reformation } }
														}
														owner = { change_variable = { which = catholic_corruption value = 1 } }
													}
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = { name = indulgence_peddler duration = 400 }
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		} #End hidden effect
	} #End
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.001.a
		# Grant players rewards for spreading the faith (AI has it applied earlier in this event)
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 0.5 }
					check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 1 }
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = dg_conversion.002 days = 0 }
		}
	} #End option
} #End event AT LAST

country_event = { #Spreading the Faith
	
	id = dg_conversion.002
	title = dg_conversion.002.t
	desc = dg_conversion.002.d
	picture = world_religions #TEMP
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.002.a
		if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 5.000 } }
			if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 7.500 } }
				if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 9.000 } }
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 9.500 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 10.000 } }
							add_legitimacy = 6.000
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 5.700
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 5.400
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 8.000 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 8.500 } }
							add_legitimacy = 5.100
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 4.800
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 4.500
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 6.000 } }
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 6.500 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 7.000 } }
							add_legitimacy = 4.200
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 3.900
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 3.600
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 5.500 } }
						add_legitimacy = 3.300
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 3.000
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 2.500 } }
				if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 3.500 } }
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 4.000 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 4.500 } }
							add_legitimacy = 2.700
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 2.400
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 2.100
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 3.000 } }
						add_legitimacy = 1.800
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 1.500
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 1.000 } }
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 1.500 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 2.000 } }
							add_legitimacy = 1.200
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 0.900
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 0.600
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 0.500 } }
						add_legitimacy = 0.300
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 10 } }
			if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 15 } }
				if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 18 } }
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 19 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 20 } }
							add_papal_influence = 100
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 95
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 90
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 16 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 17 } }
							add_papal_influence = 85
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 80
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 75
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 12 } }
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 13 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 14 } }
							add_papal_influence = 70
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 65
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 60
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 11 } }
						add_papal_influence = 55
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 5 } }
				if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 7 } }
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 8 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 9 } }
							add_papal_influence = 45
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 40
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 35
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 6 } }
						add_papal_influence = 30
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 25
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 2 } }
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 3 } }
						if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 4 } }
							add_papal_influence = 20
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 15
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 10
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = { limit = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 1 } }
						add_papal_influence = 5
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = religious_prestige value = 0 }
			set_variable = { which = papal_influence value = 0 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The True Faith
	
	id = dg_conversion.003
	title = dg_conversion.003.t
	desc = dg_conversion.003.d
	picture = world_religions
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = changed_state_religion } }
			custom_tooltip = religious_news_choice_explained
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = changed_state_religion }
			custom_tooltip = church_property_changed_explained
		}
		#Removes modifiers and flags from countries that shouldn't have them
		#Until Church Aspects are fixed
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { religion = protestant }
				NOT = { religion = reformed }
				NOT = { religion = hussite }
				NOT = { religion = gnostic }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = married_pastors_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = celibate_priests_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = limited_divorce_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = civil_unions_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = biblical_inerrancy_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = individual_interpretation_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = guided_interpretation_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = adult_baptism_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = predestination_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = elected_ministers_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = lay_priesthood_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = free_membership_aspect
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion = protestant
					religion = reformed
					religion = hussite
					religion = gnostic
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = married_pastors_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = married_pastors_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = married_pastors_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = celibate_priests_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = celibate_priests_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = celibate_priests_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = limited_divorce_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = limited_divorce_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = limited_divorce_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = civil_unions_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = civil_unions_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = civil_unions_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = biblical_inerrancy_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = biblical_inerrancy_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = biblical_inerrancy_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = individual_interpretation_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = individual_interpretation_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = individual_interpretation_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = guided_interpretation_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = guided_interpretation_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = guided_interpretation_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = adult_baptism_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = adult_baptism_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = adult_baptism_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = predestination_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = predestination_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = predestination_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = elected_ministers_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = elected_ministers_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = elected_ministers_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = lay_priesthood_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = lay_priesthood_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = lay_priesthood_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = free_membership_aspect NOT = { has_country_modifier = free_membership_aspect } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = free_membership_aspect duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { religion = coptic }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = unity_banned }
					NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = unity_center } }
				}
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_owner_religion = yes
						is_in_capital_area = yes
						is_core = owner
						NOT = { has_province_flag = unity_center }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = unctionist_center }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = sonsofgrace_center }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = zakristos_center }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = stephanite_center }
					}
					set_province_flag = unity_center
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = unctionist_banned }
					NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = unctionist_center } }
				}
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_owner_religion = yes
						is_in_capital_area = yes
						is_core = owner
						NOT = { has_province_flag = unity_center }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = unctionist_center }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = sonsofgrace_center }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = zakristos_center }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = stephanite_center }
					}
					set_province_flag = unctionist_center
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { religion = zoroastrian }
			add_country_modifier = { name = fragmented_scriptures duration = -1 }
			country_event = { id = dg_zoroastrian.062 days = 30 }
		}
		#Crusade force-conversion fix
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				is_force_converted = yes
				any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = crusade_target }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = crusade_sponsor }
			}
			every_owned_province = { clr_province_flag = crusade_target }
			random_country = {
				limit = { is_papal_controller = yes }
				capital_scope = { set_province_flag = crusade_target }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { religion_group = muslim }
				has_country_modifier = emir_al_hajj
			}
			remove_country_modifier = emir_al_hajj
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = church_bastion } }
			every_owned_province = { remove_province_modifier = church_bastion }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = changed_state_religion }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route } }
				every_owned_province = { remove_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion_group = pagan
					religion_group = new_world_pagan
					religion_group = european_pagan
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = syncretism }
				remove_province_modifier = syncretism
				hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						religion = confucianism
						religion_group = pagan
						religion_group = european_pagan
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = jews_permitted
			clr_country_flag = jews_tolerated
			clr_country_flag = pagans_permitted
			clr_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
			clr_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
			clr_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
			clr_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
			clr_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
			clr_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
			clr_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
			clr_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
			clr_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
			clr_country_flag = christians_permitted
			clr_country_flag = christians_tolerated
			clr_country_flag = muslims_permitted
			clr_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
			remove_country_modifier = din_i_ilahi
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion_group = christian } }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
			remove_country_modifier = union_of_churches
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = catholic } }
			every_owned_province = {
				remove_province_modifier = greedy_bishop
				remove_province_modifier = absentee_bishop
				remove_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
				remove_province_modifier = augustinian_order
				remove_province_modifier = dominican_order
				remove_province_modifier = cistercian_order
				remove_province_modifier = franciscan_order
				remove_province_modifier = jesuit_order
				remove_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
				remove_province_modifier = peasant_success_story
				remove_province_modifier = effective_bishop
				remove_province_modifier = catholic_archbishopric
				remove_province_modifier = jesuit_activity
				remove_province_modifier = church_council_preparations
				remove_province_modifier = church_council
				remove_province_modifier = church_council_opening_session
				remove_province_modifier = charitable_order
				remove_province_modifier = missionary_order
				remove_province_modifier = catholic_prelate
				remove_province_modifier = catholic_patriarchate
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = hinduism } }
			remove_country_modifier = vaishnavism
			remove_country_modifier = shaivism
			remove_country_modifier = shaktism
			remove_country_modifier = smartism
			remove_country_modifier = bhakti_movement
			remove_country_modifier = tantrism
			every_owned_province = {
				remove_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage
				remove_province_modifier = matha
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = zoroastrian } }
			remove_country_modifier = sassanid_state_religion
			remove_country_modifier = mazdakite_sect
			remove_country_modifier = zarvanite_sect
			remove_country_modifier = gayomarthian_sect
			remove_country_modifier = dynastic_incest_fanatical
			remove_country_modifier = dynastic_incest_pious
			remove_country_modifier = dynastic_incest_observant
			remove_country_modifier = dynastic_incest_decadent
			remove_country_modifier = zoroastrian_reform
			remove_country_modifier = zoroastrian_orthodoxy
			every_owned_province = {
				remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = sikhism } }
			remove_country_modifier = khalsa_order
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = confucianism } }
			remove_country_modifier = confucianism_dominates
			remove_country_modifier = taoism_dominates
			remove_country_modifier = buddhism_dominates
			remove_country_modifier = legalism_dominates
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = vajrayana } }
			remove_country_modifier = bon_buddhism
			remove_country_modifier = black_hat_buddhism
			remove_country_modifier = red_hat_buddhism
			remove_country_modifier = yellow_hat_buddhism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { religion = mahayana }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = buddhism_dominates }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = meditation_buddhism
			remove_country_modifier = lotus_sutra_buddhism
			remove_country_modifier = nichiren_buddhism
			remove_country_modifier = pure_land_buddhism
			every_owned_province = {
				remove_province_modifier = friendly_abbot
				remove_province_modifier = temple_town_lotus_sutra
				remove_province_modifier = temple_town_meditation
				remove_province_modifier = temple_town_pure_land
				remove_province_modifier = temple_town_nichiren
				remove_province_modifier = ikki_league
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { religion = mahayana }
				NOT = { religion = shinto }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = shinto_buddhism
			remove_country_modifier = yuiitso_shinto
			every_owned_province = {
				remove_province_modifier = ise_shrine
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = buddhism } }
			remove_country_modifier = sangha_leadership
			every_owned_province = {
				remove_province_modifier = forest_monks
				remove_province_modifier = famous_buddhist_monastery
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed } }
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_thunder_perkunas
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_grain_patrimpas
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_all_dievas
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } }
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_thunder_perun
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_the_sun_dazhbog
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_fire_svarozhits
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_horses_veles
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = hellenic_pagan } }
			remove_country_modifier = epicurianism_philosophy
			remove_country_modifier = stoicism_philosophy
			remove_country_modifier = cynicism_philosophy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = inti } }
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_all_viracocha
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_earth_pachamama
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_the_sun_inti
			remove_country_modifier = god_of_the_moon_quilla
		}
		#Assigns ruler as religious head in certain religions
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion = polynesian_religion
					religion = ibadi
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = ruler_as_caliph
						OR = {
							religion = sunni
							religion = shiite
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = ruler_as_religious_head
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ruler_as_religious_head
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						religion = polynesian_religion
						religion = ibadi
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = ruler_as_caliph
							OR = {
								religion = sunni
								religion = shiite
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = ruler_as_religious_head
		}
		#Removes current religious head
		clr_country_flag = clerical_advisor
		clr_country_flag = patriarch_zealous
		clr_country_flag = patriarch_theologian
		clr_country_flag = patriarch_obedient
		clr_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
		clr_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
		clr_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
		clr_country_flag = patriarch_appointed
		clr_country_flag = holy_synod
		clr_country_flag = independent_patriarchate
		#Removes voluntary flag
		if = {
			limit = { had_country_flag = { flag = voluntary_conversion days = 10 } }
			clr_country_flag = voluntary_conversion
		}
		#Special new religion
		if = {
			limit = {
				had_global_flag = { flag = dei_gratia days = 100 }
				NOT = { any_country = { NOT = { tag = ROOT } religion = ROOT } }
				NOT = { religion = catholic }
			}
			country_event = { id = dg_church_influence.041 days = 30 }
		}
		#Special Toltecayotl
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						religion = nahuatl
						religion = mesoamerican_religion
					}
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = captured_icons value = 0 } }
				}
				set_variable = { which = captured_icons value = 0 }
			}
		}
		#Great Temples
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { religion_group = christian }
				any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = great_cathedreal }
				any_owned_province = { has_building = great_temple }
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = great_cathedreal
					has_building = great_temple
				}
				#remove_province_modifier = great_cathedral
				remove_building = great_temple
				clr_province_flag = great_cathedral
				add_building = temple
				province_event = { id = dg_piety.053 days = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { religion_group = jewish_group }
				any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = great_synagogue }
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = great_synagogue }
				#remove_province_modifier = great_synagogue
				remove_building = great_temple
				clr_province_flag = great_synagogue
				add_building = temple
				province_event = { id = dg_piety.053 days = 0 }
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = jewish_third_temple }
				remove_province_modifier = jewish_third_temple
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { religion_group = muslim }
				any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = great_mosque }
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = great_mosque }
				#remove_province_modifier = great_mosque
				remove_building = great_temple
				clr_province_flag = great_mosque
				add_building = temple
				province_event = { id = dg_piety.053 days = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion_group = muslim
					religion_group = christian
					religion_group = jewish_group
				}
				any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = great_temple }
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = great_temple }
				#remove_province_modifier = great_temple
				remove_building = great_temple
				clr_province_flag = great_temple
				add_building = temple
				province_event = { id = dg_piety.053 days = 0 }
			}
		}
		#Effect on the Reformation
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = catholic_state
				NOT = { religion = catholic }
				NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = catholic_heretic }
			}
			set_country_flag = catholic_heretic
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { total_development = 100 } }
				PAP = { add_reform_desire = 0.006 }
				hidden_effect = { PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_heresy value = 0.6 } } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					total_development = 100
					NOT = { total_development = 300 }
				}
				PAP = { add_reform_desire = 0.012 }
				hidden_effect = { PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_heresy value = 1.2 } } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					total_development = 300
					NOT = { total_development = 900 }
				}
				PAP = { add_reform_desire = 0.018 }
				hidden_effect = { PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_heresy value = 1.8 } } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { total_development = 900 }
				PAP = { add_reform_desire = 0.024 }
				hidden_effect = { PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_heresy value = 2.4 } } }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
				NOT = { has_country_flag = catholic_state }
				NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = returned_catholic }
			}
			set_country_flag = returned_catholic
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { total_development = 100 } }
				PAP = { add_reform_desire = -0.003 }
				hidden_effect = { PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_conversion value = -0.3 } } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					total_development = 100
					NOT = { total_development = 300 }
				}
				PAP = { add_reform_desire = -0.006 }
				hidden_effect = { PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_conversion value = -0.6 } } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					total_development = 300
					NOT = { total_development = 900 }
				}
				PAP = { add_reform_desire = -0.009 }
				hidden_effect = { PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_conversion value = -0.9 } } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { total_development = 900 }
				PAP = { add_reform_desire = -0.012 }
				hidden_effect = { PAP = { change_variable = { which = reform_desire_conversion value = -1.2 } } }
			}
		}
		#Special Hussite Wars
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						religion = hussite
						religion = gnostic
					}
					has_country_flag = was_catholic
					has_country_flag = crusade_sponsor
				}
				clr_country_flag = crusade_sponsor
				set_country_flag = crusade_target
				capital_scope = { save_global_event_target_as = catholic_crusade_goal }
				PAP = { set_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = hussite
				NOT = { is_religion_enabled = protestant }
			}
			add_country_modifier = { name = hussite_wars_positive duration = 2000 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			#Gets rid of inappropriate modifiers
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = inquisition value = 1 }
					NOT = { religion = catholic }
				}
				set_variable = { which = inquisition value = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_modifier = jubilee_year
				NOT = { religion = catholic }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = jubilee_year
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_modifier = jesuit_schools
				NOT = { religion = catholic }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = jesuit_schools
			add_country_modifier = { name = preparatory_schools duration = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_modifier = utraquist
				NOT = { religion = hussite }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = utraquist
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_modifier = lollard
				NOT = { religion = hussite }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = lollard
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_modifier = taborite
				NOT = { religion = hussite }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = taborite
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_modifier = brethren
				NOT = { religion = hussite }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = brethren
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_modifier = utraquist
				NOT = { religion = hussite }
			}
			remove_country_modifier = utraquist
		}
		#Sets appropriate flags and values, finds holy lands
		#Knows the holy lands of its faith
		#Rome
		if = {
			limit = { religion = catholic }
			discover_province = 118 #Rome
		}
		#Jerusalem
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion = jewish
					religion = sunni
					religion = shiite
					religion = orthodox
					religion = catholic
					religion = coptic
					religion = chaldean
				}
			}
			discover_province = 379 #Jerusalem
		}
		#The (rest of the) Greek Pentarchy
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion = orthodox
					religion = coptic
				}
				capital_scope = { continent = europe }
			}
			discover_province = 151 #Constantinople
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion = orthodox
					religion = coptic
				}
				capital_scope = { africa_continent_trigger = yes }
			}
			discover_province = 358 #Alexandria
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion = orthodox
					religion = coptic
				}
				capital_scope = { asia_continent_trigger = yes }
			}
			discover_province = 382 #Antioch
		}
		#Baghdad
		if = {
			limit = { religion = chaldean }
			discover_province = 410 #Baghdad
		}
		#Mecca and Medina
		if = {
			limit = { religion_group = muslim }
			discover_province = 384 #Mecca
			discover_province = 385 #Medina
		}
		#al Najaf
		if = {
			limit = { religion = shiite }
			discover_province = 409 #al Najaf
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = excommunicated
					NOT = { religion = catholic }
				}
				set_country_flag = excommunicated_protestant
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = excommunicated_protestant
					religion = catholic
				}
				clr_country_flag = excommunicated_protestant
				clr_country_flag = excommunicated
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = hinduism }
				change_variable = { which = caste_system value = 1 }
			}
			#Set state religion
			if = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				set_country_flag = catholic_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = gnostic }
				set_country_flag = gnostic_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = chaldean }
				set_country_flag = chaldean_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = hussite }
				set_country_flag = hussite_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = protestant }
				set_country_flag = protestant_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = reformed }
				set_country_flag = reformed_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = orthodox }
				set_country_flag = orthodox_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = coptic }
				set_country_flag = coptic_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = sunni }
				set_country_flag = sunni_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = shiite }
				set_country_flag = shiite_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = druze }
				set_country_flag = druze_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = ibadi }
				set_country_flag = ibadi_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = wahhabi }
				set_country_flag = wahhabi_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = zoroastrian }
				set_country_flag = zoroastrian_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
				if = {
					limit = {
						persian_culture_trigger = yes
						NOT = { is_colonial_nation = yes }
						NOT = { is_former_colonial_nation = yes }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
					}
					add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_strict duration = -1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { persian_culture_trigger = yes }
							is_colonial_nation = yes
							is_former_colonial_nation = yes
						}
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
					}
					add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_loose duration = -1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = hinduism }
				set_country_flag = hinduism_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { capital_scope = { continent = indian_continent } } #India
							culture_group = dravidian
							is_colonial_nation = yes
							is_former_colonial_nation = yes
						}
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
					}
					add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_loose duration = -1 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								NOT = { capital_scope = { continent = indian_continent } } #India #XXX
								culture_group = dravidian
								is_colonial_nation = yes
								is_former_colonial_nation = yes
							}
						}
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
					}
					add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_strict duration = -1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = sikhism }
				set_country_flag = sikhism_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = jain }
				set_country_flag = jain_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose }
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed }
					}
					add_country_modifier = { name = caste_system_loose duration = -1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = buddhism }
				set_country_flag = buddhism_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = shinto }
				set_country_flag = shinto_state
				set_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = mahayana }
				set_country_flag = mahayana_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = confucianism }
				set_country_flag = confucianism_state
				set_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = vajrayana }
				set_country_flag = vajrayana_state
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = animism }
				set_country_flag = animism_state
				set_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
				set_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_state

				set_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_state
				set_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition

				limit = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
				set_country_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_state

				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
				set_country_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_state
				set_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = hellenic_pagan }
				set_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_state

				clr_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
					patriarch_authority = 0.50
					piety = 0.20
				}
				clr_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition }
					patriarch_authority = 0.75
					piety = 0.60
				}
				set_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			set_country_flag = true_faith
