	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { ai = yes }
					has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = dg_conversion.103 days = 0 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
				NOT = { has_country_flag = changed_state_religion }
			}
			#Removes changed religion penalties with coreligionists
			every_known_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = ROOT
					OR = {
						has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
						has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
						has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
						has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
					}
				}
				remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
				remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
				remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
				remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
				reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
				reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
				reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
				reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
			}
			#Removes your excommunication-related opinions of others
			every_known_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
					}
				}
				remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
				remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
				remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
				remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
				remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
				reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
				reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
				reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
				reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
				reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The True Faith
	
	id = dg_conversion.103
	title = dg_conversion.003.t
	desc = dg_conversion.003.d
	picture = world_religions
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.a #Religion is of secondary importance to the state
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = changed_state_religion }
			OR = {
				ai = no
				government = monarchy
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		#Removes changed religion penalties with coreligionists
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				OR = {
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
		}
		#Removes your excommunication-related opinions of others
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { ai = no }
				set_country_flag = religious_news_major
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_all
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.b #Appoint a counsellor to guide us in matters divine
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = changed_state_religion }
			OR = {
				ai = no
				government = theocracy
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		#Removes changed religion penalties with coreligionists
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				OR = {
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
		}
		#Removes your excommunication-related opinions of others
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { ai = no }
				set_country_flag = religious_news_major
				set_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_all
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.c #Study all religions, great and small
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = changed_state_religion }
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		#Removes changed religion penalties with coreligionists
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				OR = {
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
		}
		#Removes your excommunication-related opinions of others
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
			
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { ai = no }
				set_country_flag = religious_news_all
				set_country_flag = religious_news_major
				set_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.e #Pay only lip service to the church
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = changed_state_religion }
			OR = {
				ai = no
				government = republic
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		#Removes changed religion penalties with coreligionists
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				OR = {
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_pious }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_observant }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
		}
		#Removes your excommunication-related opinions of others
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
			remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent }
			reverse_remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { ai = no }
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_all
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_major
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.f #Hand over existing land to the new state religion
		trigger = { has_country_flag = changed_state_religion }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				government = theocracy
				factor = 0.1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.g #Hand over existing land to the new state religion
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
			check_variable = { which = church_property value = 3 }
			patriarch_authority = 0.10
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = church_property value = 11 }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = church_property value = 7 }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = church_property value = 5 } }
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				years_of_income = 0.5
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				years_of_income = 1
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				years_of_income = 1.5
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				years_of_income = 2
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = -10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.20
				NOT = { piety = 0.60 }
			}
			add_legitimacy = -8
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.20
				NOT = { piety = 0.20 }
			}
			add_legitimacy = -6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.60
				NOT = { piety = -0.20 }
			}
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { piety = -0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
			add_years_of_income = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.90
				NOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
			}
			add_years_of_income = 3.6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.80
				NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.90 }
			}
			add_years_of_income = 3.2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.70
				NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
			}
			add_years_of_income = 2.8
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.60
				NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.70 }
			}
			add_years_of_income = 2.4
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.50
				NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.60 }
			}
			add_years_of_income = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.40
				NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.50 }
			}
			add_years_of_income = 1.6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.30
				NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
			}
			add_years_of_income = 1.2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.20
				NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.30 }
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.8
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.10
				NOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.20 }
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.4
		}
		add_patriarch_authority = -0.10
		hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = church_property value = -2 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Conversion of heretics
	
	id = dg_conversion.004
	title = dg_conversion.004.t
	desc = dg_conversion.004.d
	picture = religion_decline
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
	} #End immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.004.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0.5 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 1 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 0.3
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 1 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 1.5 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 0.6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 1.5 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 2 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 0.9
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 2 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 2.5 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 2.5 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 3 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 3 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 4 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.8
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 4 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 5 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2.4
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 5 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 6 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 3.0
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 6 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 7 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 3.6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 7 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 8 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4.2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 8 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 9 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4.8
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 9 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 10 } }
			}
			add_legitimacy = 5.6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 10 } }
			add_legitimacy = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 1 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 2 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 2 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 3 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 3 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 4 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 15
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 4 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 5 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 20
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 5 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 6 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 25
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 6 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 8 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 30
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 8 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 10 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 40
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 10 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 12 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 50
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 12 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 14 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 14 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 16 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 70
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 16 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 18 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 80
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 18 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 20 } }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 90
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 20 }
			}
			add_papal_influence = 100
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = conversion_prestige value = 0 }
			set_variable = { which = papal_influence_conversion value = 0 }
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = converted_province }
			add_province_modifier = { name = recently_converted duration = 90 }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = converted_province }
		}
	} #End option
}

country_event = { #The $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ faith shrinks
	
	id = dg_conversion.005
	title = dg_conversion.005.t
	desc = dg_conversion.005.d
	picture = world_religions #TEMP
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.005.a #Heresy and damnation!
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = changed_religion_fanatical }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = changed_religion_pious }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = changed_religion_observant }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 NOT = { piety = -0.20 } }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = changed_religion_decadent }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { piety = -0.60 } }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = changed_religion_secular }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ faith grows
	
	id = dg_conversion.006
	title = dg_conversion.006.t
	desc = dg_conversion.006.d
	picture = world_religions #TEMP
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.006.a #Rejoice!
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = new_religion_fanatical }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = new_religion_pious }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = new_religion_observant }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 NOT = { piety = -0.20 } }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = new_religion_decadent }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { piety = -0.60 } }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = new_religion_secular }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Crusading Spirit
	
	id = dg_conversion.008
	title = dg_conversion.008.t
	desc = dg_conversion.008.d
	picture = catholic_crusade
	
	hidden = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.008.a
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = crusade_sponsor }
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_catholic_crusade
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Conversion system
	
	id = dg_conversion.009
	title = dg_conversion.009.t
	desc = dg_conversion.009.d
	picture = ai_only
	
	hidden = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 0 }
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_missionaries = 1 }
			change_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_missionaries = 2 }
			change_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_missionaries = 3 }
			change_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_missionaries = 4 }
			change_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_missionaries = 5 }
			change_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 }
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_missionary = yes }
			set_province_flag = missionary_target
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_province_modifier = conversion_system_province } }
				add_province_modifier = { name = conversion_system_province duration = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = jewish }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = jewish }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = sunni }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = sunni }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = shiite }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = shiite }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = ibadi }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = ibadi }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = wahhabi }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = wahhabi }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = druze }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = druze }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = catholic }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = chaldean }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = chaldean }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = coptic }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = coptic }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = orthodox }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = orthodox }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = gnostic }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = gnostic }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = hussite }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = hussite }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = protestant }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = protestant }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = reformed }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = reformed }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = hinduism }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = hinduism }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = sikhism }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = sikhism }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = zoroastrian }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = zoroastrian }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = jain }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = jain }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = confucianism }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = confucianism }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = buddhism }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = buddhism }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = vajrayana }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = vajrayana }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = mahayana }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = mahayana }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = inti }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = inti }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = nahuatl }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = nahuatl }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = mesoamerican_religion }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = mesoamerican_religion }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = pantheism }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = pantheism }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = totemism }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = totemism }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = animism }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = animism }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = tengri_pagan_reformed }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = shamanism }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = shamanism }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = west_african_pagan_reformed }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = adi_dharam }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = adi_dharam }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = shinto }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = shinto }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = polynesian_religion }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = polynesian_religion }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = hellenic_pagan }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = hellenic_pagan }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = norse_pagan_reformed }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = baltic_pagan_reformed }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = finnish_pagan_reformed }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = slavic_pagan_reformed }
			}
			divide_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 5 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						religion_group = pagan
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
				}
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { religion_group = owner }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 2 } #Heretic
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { tolerance_to_this = -3 } }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 1.4 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { tolerance_to_this = -1 } }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 1.4 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { tolerance_to_this = 1 }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { tolerance_to_this = 3 }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			owner = { change_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = -1 } }
		}
		#Decides which religion to target if needed
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 } }
			#Modifiers to religions based on policies
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = orthodox_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = gnostic_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hussite_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = reformed_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = protestant_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = coptic_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = chaldean_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = jews_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = muslims_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = ibadi_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = wahhabi_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = druze_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = shiite_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = zoroastrian_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = jain_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hinduism_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = mahayana_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = buddhism_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = confucianism_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = vajrayana_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated }
				multiply_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = orthodox_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = gnostic_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hussite_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = reformed_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = protestant_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = coptic_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = chaldean_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = jews_tolerated }
				multiply_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated }
				multiply_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = ibadi_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = wahhabi_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = druze_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = shiite_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated }
				multiply_variable = { which = zoroastrian_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = jain_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hinduism_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated }
				multiply_variable = { which = mahayana_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = buddhism_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = confucianism_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = vajrayana_population value = 0.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } }
				multiply_variable = { which = shinto_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = adi_dharam_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = animism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = shamanism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = polynesian_religion_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated } }
				multiply_variable = { which = inti_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = nahuatl_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = totemism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated } }
				multiply_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted } }
				multiply_variable = { which = shinto_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = adi_dharam_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = animism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = shamanism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = polynesian_religion_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted } }
				multiply_variable = { which = inti_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = nahuatl_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = pantheism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = totemism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted } }
				multiply_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 2 }
			}
			##Choosing which religion
			if = {
				limit = {
					#Pagans first, in rough order of extinction, then organized religions in rough order of survival over time
					NOT = { has_country_flag = missionary_policy }
					check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 0.1 }
					NOT = { religion = hellenic_pagan }
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = nahuatl_population }
						religion = nahuatl
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = inti_population }
						religion = inti
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = tengri_pagan_reformed_population }
						religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = shamanism_population }
						religion = shamanism
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = animism_population }
						religion = animism
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = totemism_population }
						religion = totemism
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = pantheism_population }
						religion = pantheism
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = polynesian_religion_population }
						religion = polynesian_religion
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = norse_pagan_reformed_population }
						religion = norse_pagan_reformed
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = slavic_pagan_reformed_population }
						religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population }
						religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = baltic_pagan_reformed_population }
						religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = mesoamerican_religion_population }
						religion = mesoamerican_religion
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population }
						religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = adi_dharam_population }
						religion = adi_dharam
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = shinto_population }
						religion = shinto
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = gnostic_population }
						religion = gnostic
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = protestant_population }
						religion = protestant
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population which = zoroastrian_population }
						religion = zoroastrian
					}
					OR = {

						check_variable = { which = adi_dharam_population which = shinto_population }
						religion = shinto
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = adi_dharam_population which = gnostic_population }
						religion = gnostic

					}

				limit = {
					#Pagans first, in rough order of extinction, then organized religions in rough order of survival over time

					NOT = { religion = confucianism }
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = catholic_population }
						religion = catholic
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = orthodox_population }
						religion = orthodox
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = sunni_population }
						religion = sunni
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = hinduism_population }
						religion = hinduism
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = buddhism_population }
						religion = buddhism
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = mahayana_population }
						religion = mahayana
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = vajrayana_population }
						religion = vajrayana
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = jain_population }
						religion = jain
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = shiite_population }
						religion = shiite
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = ibadi_population }
						religion = ibadi
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = reformed_population }
						religion = reformed
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = wahhabi_population }
						religion = wahhabi
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = sikhism_population }
						religion = sikhism
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = druze_population }
						religion = druze
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { which = confucianism_population which = jewish_population }
						religion = jewish
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = missionary_policy
				set_country_flag = missionary_policy_confucianism

					NOT = { religion = jewish }
				}
				set_country_flag = missionary_policy
				set_country_flag = missionary_policy_jewish
			}
			##Reset values
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = orthodox_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = gnostic_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hussite_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = protestant_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = coptic_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = chaldean_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = jews_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = muslims_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = ibadi_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = wahhabi_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = druze_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = shiite_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = zoroastrian_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = jain_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hinduism_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted }
				multiply_variable = { which = mahayana_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = buddhism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = confucianism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = vajrayana_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated }
				multiply_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = orthodox_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = gnostic_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hussite_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = reformed_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = protestant_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = coptic_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = chaldean_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = jews_tolerated }
				multiply_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated }
				multiply_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = ibadi_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = wahhabi_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = druze_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = shiite_population value = 2 }
			}

				limit = { has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated }
				multiply_variable = { which = zoroastrian_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = jain_population value = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = hinduism_population value = 2 }
			}

				limit = { has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated }

				multiply_variable = { which = vajrayana_population value = 2 }
			}

				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } }
				multiply_variable = { which = shinto_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = adi_dharam_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = animism_population value = 0.5 }
				multiply_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed_population value = 0.5 }

			limit = { check_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 } }

				limit = {
					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_catholic
					NOT = { religion = catholic }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						controlled_by = owner
					}
					set_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = catholic }
					set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = catholic }
					divide_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 2.5 }
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { catholic = 1 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
					if = {

					}
					set_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = tengri_pagan_reformed }
					set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = tengri_pagan_reformed }
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 1 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 3 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_shamanism
					NOT = { religion = shamanism }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = shamanism value = 2 }
						controlled_by = owner
					}
					set_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = shamanism }
					set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = shamanism }
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { shamanism = 1 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { shamanism = 3 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_west_african_pagan_reformed
					NOT = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						controlled_by = owner
					}
					set_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = west_african_pagan_reformed }
					set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = west_african_pagan_reformed }
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 1 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 3 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {

					NOT = { religion = shinto }

				every_owned_province = {

					NOT = { religion = adi_dharam }

					if = {

					}

					NOT = { religion = inti }

					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_mesoamerican_religion
					NOT = { religion = mesoamerican_religion }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 2 }
						controlled_by = owner

					set_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = mesoamerican_religion }
					set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = mesoamerican_religion }
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { mesoamerican_religion = 1 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { mesoamerican_religion = 3 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_totemism
					NOT = { religion = totemism }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = totemism value = 2 }
						controlled_by = owner

			}

					NOT = { religion = pantheism }

				every_owned_province = {

						check_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 2 }

					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { norse_pagan_reformed = 3 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_slavic_pagan_reformed
					NOT = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						controlled_by = owner

					if = {

					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_finnish_pagan_reformed
					NOT = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						controlled_by = owner
					}
					set_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = finnish_pagan_reformed }
					set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = finnish_pagan_reformed }
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 1 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 3 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_baltic_pagan_reformed
					NOT = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						controlled_by = owner
					}
					set_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = baltic_pagan_reformed }
					set_variable = { which = missionary_chance which = baltic_pagan_reformed }
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { baltic_pagan_reformed = 1 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { baltic_pagan_reformed = 3 } }
						multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
					}
				}
			}
			##Base power of conversion
			every_owned_province = {
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 1.4 }
			}
			##Factors identical for every religion
			##Should 1.4/2x chance for heretics
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 1 } }
				if = {
					limit = { has_owner_religion = yes }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { is_capital = yes }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 2 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { is_core = owner } }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { is_in_capital_area = yes } }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { is_overseas = yes } #Territory
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.7 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_owner_culture = yes } }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { culture_group = owner } }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { unrest = 2 }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { unrest = 4 }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { unrest = 8 }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { local_autonomy = 20 }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { local_autonomy = 40 }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { local_autonomy = 80 }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { has_owner_religion = yes } } }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = owner } } }
					multiply_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.5 }
				}
			}
			#Selecting provinces
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					owner = { check_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 } }
					check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.1 }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
					all_province = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = PREV } }
							is_variable_equal = { which = missionary_target_chance which = PREV }
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = missionary_target
				owner = { change_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = -1 } }
			}
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					owner = { check_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 } }
					check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.1 }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
					all_province = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = PREV } }
							is_variable_equal = { which = missionary_target_chance which = PREV }
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = missionary_target
				owner = { change_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = -1 } }
			}
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					owner = { check_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 } }
					check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.1 }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
					all_province = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = PREV } }
							is_variable_equal = { which = missionary_target_chance which = PREV }
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = missionary_target
				owner = { change_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = -1 } }
			}
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					owner = { check_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 } }
					check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.1 }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
					all_province = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = PREV } }
							is_variable_equal = { which = missionary_targets which = PREV }
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = missionary_target
				owner = { change_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = -1 } }
			}
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					owner = { check_variable = { which = missionary_targets value = 1 } }
					check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0.1 }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
					all_province = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance which = PREV } }
							is_variable_equal = { which = missionary_targets which = PREV }
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = missionary_target
				owner = { change_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = -1 } }
			}
			every_owned_province = { set_variable = { which = missionary_target_chance value = 0 } }
		}
		##Conversion power
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				set_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.005
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.5 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.005
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.01
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.010
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.015
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 1.5 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.015
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.02
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.02
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.025
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 2.5 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.025
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 3 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.03
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.035
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 3.5 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.035
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.04
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 4 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.045
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 4.5 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.045
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.05
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 5 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.055
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 5.5 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.055
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.06
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 6 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {

						value = 0.065

			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 3 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 } }

				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 1.4 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 60 }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 1.4 }
			}
		}
		##Conversion factors applied
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_target }
			clr_province_flag = missionary_target
			if = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = yes } has_missionary = no }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 1.4 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_owner_religion = yes }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_missionary = yes }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_capital = yes }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 1.4 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { is_core = owner } }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_owner_culture = yes } }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { culture_group = owner } }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { is_in_capital_area = yes } }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_overseas = yes }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { unrest = 2 }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { unrest = 4 }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { unrest = 8 }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { local_autonomy = 20 }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { local_autonomy = 40 }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { local_autonomy = 80 }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { has_owner_religion = yes } } }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = owner } } }
				multiply_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.7 }
			}
			#Chance applied
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.1 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = missionary_chance value = 0.2 } }
				}
				random = {
					chance = 10
					random = { chance = 1 set_province_flag = missionary_success }

			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = missionary_success }
				set_province_flag = religious_change
				change_variable = { which = missionary_system_success value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = missionary_success
					has_missionary = yes
				}
				clr_province_flag = missionary_success
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
				change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = missionary_success
					owner = { has_country_flag = missionary_policy_catholic }
				}
				clr_province_flag = missionary_success
				change_variable = { which = catholic value = -2 }
				change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {

					owner = { has_country_flag = missionary_policy_orthodox }
				}

	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.009.a
	}
