province_event = { #Paganism in Decline (old world pagans)
	
	id = dg_conversion.011
	title = dg_conversion.011.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
		}
		NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { owner = { religion_group = pagan } } }
		NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { owner = { religion_group = european_pagan } } }
		owner = {
			NOT = { religion_group = pagan }
			NOT = { religion_group = european_pagan }
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = { has_country_flag = true_faith }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 166
		
		
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.09
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple_heathen
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_core = owner
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { accepted_culture = ROOT }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { stability = 2 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { advisor = inquisitor }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { is_at_war = yes }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		#Spread of ideas modifiers
		modifier = {
			NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = pagan } }
			NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = european_pagan } }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religion_group = pagan }
			NOT = { religion_group = european_pagan }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = christian }
					owner = { religion_group = christian }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = muslim }
					owner = { religion_group = muslim }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = dharmic }
					owner = { religion_group = dharmic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = taoic }
					owner = { religion_group = taoic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = jewish_group }
					owner = { religion_group = jewish_group }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = european_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 4 } #20% of the population converts to your state religion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.011.a
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
			add_base_unrest = yes
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
	}
}

province_event = { #Islam in Decline
	
	id = dg_conversion.012
	title = dg_conversion.012.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	
	trigger = {
		religion_group = muslim
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { owner = { religion_group = muslim } } }
		owner = {
			NOT = { religion_group = muslim }
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = { has_country_flag = true_faith }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 333
		
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.09
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple_heathen
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_core = owner
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { accepted_culture = ROOT }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { stability = 2 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { advisor = inquisitor }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { is_at_war = yes }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		#Spread of ideas modifiers
		modifier = {
			NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = muslim } }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religion_group = muslim }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = christian }
					owner = { religion_group = christian }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = muslim }
					owner = { religion_group = muslim }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = dharmic }
					owner = { religion_group = dharmic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = taoic }
					owner = { religion_group = taoic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = jewish_group }
					owner = { religion_group = jewish_group }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = european_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 4 } #20% of the population converts to your state religion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.011.a #Same
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
			add_base_unrest = yes
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
	}
}

province_event = { #Christianity in Decline
	
	id = dg_conversion.013
	title = dg_conversion.013.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d #Same
	picture = religion_decline
	
	trigger = {
		religion_group = christian
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { owner = { religion_group = christian } } }
		owner = {
			NOT = { religion_group = christian }
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = { has_country_flag = true_faith }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 333
		
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.09
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple_heathen
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_core = owner
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { accepted_culture = ROOT }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { stability = 2 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { advisor = inquisitor }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { is_at_war = yes }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		#Spread of ideas modifiers
		modifier = {
			NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = christian } }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religion_group = christian }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = christian }
					owner = { religion_group = christian }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = muslim }
					owner = { religion_group = muslim }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = dharmic }
					owner = { religion_group = dharmic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = taoic }
					owner = { religion_group = taoic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = jewish_group }
					owner = { religion_group = jewish_group }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = european_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 4 } #20% of the population converts to your state religion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.011.a #Same
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
			add_base_unrest = yes
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
	}
}

province_event = { #Dharmic Religions in Decline
	
	id = dg_conversion.014
	title = dg_conversion.014.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d #Same
	picture = religion_decline
	
	trigger = {
		religion_group = dharmic
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { owner = { religion_group = dharmic } } }
		owner = {
			NOT = { religion_group = dharmic }
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = { has_country_flag = true_faith }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 333
		
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}

				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {

					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {

				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.09
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple_heathen
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_core = owner
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { accepted_culture = ROOT }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { stability = 2 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { advisor = inquisitor }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { is_at_war = yes }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		#Spread of ideas modifiers
		modifier = {
			NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = dharmic } }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religion_group = dharmic }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = christian }
					owner = { religion_group = christian }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = muslim }
					owner = { religion_group = muslim }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = dharmic }
					owner = { religion_group = dharmic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = taoic }
					owner = { religion_group = taoic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = jewish_group }
					owner = { religion_group = jewish_group }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = european_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 4 } #20% of the population converts to your state religion
		}

			set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
			add_base_unrest = yes
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1

province_event = { #Taoic Religions in Decline
	
	id = dg_conversion.015
	title = dg_conversion.015.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d #Same
	picture = religion_decline
	
	trigger = {
		religion_group = taoic
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { owner = { religion_group = taoic } } }
		owner = {
			NOT = { religion_group = taoic }
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = { has_country_flag = true_faith }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 333
		
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {

				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = jewish_group }
					owner = { religion_group = jewish_group }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = european_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }

				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }

province_event = { #Judaism in Decline
	
	id = dg_conversion.016
	title = dg_conversion.016.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	
	trigger = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { owner = { religion_group = jewish_group } } }
		owner = {
			NOT = { religion_group = jewish_group }
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = { has_country_flag = true_faith }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 333

				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}

		}

					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {

					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}

			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple_heathen
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_core = owner
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { accepted_culture = ROOT }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { stability = 2 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { advisor = inquisitor }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { is_at_war = yes }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		#Spread of ideas modifiers
		modifier = {
			NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = jewish_group } }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religion_group = jewish_group }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = christian }
					owner = { religion_group = christian }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = muslim }
					owner = { religion_group = muslim }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = dharmic }
					owner = { religion_group = dharmic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = taoic }
					owner = { religion_group = taoic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = jewish_group }
					owner = { religion_group = jewish_group }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = european_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 4 } #20% of the population converts to your state religion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.011.a #Same
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
			add_base_unrest = yes
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
	}
}

province_event = { #Paganism in Decline (new world pagans)
	
	id = dg_conversion.017
	title = dg_conversion.011.t #Same
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	
	trigger = {
		religion_group = new_world_pagan
		NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan } } }
		owner = {
			NOT = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = { has_country_flag = true_faith }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 83#Twice as fast as other religions
		
		
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.09
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple_heathen
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_core = owner
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { accepted_culture = ROOT }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { stability = 2 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { advisor = inquisitor }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { is_at_war = yes }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		#Spread of ideas modifiers
		modifier = {
			NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = new_world_pagan } }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = christian }
					owner = { religion_group = christian }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = muslim }
					owner = { religion_group = muslim }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = dharmic }
					owner = { religion_group = dharmic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = taoic }
					owner = { religion_group = taoic }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = jewish_group }
					owner = { religion_group = jewish_group }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = european_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = european_pagan }
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
					owner = { religion_group = new_world_pagan }
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}

country_event = { #Religious syncretism
	
	id = dg_conversion.018
	title = dg_conversion.018.t
	desc = dg_conversion.018.d
	picture = all_mischief #TEMP
	
	is_triggered_only = yes #By background check
	
	hidden = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.018.a
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_province_modifier = syncretism }
				has_missionary = no
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = inti value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = totemism value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = pantheism value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = animism value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = shamanism value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 4 }
					check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 4 }
					AND = {
						check_variable = { which = shinto value = 4 }
						NOT = { owner = { religion = mahayana } }
					}
					AND = {
						check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 4 }
						NOT = { owner = { religion = hinduism } }
						NOT = { owner = { religion = jain } }
					}
				}
				is_city = yes
			}
			add_province_modifier = { name = syncretism duration = -1 }
			hidden_effect = {
				#Half of pagans convert
				multiply_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = nahuatl }
				multiply_variable = { which = inti value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = inti }
				multiply_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = mesoamerican_religion }
				multiply_variable = { which = pantheism value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = pantheism }
				multiply_variable = { which = totemism value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = totemism }
				multiply_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = tengri_pagan_reformed }
				multiply_variable = { which = shamanism value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = shamanism }
				multiply_variable = { which = animism value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = animism }
				multiply_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = polynesian_religion }
				multiply_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = west_african_pagan_reformed }
				multiply_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = hellenic_pagan }
				multiply_variable = { which = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = baltic_pagan_reformed }
				multiply_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = slavic_pagan_reformed }
				multiply_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = finnish_pagan_reformed }
				multiply_variable = { which = norse_pagan_reformed value = 0.5 }
				change_variable = { which = converts which = norse_pagan_reformed }
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { owner = { religion = mahayana } } }
					multiply_variable = { which = shinto value = 0.5 }
					change_variable = { which = converts which = shinto }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { owner = { OR = { religion = hinduism religion = jain } } } }
					multiply_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 0.5 }
					change_variable = { which = converts which = adi_dharam }
				}
			}
		} #End every owned province
	} #End option
} #End event

country_event = { #Pressure to convert
	
	id = dg_conversion.010
	title = dg_conversion.010.t
	desc = dg_conversion.010.d
	picture = world_religions #TEMP
	
	trigger = {
		is_subject_other_than_tributary_trigger = yes
		NOT = { religious_unity = 0.75 }
		any_known_country = {
			overlord_of = ROOT
			NOT = { is_at_war = yes }
			NOT = { war_exhaustion = 5 }
			NOT = { senior_union_with = ROOT }
		}
		OR = {
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = catholic value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = catholic }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = catholic
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = orthodox value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = orthodox }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = orthodox
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = protestant value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = protestant }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = protestant
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = reformed value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = reformed }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = reformed
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = coptic value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = coptic }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = coptic
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = gnostic value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = gnostic }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = gnostic
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = hussite value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = hussite }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = hussite
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = sunni value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = sunni }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = sunni
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = shiite value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = shiite }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = shiite
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = ibadi value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = ibadi }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = wahhabi value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = wahhabi }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = wahhabi
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = hinduism value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = hinduism }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = hinduism
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = sikhism value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = sikhism }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = sikhism
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = jain value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = jain }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = jain
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = zoroastrian value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = zoroastrian }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = adi_dharam value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = adi_dharam }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = adi_dharam
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = confucianism value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = confucianism }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = confucianism
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = buddhism value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = buddhism }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = buddhism
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = shinto value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = shinto }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = shinto
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = mahayana value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = mahayana }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = mahayana
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = vajrayana value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = vajrayana }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = vajrayana
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = jewish value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = jewish }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = jewish
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = nahuatl value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = nahuatl }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = nahuatl
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = mesoamerican_religion value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = mesoamerican_religion }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = mesoamerican_religion
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = inti value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = inti }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = inti
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = pantheism value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = pantheism }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = pantheism
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = totemism value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = totemism }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = totemism
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = animism value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = animism }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = animism
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = shamanism value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = shamanism }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = shamanism
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = hellenic_pagan value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = hellenic_pagan }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = hellenic_pagan
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = norse_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_religion = { religion = polynesian_religion value = 0.25 }
				NOT = { religion = polynesian_religion }
				any_known_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = polynesian_religion
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 10
		
		modifier = {
			religion_group = christian
			is_religion_enabled = protestant
			NOT = { has_global_flag = counter_reformation }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = catholic_reformation }
			factor = 10
		}
		modifier = {
			any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } }
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT NOT = { piety = -0.20 } }
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT piety = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT piety = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.010.a #Cave in and accept this new faith
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { piety = -0.20 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { piety = -0.60 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		subtract_stability_3 = yes
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { religion = ROOT }
			add_province_modifier = { name = fanatics_organizing duration = 5000 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = catholic } }
			change_religion = catholic
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = protestant }
			}
			change_religion = protestant
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = reformed }
			}
			change_religion = reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = orthodox }
			}
			change_religion = orthodox
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = coptic }
			}
			change_religion = coptic
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = chaldean }
			}
			change_religion = chaldean
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = hussite }
			}
			change_religion = hussite
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = gnostic }
			}
			change_religion = gnostic
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = jewish }
			}
			change_religion = jewish
		}
		if = {

		if = {

		}
		if = {

		if = {
			limit = {

			}
			change_religion = mesoamerican_religion
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = inti }
			}
			change_religion = inti
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = pantheism }
			}
			change_religion = pantheism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = totemism }
			}
			change_religion = totemism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = polynesian_religion }
			}
			change_religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = animism }
			}
			change_religion = animism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
			}
			change_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = shamanism }
			}
			change_religion = shamanism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = polynesian_religion }
			}
			change_religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = hellenic_pagan }
			}
			change_religion = hellenic_pagan
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
			}
			change_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
			}
			change_religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
			}
			change_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
			}
			change_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
			}
			change_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.010.b #Remain true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = { factor = 70 }
		add_adm_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = { liberty_desire = 80 }
			add_stability_1 = yes
			overlord = { ROOT = { declare_war_with_cb = { who = PREV casus_belli = cb_religious_independence } } }
		}
		add_liberty_desire = 20
		random_country = {
			limit = { overlord_of = ROOT }
			every_province = {
				limit = { owned_by = ROOT religion = PREV }
				add_province_modifier = { name = fanatics_organizing duration = 1000 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Faith of our Fathers
	
	id = dg_conversion.019
	title = dg_turmoil.019.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.019.d
	picture = all_reply_insult
	
	trigger = {
		is_colonial_nation = yes
		any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT NOT = { religion = ROOT } }
		any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT check_variable = { which = sympathy_to_old_religion value = 1 } }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = oath_of_tolerance }
		is_at_war = no
		OR = {
			AND = {
				religion = catholic
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_catholic }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = protestant
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_protestant }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = reformed
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_reformed }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = orthodox
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_orthodox }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = coptic
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_coptic }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = gnostic
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_gnostic }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = hussite
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_hussite }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = sunni
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_sunni }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = shiite
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_shiite }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = ibadi
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_ibadi }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = wahhabi
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_wahhabi }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = hinduism
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_hinduism }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = sikhism
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_sikhism }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = jain
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_jain }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = zoroastrian
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_zoroastrian }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = adi_dharam
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_adi_dharam }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = confucianism
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_confucianism }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = shinto
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_shinto }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = mahayana
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_mahayana }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = buddhism
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_buddhism }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = vajrayana
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_vajrayana }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = jewish
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_jewish }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = nahuatl
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_nahuatl }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = mesoamerican_religion
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_mesoamerican_religion }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = inti
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_inti }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = totemism
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_totemism }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = pantheism
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_pantheism }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = animism
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_animism }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_west_african_pagan_reformed }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = polynesian_religion
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_polynesian_religion }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = hellenic_pagan
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_hellenic_pagan }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = norse_pagan_reformed
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_norse_pagan_reformed }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_finnish_pagan_reformed }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_baltic_pagan_reformed }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_slavic_pagan_reformed }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_tengri_pagan_reformed }
			}
			AND = {
				religion = shamanism
				any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT has_country_flag = was_shamanism }
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.019.a #Convert to the new religion
		subtract_stability_3 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = catholic } }
			change_religion = catholic
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = protestant } }
			change_religion = protestant
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = reformed } }
			change_religion = reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = orthodox } }
			change_religion = orthodox
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = coptic } }
			change_religion = coptic
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = gnostic } }
			change_religion = gnostic
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = hussite } }
			change_religion = hussite
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = sunni } }
			change_religion = sunni
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = shiite } }
			change_religion = shiite
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = ibadi } }
			change_religion = ibadi
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = wahhabi } }
			change_religion = wahhabi
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = hinduism } }
			change_religion = hinduism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = sikhism } }
			change_religion = sikhism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = jain } }
			change_religion = jain
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = zoroastrian } }
			change_religion = zoroastrian
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = adi_dharam } }
			change_religion = adi_dharam
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = buddhism } }
			change_religion = buddhism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = confucianism } }
			change_religion = confucianism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = shinto } }
			change_religion = shinto
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = mahayana } }
			change_religion = mahayana
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = vajrayana } }
			change_religion = vajrayana
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = jewish } }
			change_religion = jewish
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = nahuatl } }
			change_religion = nahuatl
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = mesoamerican_religion } }
			change_religion = mesoamerican_religion
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = inti } }
			change_religion = inti
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = totemism } }
			change_religion = totemism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = pantheism } }
			change_religion = pantheism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = tengri_pagan_reformed } }
			change_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = shamanism } }
			change_religion = shamanism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = animism } }
			change_religion = animism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = west_african_pagan_reformed } }
			change_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = polynesian_religion } }
			change_religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = hellenic_pagan } }
			change_religion = hellenic_pagan
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = norse_pagan_reformed } }
			change_religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } }
			change_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = baltic_pagan_reformed } }
			change_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = { any_country = { overlord_of = ROOT religion = finnish_pagan_reformed } }
			change_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.019.b #Declare our independence!
		trigger = { ai = no }
		random_country = {
			limit = { overlord_of = ROOT }
			country_event = { id = dg_turmoil.073 days = 0 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Missionary expedition
	
	id = dg_conversion.020
	title = dg_conversion.020.t
	desc = dg_conversion.020.d
	picture = all_mission
	
	is_triggered_only = yes #By decision
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.020.a #Send them to our cousins in bondage
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_neighbor_country = {
					NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					NOT = { is_rival = ROOT }
					NOT = { culture_group = ROOT }
					NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary } }
					any_owned_province = {
						any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
						NOT = { religion = ROOT }
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					OR = {
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 200 } }
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 400 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.60 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 600 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
						}
					}
					army_size = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			any_neighbor_country = {
				NOT = { religion = ROOT }
				NOT = { is_rival = ROOT }
				NOT = { culture_group = ROOT }

					NOT = { religion = ROOT }

						}
					}

		if = {
			limit = { religion = vajrayana }
			random_neighbor_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					NOT = { is_rival = ROOT }
					culture_group = ROOT
					NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary } }
					any_owned_province = {
						any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
						NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					}
					OR = {
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 200 } }
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 400 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.60 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 600 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
						}
					}
				}
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
						NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = heretic_missionary duration = 2000 }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_province_flag = vajrayana_missionary_active
						set_province_flag = foreign_missionary
					}
					province_event = { id = dg_turmoil.077 days = 200 }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { religion = shinto }
			random_neighbor_country = {
				limit = {

		name = dg_conversion.020.c #Send them to our rivals
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			any_neighbor_country = {
				NOT = { religion = ROOT }
				is_rival = ROOT
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary } }
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
					NOT = { religion = ROOT }
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 200 } }
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 400 } }
					}
					AND = {

						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 600 } }
					}

						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}

		name = dg_conversion.020.e #Send them to our neighbors

			factor = 9
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_neighbor_country = {
					NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					NOT = { is_rival = ROOT }
					NOT = { culture_group = ROOT }
					NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary } }

					}

				}
			}
		}

			factor = 20
		}

			any_rival_country = {
				NOT = { religion = ROOT }
				is_neighbor_of = ROOT
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary } }
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }

						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}

							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
						}
					}
				}

					limit = {
						any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
						NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = heretic_missionary duration = 2000 }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_province_flag = coptic_missionary_active
						set_province_flag = foreign_missionary
					}
					province_event = { id = dg_turmoil.077 days = 200 }

						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
						}
					}
				}

					limit = {
						any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
						NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = heretic_missionary duration = 2000 }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_province_flag = jewish_missionary_active
						set_province_flag = foreign_missionary
					}
					province_event = { id = dg_turmoil.077 days = 200 }

						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
						}
					}
				}
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
						NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = heretic_missionary duration = 2000 }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_missionary_active
						set_province_flag = foreign_missionary
					}
					province_event = { id = dg_turmoil.077 days = 200 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.020.g #Aid our $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ neighbors against heresy
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ROOT
					any_owned_province = {
						any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
						NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					}
					alliance_with = ROOT
					OR = {
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 200 } }
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 400 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.60 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 600 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ROOT
					any_owned_province = {
						any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
						NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					}
					marriage_with = ROOT
					OR = {
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 200 } }
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 400 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.60 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 600 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ROOT
					any_owned_province = {
						any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
						NOT = { religion = ROOT }
					}
					is_rival = ROOT
					OR = {
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 200 } }
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 400 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.60 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 600 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
							NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			any_neighbor_country = {
				religion = ROOT
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
					NOT = { religion = ROOT }
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 200 } }
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 400 } }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.60 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 600 } }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_treasury = -10
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
					NOT = { religion = ROOT }
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 200 } }
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.40 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 400 } }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.60 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 600 } }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 0.80 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 800 } }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { patriarch_authority = 1.00 }
						NOT = { capital_distance = { who = ROOT distance = 1000 } }
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT }
					NOT = { religion = ROOT }
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = foreign_missionary duration = 2000 }
				hidden_effect = { set_province_flag = foreign_missionary }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.020.f #Cancel the expedition
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition }
			add_adm_power = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				NOT = { has_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition } #Just in case
			}
			add_adm_power = 20
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition }
			}
			add_adm_power = 10
		}
		remove_country_modifier = foreign_missionaries
	}
}

country_event = { #Catholic Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.021
	title = dg_conversion.021.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_catholic }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = catholic
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_catholic_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = catholic value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = catholic value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = catholic
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = catholic
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = catholic
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = catholic
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = catholic
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = catholic
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = catholic
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = catholic
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = catholic
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = catholic
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = catholic
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 } #information overload
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = catholic } check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = catholic } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = catholic } check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = catholic } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = catholic }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_catholic_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = catholic value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_catholic
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = catholic_10
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = catholic value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = catholic value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = catholic
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = catholic_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = catholic
		swap_free_idea_group = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_catholic_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_catholic
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 } #information overload
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = catholic } check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = catholic } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = catholic } check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = catholic } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = catholic }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Orthodox Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.022
	title = dg_conversion.022.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_orthodox }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = orthodox
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_orthodox_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
