				check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = orthodox
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = orthodox
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = orthodox
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = orthodox
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = orthodox
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = orthodox
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = orthodox
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = orthodox
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = orthodox
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = orthodox
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = orthodox
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 } #information overload
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = orthodox } check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = orthodox } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = orthodox }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = orthodox } check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = orthodox } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = orthodox }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_orthodox_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = orthodox
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_orthodox
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = orthodox_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = orthodox value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = orthodox value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = orthodox
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = orthodox_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = orthodox
		swap_free_idea_group = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_orthodox_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_orthodox
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 } #information overload
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = orthodox } check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = orthodox } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = orthodox }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = orthodox } check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = orthodox } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = orthodox }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = orthodox
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Protestant Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.023
	title = dg_conversion.023.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_protestant }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = protestant
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_protestant_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = protestant value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = protestant value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = protestant value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = protestant value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = protestant value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = protestant
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = protestant
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = protestant
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = protestant
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = protestant
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = protestant
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = protestant
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = protestant
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = protestant
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = protestant
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = protestant
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 } #information overload
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = protestant } check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = protestant } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = protestant }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } } #information overload
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = protestant } check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = protestant } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = protestant }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_protestant_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = protestant value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_protestant
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = protestant_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = protestant value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = protestant value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = protestant value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = protestant
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = protestant_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = protestant
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_protestant_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_protestant
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 } #information overload
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = protestant } check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = protestant } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = protestant }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } } #information overload
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = protestant } check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = protestant } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = protestant }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Reformed Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.024
	title = dg_conversion.024.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_reformed }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = reformed
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_reformed_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = reformed value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = reformed value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = reformed value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = reformed value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = reformed value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = reformed
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = reformed
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = reformed
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = reformed
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = reformed
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = reformed
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = reformed
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = reformed
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = reformed
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = reformed
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = reformed
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 } #information overload
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = reformed } check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = reformed } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = reformed }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } } #information overload
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = reformed } check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = reformed } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = reformed }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_reformed_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = reformed
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = reformed value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_reformed
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = reformed_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = reformed value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = reformed value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = reformed value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = reformed
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = reformed_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = reformed
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_reformed_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_reformed
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 } #information overload
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = reformed } check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = reformed } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = reformed }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } } #information overload
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = reformed } check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = reformed } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = reformed }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = reformed
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #coptic Orthodox Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.025
	title = dg_conversion.025.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_coptic }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = coptic
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_coptic_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = coptic value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = coptic value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = coptic value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = coptic value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = coptic value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = coptic
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = coptic
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = coptic
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = coptic
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = coptic
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = coptic
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = coptic
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = coptic
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = coptic
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = coptic
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = coptic
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = coptic } check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = coptic } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = coptic }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = coptic } check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = coptic } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = coptic }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_coptic_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = coptic
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = coptic value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_coptic
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = coptic_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = coptic value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = coptic value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = coptic value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = coptic
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = coptic_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = coptic
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_coptic_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_coptic
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = coptic } check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = coptic } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = coptic }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = coptic } check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = coptic } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = coptic }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = coptic
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Gnostic Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.026
	title = dg_conversion.026.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_gnostic }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = gnostic
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_gnostic_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = gnostic
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = gnostic
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = gnostic
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = gnostic
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = gnostic
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = gnostic
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = gnostic
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = gnostic
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = gnostic
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = gnostic
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = gnostic
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = gnostic } check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = gnostic } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = gnostic }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = gnostic } check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = gnostic } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = gnostic }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = refused_gnostic_conversion
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = gnostic
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_gnostic
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = gnostic_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = gnostic value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = gnostic value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = gnostic
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = gnostic_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = gnostic
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_gnostic_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_gnostic
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = gnostic } check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = gnostic } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = gnostic }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = gnostic } check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = gnostic } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = gnostic }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = gnostic
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Hussite Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.027
	title = dg_conversion.027.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_hussite }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = hussite
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_hussite_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = hussite value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = hussite value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hussite value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hussite value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hussite value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = hussite
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = hussite
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = hussite
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hussite
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hussite
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hussite
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hussite
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hussite
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hussite
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hussite
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hussite
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = hussite } check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = hussite } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = hussite }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = hussite } check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = hussite } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = hussite }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_hussite_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = hussite
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hussite value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_hussite
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = hussite_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = hussite value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = hussite value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = hussite value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = hussite
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = hussite_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = hussite
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_hussite_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_hussite
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = hussite } check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
