						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = hussite } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = hussite }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = hussite } check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = hussite } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = hussite }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = hussite
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Sunni Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.028
	title = dg_conversion.028.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_sunni }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = sunni
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_sunni_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sunni value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sunni value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sunni value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = sunni
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = sunni
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = sunni
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sunni
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sunni
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sunni
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sunni
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sunni
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sunni
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sunni
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sunni
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = sunni } check_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = sunni } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = sunni }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = sunni } check_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = sunni } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = sunni }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = refused_sunni_conversion
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = sunni
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sunni value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_sunni
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = sunni_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = sunni value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = sunni value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = sunni
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = sunni_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = sunni
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_sunni_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_sunni
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = sunni } check_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = sunni } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = sunni }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = sunni } check_variable = { which = sunni value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = sunni } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = sunni }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = sunni
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Shiite Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.029
	title = dg_conversion.029.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_shiite }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = shiite
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_shiite_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = shiite value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = shiite value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = shiite value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = shiite value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = shiite value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = shiite
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = shiite
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = shiite
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = shiite
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = shiite
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = shiite
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = shiite
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = shiite
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = shiite
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = shiite
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = shiite
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = shiite } check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = shiite } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = shiite }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = shiite } check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = shiite } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = shiite }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_shiite_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = shiite
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = shiite value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_shiite
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = shiite_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = shiite value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = shiite value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = shiite value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = shiite
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = shiite_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = shiite
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_shiite_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_shiite
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = shiite } check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = shiite } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = shiite }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = shiite } check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = shiite } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = shiite }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = shiite
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Ibadi Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.030
	title = dg_conversion.030.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_ibadi }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = ibadi
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_ibadi_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = ibadi
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = ibadi
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = ibadi
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ibadi
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ibadi
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ibadi
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ibadi
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ibadi
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ibadi
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ibadi
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = ibadi
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = ibadi } check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = ibadi } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = ibadi }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = ibadi } check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = ibadi } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = ibadi }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_ibadi_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ibadi
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_ibadi
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = ibadi_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = ibadi value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = ibadi value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = ibadi
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = ibadi_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = ibadi
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_ibadi_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_ibadi
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = ibadi } check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = ibadi } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = ibadi }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = ibadi } check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = ibadi } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = ibadi }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ibadi
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Wahhabi Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.031
	title = dg_conversion.031.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_wahhabi }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = wahhabi
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_wahhabi_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = wahhabi
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = wahhabi
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = wahhabi
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = wahhabi
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = wahhabi
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = wahhabi
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = wahhabi
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = wahhabi
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = wahhabi
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = wahhabi
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = wahhabi
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = wahhabi } check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = wahhabi } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = wahhabi }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = wahhabi } check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = wahhabi } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = wahhabi }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_wahhabi_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = wahhabi
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_wahhabi
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = wahhabi_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = wahhabi
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = wahhabi_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = wahhabi
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_wahhabi_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_wahhabi
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = wahhabi } check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = wahhabi } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = wahhabi }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = wahhabi } check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = wahhabi } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = wahhabi }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = wahhabi
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Hindu Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.032
	title = dg_conversion.032.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_hinduism }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = hinduism
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_hinduism_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = hinduism
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = hinduism
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = hinduism
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hinduism
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hinduism
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hinduism
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hinduism
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hinduism
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hinduism
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hinduism
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = hinduism
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = hinduism } check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = hinduism } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = hinduism }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = hinduism } check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = hinduism } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = hinduism }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_hinduism_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = hinduism
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_hinduism
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = hinduism_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = hinduism value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = hinduism value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = hinduism
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = hinduism_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = hinduism
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_hinduism_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_hinduism
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = hinduism } check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = hinduism } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = hinduism }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = hinduism } check_variable = { which = hinduism value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = hinduism } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = hinduism }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = hinduism
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Sikh Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.033
	title = dg_conversion.033.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_sikhism }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = sikhism
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_sikhism_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = sikhism
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = sikhism
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = sikhism
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sikhism
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sikhism
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sikhism
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sikhism
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sikhism
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sikhism
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sikhism
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = sikhism
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = sikhism } check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = sikhism } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = sikhism }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = sikhism } check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = sikhism } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = sikhism }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_sikhism_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = sikhism
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_sikhism
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = sikhism_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = sikhism value = 1 }
