						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = sikhism value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = sikhism
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = sikhism_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = sikhism
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_sikhism_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_sikhism
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = sikhism } check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = sikhism } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = sikhism }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = sikhism } check_variable = { which = sikhism value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = sikhism } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = sikhism }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = sikhism
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Jain Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.034
	title = dg_conversion.034.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_jain }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = jain
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_jain_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = jain value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = jain value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = jain value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = jain value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = jain value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = jain
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = jain
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = jain
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = jain
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = jain
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = jain
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = jain
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = jain
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = jain
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = jain
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = jain
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = jain } check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = jain } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = jain }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = jain } check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = jain } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = jain }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_jain_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = jain
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = jain value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_jain
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = jain_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = jain value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = jain value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = jain value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = jain value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = jain
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = jain_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = jain
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_jain_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_jain
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = jain } check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = jain } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = jain }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = jain } check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = jain } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = jain }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = jain
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Zoroastrian Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.035
	title = dg_conversion.035.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_zoroastrian }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = zoroastrian
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_zoroastrian_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = zoroastrian } check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = zoroastrian } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = zoroastrian }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = zoroastrian } check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = zoroastrian } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = zoroastrian }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_zoroastrian_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = zoroastrian
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_zoroastrian
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = zoroastrian_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = zoroastrian
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = zoroastrian_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = zoroastrian
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_zoroastrian_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_zoroastrian
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = zoroastrian } check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = zoroastrian } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = zoroastrian }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = zoroastrian } check_variable = { which = zoroastrian value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = zoroastrian } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = zoroastrian }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = zoroastrian
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Theravada Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.036
	title = dg_conversion.036.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_buddhism }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = buddhism
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_buddhism_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = buddhism
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = buddhism
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = buddhism
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = buddhism
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = buddhism
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = buddhism
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = buddhism
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = buddhism
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = buddhism
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = buddhism
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = buddhism
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = buddhism } check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = buddhism } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = buddhism }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = buddhism } check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = buddhism } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = buddhism }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_buddhism_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = buddhism
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_buddhism
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = buddhism_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = buddhism value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = buddhism value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = buddhism
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = buddhism_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = buddhism
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_buddhism_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_buddhism
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = buddhism } check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = buddhism } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = buddhism }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = buddhism } check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = buddhism } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = buddhism }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = buddhism
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Mahayana Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.037
	title = dg_conversion.037.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_mahayana }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = mahayana
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_mahayana_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = mahayana
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = mahayana
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = mahayana
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = mahayana
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = mahayana
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = mahayana
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = mahayana
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = mahayana
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = mahayana
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = mahayana
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = mahayana
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = mahayana } check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = mahayana } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = mahayana }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = mahayana } check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = mahayana } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = mahayana }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_mahayana_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = mahayana
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_mahayana
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = mahayana_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = mahayana value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = mahayana value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = mahayana
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = mahayana_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = mahayana
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_mahayana_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_mahayana
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = mahayana } check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = mahayana } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = mahayana }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = mahayana } check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = mahayana } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = mahayana }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = mahayana
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Vajrayana Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.038
	title = dg_conversion.038.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_vajrayana }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = vajrayana
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_vajrayana_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = vajrayana
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = vajrayana
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = vajrayana
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = vajrayana
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = vajrayana
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = vajrayana
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = vajrayana
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = vajrayana
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = vajrayana
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = vajrayana
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = vajrayana
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = vajrayana } check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = vajrayana } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = vajrayana }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = vajrayana } check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = vajrayana } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = vajrayana }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = refused_vajrayana_conversion }
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = vajrayana
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 12 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.c #Accept this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_adm_power = 25
		add_dip_power = 50
		add_mil_power = 25
		custom_tooltip = cannot_expel
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_vajrayana
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_tooltip = vajrayana_20
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 }
				change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 20 }
			custom_tooltip = state_religion_unrest_1
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { is_core = ROOT }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
					hidden_effect = {
						change_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 1 }
						change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 20 } }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { is_core = ROOT }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 1 }
					add_base_unrest = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
				hidden_effect = {
					change_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 1 }
					change_variable = { which = province_religion value = -1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.b #Embrace this foreign faith
		trigger = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 6 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 2 } }
			subtract_stability_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 2
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
			}
			subtract_stability_4 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 3
				NOT = { ADM = 4 }
			}
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 4
				NOT = { ADM = 5 }
			}
			subtract_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ADM = 5
				NOT = { ADM = 6 }
			}
			subtract_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 6 }
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50
		define_advisor = { type = inquisitor discount = yes }
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 5 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = vajrayana
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 1 }
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_owner_culture = yes is_overseas = no has_owner_religion = yes }
			custom_tooltip = vajrayana_10
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heathens value = 2 } }
		}
		change_religion = vajrayana
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e #Vow that $DYNASTY$ $COUNTRY$ shall never convert to this evil!
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_vajrayana_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_vajrayana
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 } } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { NOT = { religion = vajrayana } check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 } }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = vajrayana } }
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { religion = vajrayana }
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
							add_base_unrest = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { num_of_cities = 30 } }
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 } } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { NOT = { religion = vajrayana } check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 2 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { any_owned_province = { religion = vajrayana } }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { religion = vajrayana }
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = 4 }
						add_base_unrest = yes
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = vajrayana
				NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
				OR = { #In order of preference
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion }
			add_casus_belli = { target = ROOT type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 120 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Confucian Missionaries
	
	id = dg_conversion.039
	title = dg_conversion.039.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_confucianism }
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = confucianism
			NOT = { war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { truce_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = { who = ROOT modifier = refused_conversion } }
			OR = { #In order of preference
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = { num_of_cities = 10 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 41
		
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_confucianism_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 4 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 8 }
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 1.00 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.a #Stay true to the faith of our fathers
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion_group = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				overlord = { religion = ROOT }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { num_of_cities = ROOT NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ADM = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 2 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 4 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 6 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 8 }
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = confucianism
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = confucianism
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					religion = confucianism
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = confucianism
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = confucianism
					alliance_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = confucianism
					overlord_of = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = confucianism
					tech_difference = 4
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = confucianism
					tech_difference = 8
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = confucianism
					tech_difference = 12
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = confucianism
					tech_difference = 16
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					religion = confucianism
					tech_difference = 20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.60 } }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 NOT = { piety = 0.20 } }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { num_of_cities = 30 }
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
